title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: I really want to go to the beach this weekend.

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: That sounds like fun. What's the weather going to be like?

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: I heard that it's going to be warm this weekend.

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: Is it going to be perfect beach weather?

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: I believe so.

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: Good. I hope it doesn't cool off this weekend.

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: I know. I really want to go to the beach.

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: But you know that California weather is really unpredictable.

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: You're right. One minute it's hot, and then the next minute it's cold.

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: I really wish the weather would just stay the same.

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: I do too. That way we can have our activities planned ahead of time.

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: Yeah, that would make things a lot easier.

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: I would like to take a trip to the beach this weekend.

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: A trip to the beach would be fun. How is the weather going to be?

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: The forecast says that it will be warm on the weekend.

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: So do you think it'll be perfect weather for the beach?

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: It sounds like it will be.

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: I really hope it doesn't get cold.

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: That would ruin things, I want to go so badly.

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: The weather in California is unpredictable, so you never know.

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: That is true. The weather is constantly changing.

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: It would be nice if the weather would never change.

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: That would be great, then we could plan things sooner.

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: True. Predictable weather would make life easier.

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: It would be nice to go to the beach sometime this weekend.

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: What's the weather going to be like? I may want to go too.

title: 4. Weather (3)

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: Will it be good beach weather?

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: I think it will be.

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: It wouldn't be good if it got cold this weekend.

title: 4. Weather (3)
dialogue_line: I want this trip to be perfect, I hope it stays warm.

title: 4. Weather (3)

dialogue_line: No, I don't have that.

dialogue_line: To get started, take that list over to the bookstore. Do you know where the bookstore is?

title: 4. Buying Textbooks
dialogue_line: I am not sure where the bookstore is.

title: 4. Buying Textbooks
dialogue_line: When you pass the gym, it'll be the first door on the left. Do you know how to sell your old textbooks for money?

title: 4. Buying Textbooks
dialogue_line: Yes, I knew I could do that. Exactly how do I go about selling them?

title: 4. Buying Textbooks
dialogue_line: If you give your used textbooks to the person at the booth outside the door, he will reimburse you. Can you go over there today?

title: 4. Buying Textbooks
dialogue_line: I think maybe I could be there.

title: 4. Buying Textbooks
dialogue_line: I am free at 1:00 today or tomorrow if you need some help. Want to meet me over there?

title: 4. Buying Textbooks
dialogue_line: Maybe that would work.

title: 4. Buying Textbooks
dialogue_line: I'll catch you later then. Have a wonderful morning.

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: Could you tell me if you have ever taken a class from Dr. Miller?

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: Yes. Are you going to be taking a class from him?

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: Yes, but I have never taken his class before.

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: He is very interesting and challenging. Is that what you are looking for?

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: Yes, that's what I need.

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: He is really clear on what you need to learn to get a good grade. Are you willing to study hard?

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: Yes, I guess so.

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: What I really liked about him is that he was an understanding and friendly teacher. Do you enjoy that in a teacher?

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: Yes, I had a teacher like that before.

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: Did you know that he has 20 years teaching experience?

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: No, I didn't, but that could be a good thing.

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: Well, take a look at everything and figure out what is best for you. Good luck!

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: Do you know anything about Dr. Miller's classes?

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: Yes. Are you in his class?

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: I'm thinking of taking his class next semester.

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: He really knew his stuff, but he graded hard. Would that be OK?

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: Yes, I really need someone who is really good.

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: I didn't find it overwhelming to earn a good grade if you work at it. Can you do that?

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: Maybe, but I'm not sure.

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: Man, this guy was so funny when he was teaching. I like that, don't you?

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: No, that stuff isn't important to me.

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: Did you know that he is a fairly new teacher and very current in his field?

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: I don't care about any of that.

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: We all are looking for different things in an instructor. I hope I've helped you.

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: Would you talk to me about taking one of Dr. Miller's classes?

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: Yes. Have you ever been in one of his classes?

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: I'm thinking about taking his class next semester.

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: He was a very easy teacher. Are you thinking of taking a class with him?

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: I'm not sure because I really need to learn something, but I also worry about grades.

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: Grades are important, but don't you think that gaining the knowledge is important, too?

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: I really need to learn this stuff.

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: He made everything so interesting that the time just flew by. Do you know what I mean?

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: Yes, that sounds right for me.

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: Did you know that he came here last year after 10 years in the military?

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: Yeah, I already knew that. That could be a good thing.

title: 5. Talking about a Professor
dialogue_line: I think you know that you have to make the best decision for you. Enjoy your year!

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Professor, could I make an appointment with you?

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I am free tomorrow afternoon between two and four; do you have a particular time in mind?

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Two o'clock would be the best time.

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Fine, do you know where my office is?

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: No, I'm not sure.

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Remember, it is in the E building on the third floor.

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I see.

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Don't worry, it will work out fine once you get there. I'll see you then.

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I'll see you then.

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Looking forward to meeting with you!

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Excuse me, Professor, is there a time when I could meet with you?

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I could meet with you tomorrow anywhere from two until four; what time works out best?

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I would like to come in at three o'clock.

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I am glad that that works out; can you find my office?

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Yes, I can.

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Just follow the walkway to the outside and climb the stairs to the third floor.

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I got it.

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: If you do get lost, just ask someone in the building to point the way.

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Thank you, I'll be there.

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: If you need to cancel your appointment, please give me a call!

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Professor, do you have a few moments when I could meet with you?

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I schedule my appointments from two to four on Saturday; what works best for you?

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Three would be a good time.

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Great, do you need directions to my office?

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I'm not sure.

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Well, just make sure to go through the double doors, and I'll be on the right.

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: OK, I'll find it.

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: It's very easy to find.

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: See you then.

title: 6. Making an Appointment with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I will enjoy seeing you; have a good week!

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: Excuse me, Professor. I have to talk to you about why my homework didn't get done.

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: What happened that you didn't get it done?

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: I had to watch a football game instead.

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: Well, you had more than one day; couldn't you have fit it in on another day?

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: Yes, I think so.

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: Either way, I only allow one missed assignment per semester. When will you be turning the make-up in?

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: I'll make it up next week.

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: Fine, but it cannot happen again if you want an A in the class.

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: OK, I can do that.

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: Remember that you are in college now, not high school.

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: I don't have my homework today.

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: You usually are good about turning it in; what happened?

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: I was really sick.

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: But couldn't you have done it when you felt better?

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: Yes, I probably could.

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: You have already missed one other assignment; when can I expect the make-ups?

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: Next class meeting.

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: That will be soon enough, but make sure you get next week's assignment in as well, all right?

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: That would work for me.

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: Good. I know that you are capable of being an excellent student.

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: Let me tell you what happened to my homework.

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: OK, go ahead--what is the excuse THIS time?

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: Actually, I did it, but then it got lost.

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: Could you have gotten it done at another time?

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: Yes, I could.

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: You have never missed an assignment before--when will you be making this one up?

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: I'll make it up early next week.

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: That would work, but don't let it happen again.

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: I'll try.

title: 7. Turning Homework in Late
dialogue_line: That will solve it then. Let's work hard to not let it happen again.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Excuse me, Professor. I think there might be an error in my test score.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Sure. Do you think that the total is wrong or that you got something marked wrong that should have been marked right?

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: I think that the percentage is incorrect.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Let's just go over all of it to double-check.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Sure, let's do it.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Here is the answer sheet. Do you see a place where I marked something wrong that should have been right?

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: I don't see any mistakes.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: OK, now that we've gotten those straightened out, let's total the score.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Yes, let's total it.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Well, if I total that like this and divide by this number, I get this total. Do you agree?

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Yes, you're right.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Well then, we are all straight. Have a good day and thanks for bringing that to my attention.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: I was looking at my test score and think that it should be higher.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Is the math wrong or the way the answer was marked?

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: I think an answer got marked wrong that should have been marked right.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: These things can happen; let's double-check the answers first to be sure, all right?

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: That would be great!

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Look at the answer sheet and compare it to your answers. Do you see any place where I made a mistake in grading?

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: This one right here should be right.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Yeah, I see the same thing; now we can do the math and check that, right?

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Yeah, let's do the math.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: I count all of the correct answers, total them, and divide by the total. Does this look right to you?

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Looks pretty good.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Thank you for caring enough to check on your scores; keep studying!

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Could we go over some things, because I think my test score is wrong.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: What do you think is wrong, the math or the way your answer was scored?

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Both.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: I am willing to take a second look because teachers make mistakes, too. Will that work for you?

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Yeah, I'm ready.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Check your answers against the ones on the answer sheet and let me know where you see the mistake.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: These look strange.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Yes, I agree; let's move on to the calculating of the score. Would that be OK?

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: OK, let's do the calculation.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: We add all of these up and divide by this and that gives us this percentage.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: I see.

title: 8. Finding an Error in Your Test Score
dialogue_line: Anytime you have a question, please feel free to ask!

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Do you have the notes from last week's class?

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Did you come late?

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: I couldn't make it.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Why is that?

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: I was sick.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Oh, okay. Well, here you go.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Are these all of them?

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Oh, wait, here are the rest.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Thanks a bunch.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Don't mention it.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Do you mind if I borrow the notes from last week?

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Were you here last week?

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: I was unable to make it.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: How come?

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: I was sick that day, and couldn't make it.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Well, here are the notes.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Are there any more?

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Sorry, here you go.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Thanks a lot.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: No problem.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Let me get last week's notes.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Yeah, sure--you didn't come to class that day?

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: I couldn't come.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Why not?

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: I wasn't feeling well.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Here they are.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Thanks a lot; are these all the notes?

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Oh, no, this is the rest.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: Thank you very much.

title: 9. Borrowing Class Notes
dialogue_line: It's no problem at all.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: I was wondering how you are going to calculate our final grades.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: Grades are based on many things: homework, attendance, quizzes, mid-term, and final.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: What counts the most?

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: Actually I look at all of it and let's not forget class participation.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: Do you grade on a curve or use percentages?

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: Homework, attendance, and quizzes are sixty percent; the mid-term and final are worth twenty percent each.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: What if we miss something?

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: I will allow one unexcused absence; after that you need to contact me ahead of time.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: Will you tell us if we are failing during the year?

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: You will be able to track your progress during the year.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: What do you base our grades on?

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: All of your coursework is important, including everything from attendance and homework to all of your test results for the semester.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: Does the final count the most?

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: All of it is important; please just do your best at all times.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: How do you total our scores?

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: The final and mid-term are twenty percent each; homework, attendance, and quizzes are the rest.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: What if we are out sick?

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: Make sure you contact me as I only allow one unexcused absence.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: How can we know if we are doing OK during the year?

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: Your grade will not be a surprise; you will know what you need to work on.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: How do you decide what grade we get?

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: I look at many things: attendance, quizzes, and tests.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: What is the most important factor?

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: Obviously I look for improvement as we go along, but I would like you to do your best from the beginning.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: How can we keep track of our grades?

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: The final and midterm are 40 percent of your grade; homework, attendance, and quizzes total 60 percent.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: What if we can't get to school?

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: You can only miss one class without penalty.

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: If we have a major problem, will you let us know?

title: . Grading Policy
dialogue_line: I will be letting you know during the year if you have a major problem.

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I'd like to talk to you about my grades.

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Sure! What exactly do you have questions about?

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I am worried that I messed up on a test.

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Well, let me take a look at my grade book. How do YOU think you are doing?

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I think I am doing great, except for that one test!

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Well, your scores show that you could do a little better. What do you think you could improve on?

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I think that I could study a little harder for tests.

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Fine! Please remember that regular attendance is the most important way to begin.

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Yes, I know.

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I'm sure you'll do fine.

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Could you talk to me for a few minutes about my grades?

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Step into my office for a moment. What is your concern?

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Am I failing?

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Let's go on the computer to see what's up. Do you think you are doing well?

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I am pretty sure that I am in trouble.

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I can see that you are trying, but where do you think you could improve?

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I missed a few classes; I need to make sure I come to school on a regular basis.

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Having a regular study routine and following it is very important, right?

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I'll try; it's hard!

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Thanks for stopping by!

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Professor, I'm concerned about my grades. Do you have a minute?

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Of course, how can I help you?

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I want to know if I am doing OK.

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Let's pull out your scores so far. Do you think you are doing OK?

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I am afraid that I might not be doing all that well.

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I'm seeing that you are doing OK in some areas, but not so well in others.

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I think I could take better notes and read a little more.

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: You can greatly improve your grades by always reflecting on what you can improve on.

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: I'm working on it!

title: . Discussing Your Grades with Your Professor
dialogue_line: Just do your best and I am sure that you will see improvement.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Excuse me, Professor. I am going to miss next week's class.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Is this something that you could schedule for another time?

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: No, I have to do this; it's important!

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Have you arranged for someone to take notes for you?

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: I've made arrangements with a friend to help me.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: You know that I only allow one absence per semester, don't you?

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Yes, I know.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Write down your name and the date on a piece of paper and give it to me.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: OK, I can do that.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Well, have a good day off from class.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Professor, I will not be here for our next class meeting.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Is this absolutely necessary?

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: I tried to work something out, but I really do have to miss one class.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Will you be able to make up the work you missed?

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: I'm going to be doing a lot of extra reading.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Remember that I will only let you miss one class meeting per semester.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Yes, I remember.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Could you e-mail me this week as a reminder?

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Sure, no problem.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Make good use of that day off; you'll only have one this semester!

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: I have to miss school next week.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Isn't there some way you could work your schedule out to be here?

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Unfortunately, this is what I have to do.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: How are you going to catch up?

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: I've got it all covered.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: If you miss this class, you will have used up your quota for the semester.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Don't worry, this will be the last class I miss.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Make sure to remind me right before you are absent.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: I'll remember.

title: . Talking to Professor about Being Absent
dialogue_line: Enjoy your day off and don't forget to study!

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: Professor, I am going to need to leave class early today.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: What is the problem?

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: I need to go to the airport to pick up a relative.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early

dialogue_line: Thanks, Professor. See you later!

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: See you later! Drive carefully.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: I am not feeling well.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: Could you make it up by attending my other section this week?

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: Yes, it's all taken care of.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: Are you leaving right away or can you stay for a few more minutes?

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: I can stay a few more minutes.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: OK, but please make sure that you get all of your make-up work completed.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: Thanks, Professor. I've got it covered!

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: Go do what you have to do, but make sure it doesn't happen again.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: I am sorry, but I can't stay until the end of class.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: Where do you need to be that is more important than school?

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: I have an appointment.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: Do you have a plan to make up your missed work?

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: No, but I'll make sure someone helps me out this week with my missed work.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: Are you going to go right away?

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: I am leaving right now.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: All right, but please remember that it is your responsibility to catch up.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: Thanks, Professor. I'll make sure everything gets taken care of.

title: . Talking to Professor about Leaving Early
dialogue_line: Goodbye, and try not to miss any more school.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: I have an appointment for 1:30.

dialogue_line: What can I help you with?

dialogue_line: Well, I have a problem with my class schedule.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: What is it?

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: It seems that I've been given two classes scheduled at the same time.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: I can understand the problem with that.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Is there any way that you can fix my schedule?

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: No problem, do you want those classes still?

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Yes, I do.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Let me see if I can find one of these classes on another day.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Thank you very much.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: I'm here for my appointment.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: What can I do for you today?

dialogue_line: I have an issue with my schedule.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Tell me the problem.

dialogue_line: I have two classes on here that are at the same time.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Oh, I see.

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Can you change that for me?

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Do you still want both classes?

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Yes, I would like to keep both classes.

title: . Talking to a Counselor

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: I would greatly appreciate that.

title: . Talking to a Counselor

title: . Talking to a Counselor

title: . Talking to a Counselor

title: . Talking to a Counselor

title: . Talking to a Counselor

title: . Talking to a Counselor
dialogue_line: Well, let me find you one of these classes on a different day.

title: . Talking to a Counselor

title: . Adding a Class

title: . Adding a Class

title: . Adding a Class

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: Thanks. I understand what to do now.

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: It should be easy to find. After you add the class, check with me in a few weeks to make sure that you are on my roll sheet.

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: That sounds good.

title: . Adding a Class
dialogue_line: Good, just make sure that you do the same thing if you ever need to drop a class. Good luck!

title: . Adding a Class

title: . Adding a Class

title: . Adding a Class

title: . Adding a Class

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: When are we leaving for our field trip?

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: Our science field trip is next Monday at 8:00 in the morning. Can you mark that on your calendar?

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: Yes, I will write that down.

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: That will be Monday, December 2nd. We need to start loading the buses half an hour early, so plan to arrive at 7:30.

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: Yes, I will be there on time.

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: We will return 6 days later on December 8th. Will someone be picking you up?

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: Yes, someone is coming to get me.

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: The return bus will leave the campground at 5:00 p.m. and return to campus 3 hours later at 8:00 p.m.

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: What should we bring with us?

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: I am going to post all of that information on the geology club web page. Check it out when you get a chance. See you Monday!

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: Can you tell me what the date and time of our field trip is?

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: We are leaving on our science field trip at 8:00 a.m. next Monday. Do you have something to write that down on?

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: Yes, I can write that on my calendar.

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: That will be on the second of December. Be there ½ an hour early to get your bags on the bus. Do you understand?

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: Yes, I understand.

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: The bus will bring you back 6 days later on December 8th. Is someone coming to get you?

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: No, I don't have a ride yet.

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: We will be leaving the campground at 5:00 in the evening and arrive at our campus at 8:00 p.m. Any more questions?

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: How much will the trip cost?

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: I put all of that information in the packet. I'll give you another copy if you need one. See you on Monday!

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: What date will our field trip be on?

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: The science field trip is next Monday at 8 o'clock in the morning. Do you want to make note of that on your calendar?

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: Yes, I will make note of that.

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: Next Monday is December 2nd. The buses will leave at 8, but we must begin loading at 7:30.

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: Be there half an hour early.

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: You might want to tell whoever is picking you up that you will return on December 8th. Do you have a ride?

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: Yes, someone is picking me up.

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: To get back to campus by 8:00 p.m., we will be leaving the campsite at 5:00 p.m. Do you have any more questions?

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: Not at the momentmaybe later, though.

title: . Date and Time of a Field Trip
dialogue_line: All of the extra information that you need is on the bulletin board in the hallway. See you on Monday!

title: . Where to Buy Lunch

title: . Where to Buy Lunch

dialogue_line: That would be great.

title: . Where to Buy Lunch
dialogue_line: Glad you asked me to join you. This will be fun!

title: . Where to Buy Lunch
dialogue_line: Mexican, Japanese or Chinese would be great.

title: . Where to Buy Lunch

dialogue_line: Is it close by?

title: . Where to Buy Lunch
dialogue_line: It's down a block on the right; can I show you the way?

title: . Where to Buy Lunch
dialogue_line: OK, I'd love the company.

title: . Where to Buy Lunch

dialogue_line: I'm hungry, too. What types of food sound good?

title: . Where to Buy Lunch
dialogue_line: Maybe just a quick sandwich, salad, or something.

dialogue_line: I have a great idea of where you might like to go.

dialogue_line: Of course! Let's go.

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: Can you help me figure out how to use this machine?

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: Yes, I would be happy to help. What do you want to buy?

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: I want to buy that candy.

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: OK. So this machine will make change if you need it. Do you have your dollars ready?

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: Yeah, so far, so good.

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: Next, you feed your dollars into the machine in the slot. Make sure they are smooth.

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: Yeah, I already knew that.

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: I'm sure you know that if the dollar gets stuck, you might have to re-feed it.

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: OK, let's move on!

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: Now you just make your selection and pray. If nothing comes out, try again or call the number on the side of the machine.

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: I hope it works!

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: Well, good luck!

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: I've never seen a machine like this before and need some help.

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: Sure, no problem. What are you trying to get?

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: I want to buy a drink.

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: OK. This machine needs you to use that change machine first to get correct change.

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: I've got the correct change already.

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: First you put your money in the dollar slot or the coin slot. The dollars have to be smooth.

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: OK, what next?

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: Just know that sometimes the money doesn't go in perfectly the first time and you have to try again.

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: OK, next?

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: Choose what you want and push the button. Sometimes it takes a couple of tries.

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: I agree with you.

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: Hope that works for you!

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: I want to know how to buy something from this machine.

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: Yeah, the new ones can be tricky. What are you trying to buy?

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: I want to buy one of those snack things.

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: Are you ready to go?

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: I'm clear so far.

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: The money goes in the slot over there. It has to be smooth to go in.

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: It won't go in!

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: Just remember that you might have to feed the money in a couple of times to get it to work.

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: Yes, next step.

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: Make your selection and hope for the best. Vending machines aren't all that reliable.

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: They're totally unreliable.

title: . Using a Vending Machine
dialogue_line: You seem to have it down. Have a good day!

title: . Getting a Library Card

dialogue_line: Sure, let me give you an application. You can fill it out right here at the counter.

title: . Getting a Library Card
dialogue_line: OK, here it is.

title: . Getting a Library Card
dialogue_line: Let me take a look at this for you. May I have your driver's license, please?

title: . Getting a Library Card

title: . Getting a Library Card
dialogue_line: You seem to have filled the form out all right. Are you familiar with our rules and fines?

title: . Getting a Library Card
dialogue_line: Yes, I know what to do.

title: . Getting a Library Card
dialogue_line: The hours and limitations are printed on the card and this handout.

title: . Getting a Library Card
dialogue_line: OK, I see.

title: . Getting a Library Card
dialogue_line: Thank you for joining the library; we look forward to serving you.

title: . Getting a Library Card
dialogue_line: I was wondering if you could help me to get a library card.

title: . Getting a Library Card
dialogue_line: Of course, just fill out this form and let me know when you are finished.

title: . Getting a Library Card
dialogue_line: I'm finished.

title: . Getting a Library Card
dialogue_line: I will also need your driver's license; hand me the filled-out form, please.

title: . Getting a Library Card
dialogue_line: OK, the form is all filled out.

title: . Getting a Library Card
dialogue_line: Perfect! Do you know the hours and rules for the library?

title: . Getting a Library Card
dialogue_line: No, I have no idea what they are.

title: . Getting a Library Card

title: . Getting a Library Card
dialogue_line: Yes, right.

title: . Getting a Library Card
dialogue_line: Great! You are all set to enjoy the library.

title: . Getting a Library Card
dialogue_line: Good morning. Is this where I can get a library card issued to me?

title: . Getting a Library Card
dialogue_line: No problem, we have a short form right here; just hand it to me when you are done.

title: . Getting a Library Card
dialogue_line: I'm done.

title: . Getting a Library Card
dialogue_line: That looks great, but I will also need your driver's license or other form of I.D.

title: . Getting a Library Card
dialogue_line: Sure, here it all is.

title: . Getting a Library Card
dialogue_line: Well, this looks nice. Do you know how to use it?

dialogue_line: I am pretty sure how to use it, but can you remind me?

title: . Getting a Library Card
dialogue_line: Of course, just remember that all of the needed information is on the card.

title: . Getting a Library Card
dialogue_line: I see.

title: . Getting a Library Card
dialogue_line: Well, I hope you have a wonderful time on your library visits!

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: Can you help me with returning my late books?

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: This is the right spot to pay your fee. Put your books down right here.

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: OK, here they are.

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: I can see that you owe 25 cents a day. That will be one dollar and fifty cents total.

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: OK, here's the money.

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: We are interested in getting our books back; so as long as all the fines are paid off by the end of the semester, you will be fine. Does that make sense?

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: I'm not sure.

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: Your registration and transcripts can be held up if there is an outstanding fine.

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: Now I understand.

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: Well, you can always keep your late fees down by using the night drop if we are closed. Enjoy the library!

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: These books should have been turned in last week.

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: You have come to the correct place. Hand me your books.

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: Here they are.

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: Whoa, these are pretty late! You owe five dollars total to clear your fine.

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: I don't have the money right now.

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: We only require that all fines must be paid off by the end of the semester. So you will be okay to go.

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: What would happen if I didn't pay it?

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: It's really important to always clear your fines, so you'll get a report card and transcripts on time.

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: Yeah, but I don't know how they can do that.

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: Always remember that the night drop is here, and we really appreciate you returning your books for all to use.

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: My library books are late, where can I put them?

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: This is where they need to be turned in. Let me see them to check the date, OK?

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: Yeah, I think that they are really late!

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: Not all that late. You only owe the library fifty cents.

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: What if I can't pay it?

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: We appreciate you paying off all fines as soon as possible, but always before the end of the semester.

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: Yeah, I get it.

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: Your report card and transcripts will be held until you pay all fines, so always make sure that you do that.

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: That's not really fair!

title: . Returning Overdue Books
dialogue_line: If we aren't here, always feel free to use the night drop outside. Thanks for coming in!

title: . Using a Parking Meter

title: . Using a Parking Meter

dialogue_line: Yes, I understood the old one.

dialogue_line: Well, on this one you can use coins or a debit or credit card; which one would you like to use?

title: . Using a Parking Meter
dialogue_line: Debit or credit card.

title: . Using a Parking Meter
dialogue_line: OK. Now, do you see what the rate is on the sticker?

title: . Using a Parking Meter
dialogue_line: Yes.

title: . Using a Parking Meter
dialogue_line: OK, now that we know what it will cost, put the money or card into the machine.

title: . Using a Parking Meter
dialogue_line: Yes, I can do that.

title: . Using a Parking Meter
dialogue_line: Wonderful; now, this machine asks you the number of your spot, so put that in also.

title: . Using a Parking Meter
dialogue_line: Yes, I'm ready.

title: . Using a Parking Meter
dialogue_line: All you have to do now is take your receipt and put it on your dashboard.

title: . Using a Parking Meter
dialogue_line: Whoa, I never saw a meter like this before; how do you use it?

title: . Using a Parking Meter
dialogue_line: It's simple, once you do it a few times. Do you know how the old one worked?

title: . Using a Parking Meter
dialogue_line: I never used a parking meter before.

title: . Using a Parking Meter

title: . Using a Parking Meter
dialogue_line: Yes, I can.

title: . Using a Parking Meter
dialogue_line: Fine. Now that we know what they are ripping us off for, insert the payment.

title: . Using a Parking Meter
dialogue_line: I'd rather not pay, but I have to.

title: . Using a Parking Meter
dialogue_line: Fine, this machine does not ask you the number of your spot, so we can move on, all right?

title: . Using a Parking Meter
dialogue_line: Perfect, let's do it.

title: . Using a Parking Meter
dialogue_line: Now just check the meter to see how many minutes you have.

title: . Using a Parking Meter
dialogue_line: This parking meter is really confusing. Can you help me figure it out?

title: . Using a Parking Meter
dialogue_line: It's just like the old one, but with new stuff added.

title: . Using a Parking Meter

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: Hey, I got this parking ticket; can you help me figure a way out of it?

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: First of all, did you park somewhere too long or in the wrong spot?

dialogue_line: You will need to convince the judge that you couldn't see the signs.

dialogue_line: Whatever you do, you need to be respectful and polite to the judge.

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: Good luck!

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: I guess not.

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: Try brown-nosing the judge, but don't be too obvious about it.

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: Sure, if it will help.

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: Sounds good!

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: Give it your best shot; it might work.

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket
dialogue_line: I don't know how to fight a parking ticket.

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket

dialogue_line: I can see how that might work.

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket

title: . Fighting a Parking Ticket

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: John, I was talking to the travel agent about where we might be taking our vacation this year.

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: I am going fishing in Alaska with my friend, Mark.

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: What are you talking about?

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: What's wrong with heading out with Mark for vacation?

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: You and I have been together for a whole year, and our vacation time should be about the two of us!

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: Really? Who made that rule up?

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: With that attitude, I don't really think we have much more to discuss here.

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: That works for me!

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: John, I was looking through some magazines for ideas about where we might go on vacation this year.

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: I've already told my buddy, Mark, that I am going hunting with him in Alaska.

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: You can't be serious!

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: Hey, I've always gone hunting or fishing on vacation. I am sorry that bothers you.

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: After a year together, I thought it pretty safe to assume that we would automatically spend our vacation together.

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: Says who? I don't think that is necessarily the case.

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: You know, now that I think about it, I really don't have much more to say to you at all!

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: Whatever you say!

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: Brian and Christina were mentioning that maybe it would be fun to go on vacation together this year, John.

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: I thought that I already told you that I am going with Mark to Alaska.

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: Are you kidding me?

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: You know what? You and I had no plans, so I made plans with Mark. What's the problem?

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: We have been together for a year and usually, people who've been together a year, take their vacation together.

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: I don't think that I ever heard of that rule before. Any more rules that you would like to tell me about?

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: Go on your vacation with Mark and when you come back, why don't you just move in with him as well!

title: 6. An Argument
dialogue_line: I am really looking forward to getting away from you. Far away from you!

title: Looking for an Apartment
dialogue_line: How did you find your apartment?

title: Looking for an Apartment
dialogue_line: You can check on the bulletin boards at school for local housing.

title: Looking for an Apartment
dialogue_line: What if I need a roommate?

title: Looking for an Apartment
dialogue_line: There are websites that can hook you up with a roommate.

title: Looking for an Apartment
dialogue_line: How much do apartments cost around here?

title: Looking for an Apartment
dialogue_line: It depends on what you want. Do you want a one- or two-bedroom apartment?

title: Looking for an Apartment
dialogue_line: I just need a one-bedroom apartment.

title: Looking for an Apartment
dialogue_line: That will probably cost you around twelve hundred dollars a month.

title: Looking for an Apartment
dialogue_line: Would you come with me to look at apartments?

title: Looking for an Apartment
dialogue_line: I would be happy to look at apartments with you.

title: Looking for an Apartment
dialogue_line: When you need an apartment, where do you look for one?

dialogue_line: Can I share an apartment with someone?

dialogue_line: Some of the ads in the paper are from people looking for roommates.

dialogue_line: Are apartments expensive in this city?

dialogue_line: Do you need a single apartment, or is this for two people?

title: Looking for an Apartment
dialogue_line: I want a two-bedroom apartment.

title: Looking for an Apartment
dialogue_line: You can get that type of apartment for around fifteen hundred dollars a month.

title: Looking for an Apartment
dialogue_line: Would you have time to go look at apartments with me?

title: Looking for an Apartment
dialogue_line: I love apartment hunting. I'll be happy to go with you.

title: Looking for an Apartment

title: Looking for an Apartment

title: Looking for an Apartment

title: Looking for an Apartment

title: Looking for an Apartment
dialogue_line: Would you like an apartment for just yourself, or do you need it for two people?

title: Looking for an Apartment

title: Looking for an Apartment
dialogue_line: You should be able to easily find that for twelve hundred dollars a month.

dialogue_line: I really would appreciate it if you could come look at apartments with me.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: Good morning, is this the Renter's Hotline?

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: Yes, what can I help you with?

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: I have a question about discrimination in housing.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: What type of discrimination?

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: I think that he doesn't want to rent to me because of my race.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: What made you think that your race was a problem?

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: He seemed OK talking to me on the phone, but seemed to change his mind when he saw me in person.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: What else made you feel he was discriminating against you?

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: Well, he had a 25 unit apartment building and everyone I saw there was his same race.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: Racial discrimination is very hard to prove, but if you would like to come down, we can go over a checklist that can help you build a case.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: I would like to speak with someone in the Housing Department.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: You have reached the right area. Can I help you with something?

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: I think that I may have experienced discrimination in trying to rent an apartment.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: Can you be specific as to what type of discrimination?

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: I felt that he didn't like me because I wasn't the same race that he was.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: How come you feel it was race that was the issue?

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: When I showed up on his doorstep, he seemed bothered by my appearance.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: Is there anything else that made you feel he was using race as a factor in who he rented to?

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: As I walked through the apartment building all I saw were people who were the same race as the manager.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: It is not easy to prove racial discrimination, but please go to our website which can help you file a formal complaint.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: Hello, is this the Legal Advice Line?

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: You are in the right department. What can I do for you?

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: I think that the landlord where I am trying to rent an apartment may be discriminating against me.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: Discrimination is a pretty broad term. What type, specifically?

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: I have a feeling that he will not consider my application because of my race.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: Are you sure that race was the issue? What makes you feel this way?

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: When he saw me in person, he seemed bothered by me although I seemed to be under consideration when I e-mailed him.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: Do you have any proof that he would not rent to you because of your race?

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: I didn't see one person in that whole building who wasn't the same race as the manager.

title: . Discrimination
dialogue_line: It is difficult to prove racial discrimination, but you may file a formal complaint in our office.

title: . Talking about the Lease
dialogue_line: I need to talk to you about something.

dialogue_line: I have some questions about my lease.

dialogue_line: Like what?

dialogue_line: Exactly how long is my lease for?

title: . Talking about the Lease

title: . Talking about the Lease
dialogue_line: What will happen if I move out before then?

title: . Talking about the Lease

dialogue_line: I don't understand.

dialogue_line: Why would you keep it?

title: . Talking about the Lease
dialogue_line: I would keep it because you would be breaking our contract.

title: . Talking about the Lease
dialogue_line: I get it now.

title: . Talking about the Lease
dialogue_line: I hope that I cleared things up for you.

title: . Talking about the Lease
dialogue_line: I would like to talk to you, if you have time.

title: . Talking about the Lease

dialogue_line: Your lease is for three years.

title: . Talking about the Lease
dialogue_line: If I ever decide to leave before the three years, will there be a problem?

title: . Talking about the Lease

dialogue_line: Why is that?

title: . Talking about the Lease

title: . Talking about the Lease
dialogue_line: Oh, I see.

title: . Talking about the Lease
dialogue_line: All right. I'm glad I could clarify things for you.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: I was wondering if you allow pets in this building.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: We do allow some pets, but you must pay an additional five hundred dollar security deposit.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: What kind of pets do you allow?

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: You may keep either one cat or one dog.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: Can cats and dogs be outside?

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: Cats can be outside, but we want them collared or tagged so we know who they belong to. Dogs must be on a leash and are not allowed in the flowerbeds.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: Are there any special places nearby that I can walk my dog?

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: There is a dog park down the block.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: Do many other tenants in this building have pets?

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: Not too many, but you shouldn't have any trouble finding someone to share walks with.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: What is your policy towards tenants keeping pets?

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: You may have a pet, but you have to pay an extra two hundred dollar cleaning deposit.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: How many pets can we have?

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: You may have only one pet. You can have either a small dog or a cat.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: What is the policy as to where the pets can be outside?

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: We ask that you keep your cats indoors or on your balcony. Dogs need to be walked to the street or park.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: Where can I walk my dog?

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: There is a park down the street, but you must keep your dog on a leash.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: How many other people have pets around here?

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: We have quite a few pet owners here, so if you need help finding a veterinarian, just ask around.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: Are renters allowed to have pets?

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: We allow a small well-behaved pet, but you need to sign an agreement saying you'll pay for any damages.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: Do you allow both cats and dogs?

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: We only allow a medium or small dog or a cat.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: Are there any special areas where animals are allowed or not allowed?

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: Cats are to be kept indoors at all times. Dogs must be on a leash and with the owner when outdoors.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: Are there places where I can take my dog for a run?

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: There are quite a few hiking trails nearby.

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: Are there a lot of pets in this building?

title: . Policy Towards Pets
dialogue_line: We don't have a lot of pet owners, but there are a few around if you have any questions about local pet supplies and dog parks.
