title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: Do I need to give you any information?

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: You need to give me your full name, social, and the address of your new house.

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: I need to speak with someone from the water company.

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: Is there something that I can do for you?

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: Actually, there is something I need help with.

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: How may I assist you?

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: I'm going to be moving in a few days.

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: How can I assist you with your move?

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: My water needs to be turned on.

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: Okay, when exactly will you need this done?

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: I need the water turned on no later than Saturday evening.

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: I can have it turned on for you by then.

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: What information do I need to give you to have that done?

title: . Calling the Water Company
dialogue_line: What I need is your social security number, full name, and your new address.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: Thank you for helping me move.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: Don't mention it. Where do you want all your furniture?

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: Okay, I want you to put the sofa in the living room.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: Would you like me to put it anywhere special?

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: No, up against the wall is just fine.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: Where would you like this table?

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: That table should go in the dining room.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: Would you like me to put it anywhere in particular?

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: You can place it right in the center of the room.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: How are things looking so far?

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: I think the furniture looks nice in here.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: You're absolutely right.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: I appreciate all your help with this move.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: It's the least I could do. Tell me where to put your furniture.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: That sofa should go in the living room.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: Was there a certain place you wanted the sofa?

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: I think it would look best up against that wall.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: What should I do with this table?

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: I want that table in the dining room.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: Should I just put it down anywhere?

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: I want it in the center of the room.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: What do you think? How does it look in here so far?

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: I love the way things are looking.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: That's exactly what I was thinking.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: I really am thankful for you helping me move.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: It's no problem. Just let me know where you want me to put everything.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: I would like you to put that sofa in the living room.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: Is there any particular place you want it?

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: Set it against that far wall.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: What do you want me to do with this table?

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: That's the dining-room table of course, silly.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: Where in the room do you want it?

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: It would look best in the center of the room.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: Do you like where everything is so far?

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: Everything looks great.

title: . Where to Put the Furniture
dialogue_line: Yeah, I agree.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: Hello, it's nice to meet you.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: It's great meeting you too.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: Did you just move in?

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I moved in this past weekend.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I had no idea that house was sold.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I had to buy. The first time I saw it, I fell in love.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: It is a beautiful house.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: Have you been living here long?

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: About 20 years now.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: Wow! That's a long time.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: Hopefully we will be neighbors for a lot longer.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I love this house too much to ever move.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: It is very nice meeting you.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I'm happy to meet you also.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: When did you get moved in?

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: Just this past weekend.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I didn't even know the house got sold.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I absolutely love this house, so I had to buy it.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I understand, because the house is extraordinary.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: How many years have you been living in your house?

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I've been living here for over 20 years.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: Twenty years? That is a very long time.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I hope that we remain neighbors for a while longer.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I could never move out of this house.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: Hey, nice to meet you.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: It's nice to meet you too.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: When exactly did you move into the house?

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I finished moving in this last weekend.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I didn't realize that the house was bought.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: Yeah, I saw the house and just fell in love with it.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: It was impossible to pass up.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: So, how long have you been living here?

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: Twenty years and counting.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: That's great to hear.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I sure hope that you stay here for that long.

title: . Greeting a Neighbor
dialogue_line: I'd be crazy to ever move out.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Is there anything specific that I should know about where to park my car?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: You have an assigned place in the back of the building with your apartment number on it.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Are there any other spots available to me?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: You will see several visitor and unmarked spots. These are available on a first-come basis.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: What if there is nothing else available?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: You can park on the street, but you have to pay attention to the rules.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: What are the rules?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Most of the laws are posted on the signs, but you also cannot park anywhere on the street between two and six in the morning.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Are the parking tickets expensive around here?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Parking tickets are very expensive, and if you don't pay them they may tow your car away.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: What are the rules about where I should park?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Your assigned space is in the back where I marked it on the map.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Can I park anywhere else in the parking lot?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: There are a few spots back there for visitors. They are unassigned.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Where can my guests park if all of those spots are gone?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: You can park on the street, but you can get ticketed for failing to follow the rules.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: How will I know what the rules are?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Just pay attention to street cleaning days and limits on the hours you can park out there.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Are parking citations costly?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Yes, parking tickets can be extremely expensive.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Where can I park my car?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: You have one assigned place right beside your own apartment.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Are there any other open spots available in the parking lot?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Your guests can park in a visitor or unmarked spot if one is available.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Is there any place else to park if the spots are all gone?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: There is always street parking, but you must obey the laws about parking out there.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Do they post the rules anywhere?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: The rules for parking are all clearly posted. Just follow them and you'll be OK.

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: Do you have to pay a large fine for a parking ticket?

title: . Prohibited Parking
dialogue_line: You don't want to get a parking ticket. You have better things to spend your money on!

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: Can you tell me where we are supposed to take our trash?

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: Put it in the dumpster next to that stairway.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: What day do they pick the trash up?

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: They empty the trash every Wednesday.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: Are we supposed to mix our recyclables in, or sort them?

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: We are supposed to sort our recyclables.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: Is there a special container for recyclables?

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: You should have a blue container in your kitchen. Empty that into the blue bin downstairs.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: What about plant material?

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: Anything that can be composted goes into the bin with the green lid.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: I need a little help about where to dump my trash bags.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: Put them in the parking lot dumpster near the parking spaces.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: When is trash day?

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: Trash day is Wednesday.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: Do they sort our recyclables, or do we do it?

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: They expect us to take out our recyclables.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: Do we put our recyclables in a separate bin?

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: Just take all of your recyclables to the blue bin downstairs.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: Is there a special bin for yard waste?

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: All material to be composted goes into the bin with the green lid.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: Where are the dumpsters located in this building?

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: Right now they are in the front of the building for pickup.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: When do the dumpsters get emptied?

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: They usually get emptied Wednesday, unless there is a holiday in there somewhere.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: Are there separate containers for recyclables?

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: We don't mix our recyclables with regular trash.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: What does the container for recyclables look like?

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: All of your recyclables go into the blue bin.

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: How about composting materials?

title: . Trash and Recycling
dialogue_line: We have a great composting program that uses the bin with the green lid.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: So where are the laundry rooms located?

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: There is a laundry room located at the end of each hallway.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Can I use them at any time?

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: All laundry rooms are locked at eleven at night and re-open at seven in the morning.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Do they use change?

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: You should bring quarters for the washer and dryer.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Can you buy detergent in the laundry room?

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Yes, there are detergent dispensers in the laundry room.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Are there rules in the laundry room?

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Yes, if you leave your laundry in the machine unattended, people can just take it out and put it on a table so they may use the machine.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Does every floor have a laundry room?

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Each hallway has a laundry room located near the stairway.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Are they open for use around the clock?

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: The laundry room near the recreation center is open twenty-four hours a day. The rest have posted hours.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Do I need to bring coins with me?

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: The washers and dryers require correct change, but there is a change machine in the laundry room.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Are there any detergent dispensers in the laundry room?

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Yes, but they are expensive.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Are there any specific rules about doing laundry?

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Yes, you are only supposed to tie up three machines at a time for your own use, so that the other machines are available for other tenants.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Do you have a lot of laundry rooms?

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: We have many laundry rooms. Your closest one is next to the pool.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Are there any certain hours we can use them.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: All of the laundry rooms can be used whenever you need to use them.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: What type of payment do they require?

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: If you bring dollar bills, you will be in great shape.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Is there any place to buy laundry detergent in the laundry room.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: There are detergent dispensers in the laundry room but it is cheaper to buy it across the street at the market.

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Is there anything I should know about the rules of the laundry room?

title: . Laundry Room Rules and Hours
dialogue_line: Yes, we ask that you please clean up after yourself as in wiping up spilled detergent or cleaning out lint screens.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: Hi, I am your new neighbor and was wondering if I could ask you a question or two.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: Hi! I would be happy to answer any questions you might have.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: Everyone here seems very friendly.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: Yes, many of us have lived here a long time and know each other well.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: How long have you lived here?

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: I have lived in this building for ten years.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: When I get settled, would you consider giving me a list of places you use, like cleaners and grocery stores?

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: I can help you with that. Would you like to go to the local farmer's market with me this morning?

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: That would be great!

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: Fine. I'll knock on your door around ten o'clock then.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: Hi, I am your new neighbor and would like to ask you about a few things.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: Hi, nice to meet you. Sure, ask me anything you need to know.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: So far, everyone that I've met seems so helpful.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: We all seem to get along pretty well.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: Have you lived here a very long time?

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: I first moved here ten years ago.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: I am having trouble figuring out the best places to shop and such.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: I am a pretty good source for all of that information. You could go to the local farmer's market with me today if you wish.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: I would love to go with you!

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: I'll be leaving around ten o'clock. I'll pick you up.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: Hi, I just moved in next door and have a few questions.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: Hello, and welcome to our building. I would be happy to help you with your questions.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: You all seem like a very pleasant group of tenants.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: We all try and help each other out when we can.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: When did you first move here?

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: I have lived here for quite awhile. Ten years!

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: I am not from around here, and I don't know where basic services are.

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: I could help you find everything you need. Would you be interested in going to the local farmer's market with me?

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: What a great opportunity to get oriented to the neighborhood!

title: . Neighbors and Help
dialogue_line: It starts around ten. Just meet me in the parking lot around 9:45, and I'll take you there.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: I have a question about extra people living with me in my apartment.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: You may have one roommate, but they need to have an approved application on file with us.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: What about overnight guests?

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: An occasional overnight guest is not a problem.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: How many days could I have an extra guest?

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: We usually consider any guest who stays over a week to be a possible problem.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: Will I have to pay extra for roommates or visitors?

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: If you are given permission for extended visitors, you may be charged extra.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: Can my guests use the pool and laundry room?

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: Your guests may use the pool and laundry facilities, but you must be with them at all times.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: Can I have roommates in my apartment?

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: You may have one roommate, but they need to pass a credit check.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: Can overnight guests stay with me?

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: You may have an overnight guest, but they may not stay for an extended period of time.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: How long could my friends and family stay with me without it being a problem?

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: No one can stay with you for over a week without special permission.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: Will I owe extra money for more people staying in my apartment?

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: You are not charged extra for a roommate or short-term guests.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: If I have visitors, may they use the pool?

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: Your short-term guests may use the facilities with you present.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: What about roommates in my apartment?

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: You may have one roommate, but their name must appear on the lease.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: Can I have someone visit me for a short period of time?

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: We understand that a family member or friend may visit from time to time. Just make sure that they are not moving in with you.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: How many days could a friend stay without it being a problem?

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: You cannot have an extra tenant for over a week, unless we give you special permission.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: Will I be charged extra money for having roommates or visitors?

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: A roommate or a short-term guest would not cost you anything extra.

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: Can my family and friends use the facilities when they visit me?

title: . Visitors and Extra Tenants
dialogue_line: Your guests may not use the facilities unless you are with them.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I need your help with something.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: What's wrong?

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I somehow locked myself out of my apartment.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: How did you lock yourself out?

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I'm really not sure.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: Where's your key?

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I locked it inside the house.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I do have a spare key to your door.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: May I use it, please?

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: Okay, but once you get in, bring my key right back.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I will, and thank you so much.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: Make sure to keep your key with you next time.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: Could you help me?

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: What happened?

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I'm locked out of my apartment.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: What did you do to lock yourself out?

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I have no idea.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: You don't have your key?

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: It's inside of my apartment.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I have a key to your apartment.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: Could I borrow it for just a second?

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: All right. Bring it back when you're done.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: Great, thanks a lot.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I hope you'll be more careful next time.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I really need you to do something for me.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: What's the problem?

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I can't get into my apartment.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: How'd you manage that?

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I don't know.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: Do you know where your key is?

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: It's inside my apartment.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I have a spare key.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: Will you let me use it to get inside?

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: Sure. Remember to give it back when you're finished.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: I appreciate this.

title: . Locked Out
dialogue_line: No problem. Try not to lock yourself out again.

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: Those neighbors of mine are so noisy!

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: Yes, I can hear them. What is that pounding sound?

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: I think that they are hammering nails to hang pictures.

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: How often do you hear them making noise?

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: They play their music really loud, and I can hear it.

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: Have you spoken to them about the noise problem?

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: No, I haven't spoken with them about it.

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: What else do you hear that bothers you?

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: I hear a lot of plumbing sounds, like the toilet flushing and the dishwasher running.

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: If this continues, I would speak to the manager.

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: I am really losing patience with my noisy neighbors!

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: They are noisy, all right. What do you think is making that sound?

title: . Noisy Neighbors
dialogue_line: I think they are hammering some new flooring down in their living room.

title: . Noisy Neighbors

dialogue_line: I would talk to the manager if the noise continues.

title: . Asking the Neighbor Not to Make Noise
dialogue_line: I'm sorry for being so loud.

title: . Poor Upkeep
dialogue_line: I would like to make an appointment to discuss the problems I keep having with my apartment.

dialogue_line: Are you having problems? This is the first I've heard of it.

title: . Poor Upkeep
dialogue_line: What kind of problems are you talking about?

title: . Poor Upkeep
dialogue_line: The garbage disposal doesn't work, we have rats, and the toilet is backed up.

title: . Poor Upkeep
dialogue_line: Maybe I could get back to you in a few weeks. I am leaving on vacation this afternoon.

title: . Poor Upkeep
dialogue_line: These things are your responsibility, and you need to fix them immediately.

title: . Poor Upkeep

title: . Poor Upkeep

title: . Poor Upkeep
dialogue_line: You wouldn't dare do that!

title: . Poor Upkeep
dialogue_line: You really need to look at some of the problems we are having with the apartment.

title: . Poor Upkeep
dialogue_line: That apartment never had any problems before. Are you sure the problem isn't you?

title: . Poor Upkeep
dialogue_line: We spoke with you the first week we moved in about things that you promised to fix.

title: . Poor Upkeep
dialogue_line: Where do you think you have problems?

title: . Poor Upkeep
dialogue_line: There is no hot water, the bedroom has a broken window, and there are rats in the kitchen.

title: . Poor Upkeep
dialogue_line: You know, no one else who has been in that apartment has had a problem before.

title: . Poor Upkeep
dialogue_line: You are obligated to maintain your building and my apartment.

title: . Poor Upkeep
dialogue_line: I will fix these problems when I get around to it.

title: . Poor Upkeep
dialogue_line: I will be withholding my rent check this Friday unless these problems are addressed immediately.

title: . Poor Upkeep

title: 41. Calling the Police about a Burglary
dialogue_line: Thank you for coming, officer.

dialogue_line: I was in school all day and came home to a burglarized apartment.

title: 41. Calling the Police about a Burglary

title: 44. Eviction Notice
dialogue_line: I received an eviction notice from you, and I don't understand what it means.

title: 44. Eviction Notice
dialogue_line: Well, you are behind in your rent; it's a 30-day notice to vacate.

title: 44. Eviction Notice
dialogue_line: You can't make me move just for being late with my rent.

title: 44. Eviction Notice
dialogue_line: You have been late with your rent several times now. I am filing suit for back rent to protect myself.

title: 44. Eviction Notice
dialogue_line: Are you throwing me out?

title: 44. Eviction Notice
dialogue_line: This notice is to let you know that you will be evicted by a sheriff if you don't make good on your rent.

title: 44. Eviction Notice
dialogue_line: If I catch up on my rent, can I stay?

title: 44. Eviction Notice
dialogue_line: You can stay if you catch up and stay caught up. Otherwise, I will find another renter.

title: 44. Eviction Notice
dialogue_line: I will go get the money right now.

title: 44. Eviction Notice
dialogue_line: Thank you. Please make sure that you pay with cash or a cashier's check.

title: 44. Eviction Notice

dialogue_line: You can keep the apartment if you stay caught up on your rent. Otherwise, I need to find someone who can make the payments.

title: 44. Eviction Notice
dialogue_line: I will go write a check right now.

title: 44. Eviction Notice
dialogue_line: Thank you. I will need a cashier's check or cash, please.

title: . Riding the Bus
dialogue_line: Do you like to drive the bus?

title: . Riding the Bus
dialogue_line: Not in the least bit.

title: . Riding the Bus
dialogue_line: I would have never dreamed of ever becoming a bus driver.

title: . Riding the Bus
dialogue_line: I never dreamed of doing this either. The only thing I like about it is the money.

title: . Riding the Bus
dialogue_line: It was really fun chatting with you.

title: . Riding the Bus
dialogue_line: It was really nice talking to you too.

title: . Riding the Bus
dialogue_line: Have a good one.

title: . Riding the Bus
dialogue_line: I'll have a good day once this day is over.

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: Do you realize what time it is?

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: I'm sorry, I lost track of time.

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: Do you honestly believe that that is a good excuse?

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: Not at all--that is what really happened.

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: How many times do I have to ask you to call if you're going to be late?

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: Yes, I know. I must've forgot.

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: That's beside the point, you still should have called.

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: You're right. I'm sorry.

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: Next time you come in late without calling, you're gone.

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: You're really going to kick me out?

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: Yes, maybe then you'll figure out how to follow the rules.

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: Actually, if you kick me out, your rules won't matter anymore.

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: Do you have any idea what time it is?

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: My bad. I didn't realize that it was so late.

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: Do you really think that that excuses your tardiness?

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: Of course not. I really did lose track of time.

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: Didn't I tell you to call when you're running late?

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: Yeah, you did. I just forgot to call.

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: It doesn't matter, you should have called and let me know.

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: That's true. My bad for not calling.

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: If you do this again, don't even bother coming home.

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: You're going to kick me out over this?

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: Exactly, maybe that'll teach you to respect my rules.

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: Well, if I'm not living here anymore, then I won't have to listen to your rules.

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: Do you know how late it is?

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: My fault. I didn't realize what time it was.

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: I hope you don't think that excuse lets you off the hook.

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: Not really. I'm telling the truth.

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: Haven't I asked you to call if you're going to be home late?

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: This is true, but it must've slipped my mind.

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: Regardless, all you had to do was give a call.

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: I know. I should've called.

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: Come home late one more time, and you'll find your stuff outside.

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: You want to throw me out over this?

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: That's right, maybe then you'll respect my rules.

title: . Talking with Angry Parent
dialogue_line: That's fine, because if I leave, then your rules won't matter.

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: Did you clean your room today?

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: No, not yet.

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: When were you planning on doing that?

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: I'm going to clean it up later.

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: Didn't I ask you to clean it up earlier?

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: I'm going to clean it.

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: I want you to vacuum in your room, and don't forget to dust everything.

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: I know. I'll do it.

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: Make sure you clean it up before you do anything else.

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: I'm not going anywhere until later, so I'll clean it then.

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: Have you begun cleaning up that room of yours?

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: I haven't started yet, but I will.

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: What time are you going to clean it up?

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: I'm planning on cleaning it up a little later.

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: I told you to clean it up earlier.

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: I know. I am still going to clean it up.

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: Make sure you vacuum and dust your room.

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: I won't forget.

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: I don't want you to leave until you clean up.

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: My plans aren't until later, so I'll clean it before I go.

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: Have you started cleaning up your room yet?

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: I haven't gotten started on my room yet.

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: When exactly do you plan on cleaning it?

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: I have every intention of cleaning my room later.

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: I thought I asked you to clean your room earlier.

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: I already told you that I'm going to do it.

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: Remember to vacuum the floor and dust everything.

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: I'll remember to do that.

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: Make sure that you don't go anywhere until you clean your room.

title: . Cleaning Up the Room
dialogue_line: I'll clean my room before I leave.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: Man, I'm so hungry! Can you buy me a burrito?

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: I don't have any money to buy you a burrito.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: Please? I haven't eaten anything all day.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: Look, I only have money to buy myself a burrito.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: I'm so hungry, I could eat a whole cow!

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: If you're so hungry, why don't you ask someone else for money?

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: I get paid on Friday, I'll pay you back then.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: Well, I guess on Friday, then you can eat.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: That's pretty messed up.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: Why don't you just go home and eat?

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: I don't want to go all the way home just to eat.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: Well, I guess you're out of luck.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: I really want a burrito! Can you get me one?

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: I haven't got any money to purchase a burrito for you and me.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: Would you please buy me one since I haven't eaten today?

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: I only have a few dollars.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: I could eat a horse right now, I'm so hungry.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: I want to eat too. Ask someone else to feed you.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: Since I get my check this Friday, I can give you your money back then.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: So then, this Friday you'll be able to eat.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: You're mean to say that.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: You should just go home and make yourself a sandwich or something.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: My house is too far, and I'm really hungry.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: It sounds as if you're going to continue starving.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: I'm starving! It would be truly appreciated if you bought me a burrito.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: I'm a little short. I don't have enough for you.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: I'm starving, as I didn't eat yet today.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: I really don't have enough money.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: My stomach feels so empty.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: Well, why don't you ask Bob for some money? I'm hungry too.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: I'll be getting money on Friday, and I'll get it back to you then.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: Okay, so on Friday, you can buy yourself something to eat.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: That's not nice.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: You can always go home and make something to eat.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: I can't go home yet, because I have things to do here.

title: . Buying a Burrito
dialogue_line: Sorry. That's not my fault.

title: . Caring for Puppies
dialogue_line: Did you feed the puppies today?

title: . Caring for Puppies
dialogue_line: Yes, I have.

title: . Caring for Puppies
dialogue_line: That's good! Just make sure to bathe them later.

title: . Caring for Puppies
dialogue_line: No problem. I can do that for you.

title: . Caring for Puppies
dialogue_line: Thank you! You know they have to go to the vet on Saturday?

title: . Caring for Puppies
dialogue_line: I know. What time do they go?

title: . Caring for Puppies
dialogue_line: Their appointment is at eleven o'clock in the morning.

title: . Caring for Puppies
dialogue_line: Okay, I won't forget.

title: . Caring for Puppies
dialogue_line: Have you given the puppies food yet?

title: . Caring for Puppies
dialogue_line: Of course. I fed them today.

title: . Caring for Puppies
dialogue_line: Good job! Please give them a bath later on today.

title: . Caring for Puppies
dialogue_line: Sure, I'll give them a bath.

title: . Caring for Puppies
dialogue_line: Thanks. But don't forget that they have a vet appointment this Saturday.

title: . Caring for Puppies
dialogue_line: I remember. What time do they need to be there?

title: . Caring for Puppies
dialogue_line: They need to be there at eleven in the morning.

title: . Caring for Puppies
dialogue_line: All right. I'll make sure and remember.

title: . Caring for Puppies
dialogue_line: Have you given the puppies anything to eat today?

title: . Caring for Puppies
dialogue_line: I fed them earlier today.

title: . Caring for Puppies
dialogue_line: Great! Could you please bathe them later?

title: . Caring for Puppies
dialogue_line: Okay, I'll do that later.

title: . Caring for Puppies
dialogue_line: Thank you! Remember that they go to the vet this Saturday.

title: . Caring for Puppies
dialogue_line: I know. What time is their appointment?

title: . Caring for Puppies
dialogue_line: We need to have them there at 11:00 AM.

title: . Caring for Puppies
dialogue_line: I got it. I will remember.

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: What's for dinner tonight?

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: It's whatever you're planning on cooking.

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: You're not going to cook?

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: No, I always cook.

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: Yes, and I love your cooking.

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: Don't give me that. If you're hungry, then cook dinner.

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: You're being serious?

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: Look, I'm really tired tonight. I don't feel like cooking dinner.

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: I'll make dinner tonight.

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: Thank you. I'm going to bed.

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: Do you want me to wake you up when dinner is ready?

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: Yes, please.

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: What are we going to eat for dinner?

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: Whatever meal that you plan on making.

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: I thought you were making dinner tonight.

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: I do all the cooking.

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: Your food tastes so much better than mine.

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: Save it. If you want something to eat, then make it yourself.

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: You really want me to cook tonight?

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: I had a long day today. I really am not in the mood to make anything.

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: No problem.

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: Thanks. I'm going to go take a nap.

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: Would you like me to come get you when the food is done?

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: Thank you.

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: So, what's on the menu for dinner tonight?

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: You tell me.

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: You're not going to make anything to eat?

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: You never cook. I always do.

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: I think you're a better cook than I am.

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: Oh please, you need to cook tonight.

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: So you're telling me that you want me to make dinner?

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: It was a hard day. Can you just do this for me tonight?

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: I'll cook dinner, don't worry.

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: I'm going to go rest for a little bit.

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: I'll come wake you when it's ready, okay?

title: . Cooking Dinner
dialogue_line: Thanks.

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: Have you washed any clothes yet?

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: No, I've only washed my whites.

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: When you wash your dark clothes, can you put some of mine in?

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: Sure. Is there any extra care that I should take with your clothes?

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: Just make sure you keep it on the gentle cycle.

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: How many clothes of yours do you want me to wash?

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: There isn't a lot, why, do you have a large load to wash?

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: It's really only a small load.

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: Do you mind washing my clothes?

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: Not at all. It's no problem.

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: Thank you so much.

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: It's no trouble at all.

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: Have you finished washing clothes?

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: I've finished my white clothes. I need to wash the rest.

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: When you do your darks, can you wash some of mine too?

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: I can do that. Is there a special way you want them washed?

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: They need to be washed on the gentle cycle.

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: Do you have a lot of clothes that need to be washed?

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: There aren't many clothes, is your load big?

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: My load isn't that big.

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: If it's a problem, you don't have to do it for me.

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: I can do this for you. Don't worry.

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: I greatly appreciate this.

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: Don't mention it.

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: Did you already wash your clothes today?

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: I've only washed my white clothes.

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: Could you wash some of my dark clothes with yours?

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: Is there any special care I should take with your clothes?

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: The only thing is that they have to be washed on the gentle cycle.

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: Are there a lot of clothes?

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: There aren't a lot of clothes, do you have a lot to wash?

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: It's a medium load.

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: You don't mind, do you?

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: No big deal. I'll do it for you.

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: Thanks a lot.

title: . Washing Clothes
dialogue_line: You're welcome.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: It's time for bed.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: I'm not ready to go to sleep. I'm not tired.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: It's quite late, and you have an early day tomorrow.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: I'm not going to be able to fall asleep.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: Why don't you try counting sheep?

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: I've tried that before. It really doesn't work.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: That's beside the point, you still need to go to bed.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: Why can't I just stay up until I fall asleep?

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: If I let you do that, then you're just going to be up all night.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: I promise I'll go to sleep soon.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: No, you're going to sleep now, so good night.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: See you in the morning.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: Shouldn't you already be in bed?

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: I can't sleep. I'm really not all that tired.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: You need to get some rest, as you have to get up early in the morning.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: It's impossible for me to get to sleep right now.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: Just close your eyes, and try not to think.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: That really does not work for me.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: It doesn't matter, you need to get some sleep.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: How about I tire myself out, and then fall asleep when I'm tired?

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: Then you're not going to go to sleep.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: Don't worry, I'll make sure and get to sleep in a little while.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: I want you in bed, right now, so sweet dreams.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: Fine. Sleep well yourself.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: Isn't it past your bedtime already?

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: I am not sleepy.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: It's getting late, and you have to wake up early tomorrow.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: There is no way that I can fall asleep right now.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: Try listening to some soft music.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: It won't work. I'm nowhere close to being tired.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: I really don't care, just go to sleep.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: What if I stay up and do something, until I get tired?

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: You'll be up all night if I let you do that.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: I'm going to get to sleep eventually.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: You need to go to sleep now, so go to sleep.

title: . Time for Bed
dialogue_line: Good night.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: Wake up, it's time for school.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: I'm so tired. Let me sleep for five more minutes.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: You have to get up and get ready for school.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: I know, but just five more minutes.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: I can't let you go back to sleep, because you won't wake back up.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: I promise I'll wake up, in five minutes.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: You still need to eat breakfast, take a shower, and get dressed.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: I realize that, and I can do all that when I wake up in five minutes.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: I don't want you to be late for school today.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: I'm not going to be late today.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: Fine, five more minutes.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: Thank you.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: Get up, it's time for you to get ready.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: Let me just get five more minutes of sleep.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: I would, but you need to start getting ready for school.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: I understand, but all I want is five more minutes of sleep.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: If I let you go back to sleep, I know that you won't get up in five minutes.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: Trust me. I'm going to wake up.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: You have a lot to get done this morning.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: I already know, and I'll take care of all that when I wake up.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: I want you to be on time for school today.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: I'll make it to school on time. Don't worry.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: I'll let you sleep for a little while longer.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: I really appreciate that.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: It's time for you to wake up.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: Give me five more minutes. I'm really tired this morning.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: I'm sorry, but it's time for you to get ready for school.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: I get that, but let me just sleep for a little bit longer.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: You're not going to get up in five minutes if I let you fall back asleep.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: Believe me. I will get up and get ready in five minutes.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: There's a lot that you need to do this morning.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: I understand, and it will get done after I wake up in five minutes.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: I would like for you to not be late for school.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: I'm going to be on time today.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: Go back to sleep then, but only five more minutes.

title: . Waking Up for School
dialogue_line: Thanks a lot.

title: Setting up a Bank Account
dialogue_line: How are you doing today?

title: Setting up a Bank Account
dialogue_line: Great. Thanks.

title: Setting up a Bank Account
dialogue_line: What can I help you with?

title: Setting up a Bank Account
dialogue_line: I would like to open a bank account.

title: Setting up a Bank Account
dialogue_line: What kind would you like to open?

title: Setting up a Bank Account
dialogue_line: I need a checking account.

title: Setting up a Bank Account
dialogue_line: Would you also like to open a savings account?

title: Setting up a Bank Account
dialogue_line: That's fine.

title: Setting up a Bank Account
dialogue_line: In order to open these accounts, you need to deposit a minimum of $50.

title: Setting up a Bank Account
dialogue_line: I want to deposit $300.

title: Setting up a Bank Account
dialogue_line: I'll set up your accounts for you right now.

title: Setting up a Bank Account
dialogue_line: Make sure to put $150 in each account.

title: Setting up a Bank Account
dialogue_line: How are you?

title: Setting up a Bank Account
dialogue_line: I'm well. Thank you for asking.

title: Setting up a Bank Account
dialogue_line: What can I do for you?

title: Setting up a Bank Account
dialogue_line: I need to open a bank account.

title: Setting up a Bank Account
dialogue_line: What kind of account?

title: Setting up a Bank Account
dialogue_line: I just need a checking account.

title: Setting up a Bank Account
dialogue_line: You can open a savings account, too.

title: Setting up a Bank Account
dialogue_line: All right. Open both.

title: Asking a Friend About Car Insurance

title: Asking a Friend About Car Insurance

title: Asking a Friend About Car Insurance
dialogue_line: What did you end up buying?

title: Asking a Friend About Car Insurance
dialogue_line: Well, my car is very old, so I didn't worry so much about what it would cost to repair it. I did buy a lot of coverage for fixing someone else's car.

title: Asking a Friend About Car Insurance
dialogue_line: Have you ever had to use your insurance?

title: Asking a Friend About Car Insurance
dialogue_line: I never had to use my insurance.

dialogue_line: What influenced your choice of companies?

title: Asking a Friend About Car Insurance
dialogue_line: I looked at the customer satisfaction rating of the company.

title: Asking a Friend About Car Insurance
dialogue_line: How did you figure out what services to buy?

title: Asking a Friend About Car Insurance
dialogue_line: Every individual has different considerations. Your agent can help you understand what you need to think about.

title: Asking a Friend About Car Insurance
dialogue_line: What did you place an emphasis on when you bought your insurance?

title: Asking a Friend About Car Insurance
dialogue_line: I carry a lot of liability insurance because I own a house and need to protect it from a lawsuit.

title: Asking a Friend About Car Insurance
dialogue_line: Did you ever get into an accident and need your insurance?

title: Asking a Friend About Car Insurance
dialogue_line: I was in an accident and was happy that I had good insurance to cover it.

title: Asking a Friend About Car Insurance
dialogue_line: What car insurance company did you decide to go with when you bought your new car?

title: Asking a Friend About Car Insurance
dialogue_line: State Farm seemed like the best deal for me.

title: Asking a Friend About Car Insurance
dialogue_line: How did you make that decision?

title: Asking a Friend About Car Insurance
dialogue_line: I compared rates and services available.

title: Asking a Friend About Car Insurance
dialogue_line: Where can I get help in figuring out what I need to purchase for coverage?

title: Asking a Friend About Car Insurance
dialogue_line: You can pick up a pamphlet at your insurance company that will explain the options to you.

title: Asking a Friend About Car Insurance
dialogue_line: What did you decide to cover yourself for?

title: Asking a Friend About Car Insurance
dialogue_line: I pretty much carry the average amount in all categories as the agent recommended.

title: Asking a Friend About Car Insurance
dialogue_line: How many times have you actually used your insurance?

title: Asking a Friend About Car Insurance
dialogue_line: I was in an accident, but it was the other person's fault and their insurance covered it.

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: I am interested in buying auto insurance.

title: Buying Insurance

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: Yes, I brought everything with me.

title: Buying Insurance

title: Buying Insurance

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: Wonderful. Let's go out and check to see what shape it is in.

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: OK, can you help me figure out what I should insure my car for?

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: I will look it up on the Blue Book list and we will factor in its condition.

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: What else do I need to consider?

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: Yes, you need to figure in liability for damage to the other car as well as injury issues as well.

dialogue_line: Yes, it is all right here.

title: Buying Insurance

title: Buying Insurance

title: Buying Insurance

title: Buying Insurance

title: Buying Insurance

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: We will factor in damage to the other car as well as property damage and injury.

title: Buying Insurance

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: We can take care of that right now. Do you have all of your paperwork with you?

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: Yes, I took care of all of that and have the papers with me.

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: Did you bring your car with you?

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: Yes, it is parked on the street.

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: Fine, I need to go out with you to check your car for wear and tear.

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: Fine, how will I know how much I should insure my car for?

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: After looking at your car, I will use the Blue Book price and we will consider the condition of the car.

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: Are there other considerations when I insure my car?

title: Buying Insurance
dialogue_line: We always need to think about property damage, damage to other vehicles, and injury.

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: I really like that car and I am thinking of buying it.

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
