title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: I already took care of that yesterday.

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: That's good. Have you discussed the price with the seller?

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: Yes, I think we've agreed upon a fair price.

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: Have you set up your financing to pay for this car?

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: Yes, my parents are going to loan me the money.

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: That's good. Would you like me to go talk to the seller with you and drive your car home?

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: That would be a great help!

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: Glad to be of help. I can't wait to see your new car!

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: That car is exactly what I want, so I probably should buy it.

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: From what I see, it's a good deal. Should a mechanic check it out for you?

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: A mechanic looked at it for me on Tuesday when I first looked at it.

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: It's good that you took care of that. Have you agreed upon a price with the seller?

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: Yes, he was willing to lower his price a bit and I'm good with that.

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: Do you know how you are going to pay for this car?

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: Yes, I have already pre-qualified for a loan with my credit union.

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: You are very well prepared! I could go with you to talk to the seller and help you get your car home.

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: I appreciate the offer of help!

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: It will be my pleasure to help you. I am looking forward to riding in your new car.

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: I think that that car drove really well and is a good deal.

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: It seems to be a good choice for you. You might want to have a mechanic take a look at it just to be sure.

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: My friend is a mechanic and he came and looked at it for me this morning.

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: That was smart of you to think ahead. Have you and the seller agreed upon a price?

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: Yes, he is willing to accept the price that I offered him.

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: Have you thought about how to pay for your car?

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: I saved up enough money to pay cash for this car.

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: You've really thought this through. Let me go with you to make the payment and drive your car home for you.

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: That would make it a lot easier for me.

title: Deciding to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: Let's go take care of that right now. I really want to see your new car!

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: Thank you for letting me test drive the car.

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: So do you think that you would like to purchase this car?

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: You know, I am not interested in purchasing the car right now.

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: What's the problem? We can at least sit down and maybe work out a deal.

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: Actually, I have several other cars to look at before I make my decision.

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: What didn't you like about the car? Maybe I can fix something for you.

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: It is a combination of things, but I appreciate your time.

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: I have some other cars you might want to look at.

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: Again, I appreciate your time but I will not be purchasing this car.

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: Give me a call if you change your mind. Have a good day.

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: I appreciate you letting me take the car out for a spin.

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: Why don't you come over here and we can work out the details of the purchase?

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: I don't think that this is the car for me at this point in time.

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: It's a great deal. Let's talk price. Maybe you'll change your mind.

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: This is only the first car that I've looked at.

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: Is there something in particular that didn't look good to you?

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: It isn't one thing in particular, but I think I can do better for my money.

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: I really think that you should reconsider.

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: Thank you again for your time.

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: Thank you for stopping by. Good luck in your search for a car.

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: I enjoyed taking the car out for a test drive.

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: Isn't that a great car? Let's work out the details of purchase.

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: I will not be purchasing the car today.

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: Why don't you take a second look at that car? You'll see that it is as good a deal as you are going to get.

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: I need to compare this car to others to make an informed choice.

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: You said on the phone that this is the kind of car you wanted. What has changed your mind?

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: I just really need to make sure that I get the best car for my money.

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: You know, you can look around but I just don't think that you are going to get a better deal for your money.

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: I will continue looking around for cars and will get back to you if I change my mind.

title: 4. Declining to Buy the Car
dialogue_line: OK, then. Have a good day.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: I was thinking about buying this used car, and was wondering if you would take a look at it for me to see if it has any problems.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: Sure, pull up over there and we'll take a look.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: I just wasn't sure what to look for.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: The first thing you do is look for any signs of wear both inside and out. We will also look at the body for signs of major repair.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: Someone told me that I could go online and see if the car is listed as having been in a major accident.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: Yes, that's right. Next, we will turn on the engine and I will check under the hood to look at the hoses and belts.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: Should we take the car for a drive?

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: Yes, but before we pull away, let's check to make sure that the radio, turn signals, lights, and seats all work properly.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: As I am driving what should I be checking?

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: You want to make sure that the brakes don't pull to one side and that the car has good alignment and acceleration.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: Thanks for your help.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: You are welcome. Enjoy driving your car!

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: Could you take a few minutes and see if there are any problems with this used car that I am thinking of buying?

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: I am happy to help. Just pull up and we'll give it a good look.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: I don't know much about cars.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: We need to look inside and outside for signs of an accident or major damage. Also, we need to look for wear on the tires.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: If I go online I can also check to see if the car has been involved in a major accident.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: Yes, you can check the history of the car online. Next, we need to turn on the engine and take a look at the belts and hoses.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: Will you take a drive with me to check handling?

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: A test drive would be good. But first let's make sure that the turn signals, radio, lights, and seats work properly.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: On a test drive, what should I look for?

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: We are checking for solid braking and good overall handling.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: I appreciate you helping me figure out what to look for.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: My pleasure. This seems to be a solid car and a good choice for you.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: I want to buy this used car, but I need help figuring out if there are any problems with it.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: I can help you with that. Drive the car over by the garage and we'll check it out.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: I know some things to look for, but I know there are other special things to look for.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: Always start with looking for signs of major damage that may have been repaired and also check tire wear.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: If the car has been in a major accident, that should have been recorded online.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: Right. All major accidents should have been recorded. Next start the car up, pop the hood, and we'll take a look at the belts and hoses.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: I would like for you to take a test drive with me.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: We'll do that in a minute, but first we should check that the radio, turn signals, and all of the lights work properly.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: As we drive, what am I checking for?

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: You want to make sure that the alignment is good, that the engine accelerates smoothly, and that the car can safely brake to a stop.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: I like knowing what to look for when buying a used car and appreciate the help.

title: 5. Detecting a Problem with the Car
dialogue_line: This car is in good shape and should give you no major problems. Enjoy it!

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: I am buying a used car and don't know much about financing it.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: I can help you. Do you have a down payment?

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Yes, I have saved up three thousand dollars for a down payment.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Good, because you will not be able to get a loan without putting some money down on the car.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: I don't know where exactly to get a loan.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Other than friends or family, you can go to a bank, credit union, or use the dealer financing if you bought the car off a car lot.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: What is the best choice for financing?

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: It depends. The worst financing deal is usually at the dealer, but they will oftentimes give you a loan when a bank turns you down.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: What do I need to have with me when I apply for the loan?

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: You will need a recent pay stub and a copy of the pink slip for the car. Before the loan is complete, you will need to show proof of insurance. Good luck!

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Can you help me learn about financing options for a used car?

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: I would love to help you with what I know. I am assuming that you have a down payment.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Yes, I already borrowed some money from my parents for the down payment.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: That will work. A bank or finance company will not loan you money without a down payment.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: I am not sure who will loan money to me.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: You can apply for a loan at a bank, credit union, or approach the used car dealer who sold you the car. You might also try family and friends.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Who offers the best interest rate?

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: A credit union will usually give you the best interest rate, but the dealer will almost always give you some type of loan.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Do I need any documents when I apply for a car loan?

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Be sure that you take a recent pay stub and a copy of the pink slip. You will have a few days to produce proof of insurance. Enjoy your new car!

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: I need help figuring out how to pay for a used car that I am thinking of buying.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: I would be happy to help you. Have you saved up a down payment?

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: I will be getting money from selling my old car.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: You really need that money so that a bank or finance company will loan you the rest of the money that you need.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Who gives loans out to people wanting to buy cars?

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Usually people go to a bank, credit union, or, if they bought the car at a car lot, they might use the dealer finance company.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: What is the best place to get financing?

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: The dealer will charge you a higher interest rate, but sometimes they are your only choice if you are just starting out.

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Will I need some documentation when I apply for the loan?

title: 6. How to Pay for the Used Car
dialogue_line: Just make sure that you bring them your last pay stub and a copy of the pink slip. You can then work on getting insured. Enjoy your new car!

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: I need to go to the DMV and don't know how to make an appointment with them.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: First of all you need to figure out if you really need to be there in person. Sometimes you can take care of your business at the Automobile Club or at the DMV website.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: If I do need to go in, how can I make an appointment?

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: You can either make an appointment by going online or by calling the phone number listed on their website.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: What if I just show up there?

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: If you have all day to wait and a good book to read, that might work for you.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: Is the DMV open on Saturdays?

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: Due to state budget cuts, the DMV is no longer open on Saturdays.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: I think that you have just convinced me to join the Automobile Club!

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: Yes, the Automobile Club takes all the pain out of DMV transactions!

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: How can I make an appointment at the DMV?

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: You could check the DMV website or see if the Automobile Club could help you. Many things can be taken care of without actually going in to the DMV in person.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: How do I make an appointment if I have to actually go in?

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: You have two choices. You can call them at the number listed on their website or you can contact them online.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: Can I just walk in and get help?

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: Without an appointment, you will be waiting for many hours. I would not advise it.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: Can I take care of this on a Saturday?

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: Unfortunately, the DMV is no longer open on Saturdays.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: It probably would be easier for me to join the Automobile Club.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: The Automobile Club has many benefits, and taking care of your DMV transactions is one of the best benefits.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: Can you help me figure out how to make an appointment with the DMV?

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: I would try to avoid going in to the DMV in person. If you are a member of the Automobile Club, they oftentimes can take care of things for you or you can try the DMV website.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: It would be nice not to have to go in but if I have to, how do I make an appointment?

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: The easiest way to contact them is online, but they also have a phone number listed on the website if you prefer to call them on the phone.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: What do they do if you just show up with no appointment?

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: That is not a good way to go. You could be left waiting for many hours and there is no guarantee that they will see you at all!

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: What about going to the DMV on Saturday?

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: For a while the DMV was open on Saturday, but not anymore.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: I think that the Automobile Club idea was a good suggestion.

title: 7. Making an Appointment with the DMV
dialogue_line: You should check out the Automobile Club. I think you would enjoy being a member.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: This car is exactly what I want!

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: I am glad that you like it. I've had good experiences with this car.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: So, how much do you want for the car?

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: Well, the price in the paper was five thousand dollars.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: Yes, I know, but I think that might be a little high for this car.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: I might be able to come down a little on the price.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: How about selling the car for four thousand?

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: No, that's way less than I could accept. However, I could accept forty-five hundred.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: That sounds fair to me.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: It's a deal then. Thank you!

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: I really love this car!

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: Great! I was hoping that it would go to a driver who appreciates it.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: How much are you willing to take for the car?

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: As I am sure you noticed, the price on the window is five thousand dollars.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: Don't you think you could come down a bit on the price?

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: You seem like a nice person. Maybe I could lower the price a bit.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: Would you sell it to me for four thousand?

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: I am thinking more in the line of four thousand five hundred.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: I'll take it then!

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: Perfect! That works for both of us.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: I am definitely interested in buying this car.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: Wonderful! It's good to find a person who really needs this car.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: What is the price for this car?

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: The price I listed on eBay was five thousand dollars.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: I was thinking that maybe you might be willing to lower the price a bit.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: You know I just got a good deal on my new car. I think I can afford to knock a little off of this car.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: I was thinking that four thousand would be a good price.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: I couldn't go that low, but I could sell it for forty-five hundred.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: That would work well for me.

title: 8. Negotiating a Price with a Student
dialogue_line: It's done then. I've enjoyed doing business with you.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: How much does this car cost?

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Well, come on in and we'll sit down and discuss that right now. How much do you want to pay?

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: I really was just wondering what the price is.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Well, figuring in tax, license, dealer prep, and registration, I can let this car go for fifteen thousand dollars.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: I was thinking a little lower than that.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Whoa! Let's keep talking here. I am sure we can work something out. What price are you thinking is fair?

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: I was thinking more like thirteen thousand dollars.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: You know, you look like you are a sweet kid. I'll give it to you for fourteen thousand dollars.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: That would be a good price if the car was in great shape, but it is registered as having been in an accident.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: OK, thirteen thousand seven hundred and fifty, and that's my final offer.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: If I want to buy this car, what will it cost me?

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Let me get my contract out, and we'll figure that out for you right now.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Can't you just tell me what it costs?

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: You know, I am prepared to offer you a great deal today on that car. With tax, license, registration, and dealer prep, the total will be fifteen thousand dollars.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Fine, I'll come back later with my father, who is a lawyer, and we can talk then.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: I am sure that we can work something out. What price were you thinking would be a good deal for you?

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Thirteen thousand would be more like it.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Fourteen thousand for this car is a good price. For that I am practically giving it away.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Normally that would be a good price, but that car has been in an accident.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Yes, I see your point. Thirteen thousand seven hundred and fifty is my final offer.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: How much money for this car?

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Yes, that car is beautiful, isn't it? Come on inside and we'll discuss the price.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: I just want to know the price.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Fifteen thousand out the door! What a deal! That will, of course, include tax, license, registration, and dealer prep.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: I appreciate your help, and I'll see you later.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Oh, you look like a smart person. What price would be fair to you?

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: I think that thirteen thousand would be fair for this car.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: I can see that you are a smart buyer. Fourteen thousand is my best price.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: If the car hadn't been in an accident, that would be a good price, but it has a few minor problems.

title: 9. Negotiating a Price with a Dealer
dialogue_line: Thirteen thousand seven hundred and fifty is my final offer.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Now I've decided to buy this car, how do I transfer the title to myself?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Actually, your best bet is to contact the Automobile Club or to go to the DMV website.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Basically, what will I need to do?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Both buyer and seller need to transfer the ownership by filling out a Change of Ownership form and signing over the Certificate of Title, which will be either pink or rainbow.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Will I have to pay any fees?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: All of the transfer fees are the responsibility of the buyer.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: How much will it cost to transfer the title?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: The DMV has a special formula that they use to calculate the fees. They will figure it out for you.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Do I need a Smog Certificate?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: No, only if your car was manufactured before 1975.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Where do I take my forms?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: You can take them to the DMV. You have ten days to complete the process.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: I don't really know all that much about the paperwork involved in buying a used car.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: If you are a member of the Automobile Club, they can help guide you through the process, or just go to the DMV website.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: What is the big picture of what I will need to take care of?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: The car has a pink or rainbow Certificate of Title, which both the buyer and seller need to sign. They also both need to fill out theChange of Ownership form.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Who pays the fees to transfer the ownership?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: The buyer must pay all of the fees.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Will it be really expensive to transfer the title?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: The DMV will calculate the fees for you when you submit the paperwork.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: What about a Smog Certificate?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: No, your car was built after 1974, so you will be fine.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Where can I turn in my forms?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: If you are a member of the Automobile Club, you can turn in your forms to them.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Can you help me figure out how to transfer the title of the car I wish to buy so it will be registered in my name?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: You can go to the DMV website for information or, if you are a member of the Automobile Club, they can be very helpful.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Can you just fill me in on what needs to be done?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: When you both fill out and sign a Change of Ownership form and sign the Certificate of Title, the ownership will be transferred.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Are there any fees involved?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: As the buyer, you are responsible for all of the fees.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: How much money will I have to pay to transfer the title?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: The only way to calculate the fee is to turn your paperwork in to the DMV, and they will figure it out for you.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Do I need to take the car in for a Smog Certificate?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: No, your car is a newer model, so you won't need one.

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Whom do I give my forms to when they are completed?

title: . Title Transfer
dialogue_line: Check online for special situations, but usually you can mail your forms in to the DMV.

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: Where is the best place to buy a used car?

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: I found my last one in an advertisement in the newspaper, but there are a lot of other places to look for used cars.

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: Besides an advertisement, what else could I do to find a used car?

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: Go to CarMax if you want to see the largest selection of used cars in one place.

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: CarMax has many car lots in many cities. For the one closest to you, check out the Internet or phone book.

title: . Where to Buy a Used Car
dialogue_line: You can get a good deal there. Especially at the end of the year, when students are selling things and returning home.

dialogue_line: Thank you, that helps me know what to do.

title: . At the Window of the DMV
dialogue_line: You look good in that picture. Take this over to the last window to pay your fee, and you've finished registering your car.

title: . At the Window of the DMV
dialogue_line: Could you help direct me to the proper window?

title: . At the Window of the DMV
dialogue_line: There are different windows for different things. Did you make an appointment on the Internet?

title: . At the Window of the DMV
dialogue_line: I made my appointment over the Internet.

title: . At the Window of the DMV
dialogue_line: Different windows will be able to help you with different problems. What do you need help with?

title: . At the Window of the DMV
dialogue_line: I need help transferring the ownership of a new car from my friend to myself.

title: . At the Window of the DMV
dialogue_line: The signed forms go in the box, and I will call your name in a few minutes.

title: . At the Window of the DMV
dialogue_line: Thank you for making it seem less confusing.

title: . At the Window of the DMV
dialogue_line: If you would give me your current Driver's License, I will be able to complete the transfer process.

title: . At the Window of the DMV

title: . At the Window of the DMV
dialogue_line: That is a great picture! Take the forms over to the last window to pay your fees and you're finished!

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: What seems to be the problem?

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Oh, my God! It's my stomach. It's killing me!

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Where does it hurt the most?

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Right here! It hurts right here!

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: How long has it felt like this?

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: I felt OK when I woke up, and then, suddenly, I had this really sharp pain.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Do you have a history of stomach pain?

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: No, and I haven't done anything out of the ordinary.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: I think that we are going to have to get you to an emergency room right away.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Thank you for helping me.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Can you tell me where it hurts?

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: I am so glad they called you. It feels like something is really wrong with my stomach!

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Does it hurt when I push here?

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: It's mostly on my right side. Right here!

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Have you been feeling this way for awhile?

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: I started feeling kind of sick last night after dinner, but this morning the pain got really bad!

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Have you eaten anything unusual lately?

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: No, not that I remember.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: We are going to take you to an emergency room right now.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: I will feel better when I know what the problem is. Thank you.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Where are you feeling the pain?

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: I can't stand up! My stomach is killing me!

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Can you put your hand where it hurts the most?

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: It hurts smack in the middle of my gut!

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Did this just come on suddenly?

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: I felt OK until an hour or so ago, and then I just doubled over.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: Have you exercised strenuously or played sports recently?

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: No, and I don't usually get a lot of stomachaches.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: We need to get you to an emergency room to see what the problem is.

title: A Medical Emergency
dialogue_line: I think that that is the best way to figure out what is causing this. Thank you.

dialogue_line: I am on my way. Give me ten minutes and I'll get to you.

title: Going to an Emergency Room

title: Going to an Emergency Room
dialogue_line: I want to be able to get to you when I get there. If you can unlock the back door right now, that would be great.

title: 5. A Toothache
dialogue_line: I just use a regular hard bristle toothbrush.

title: 5. A Toothache

dialogue_line: So what brings you to my office today?

title: 5. A Toothache

title: 5. A Toothache

title: 5. A Toothache
dialogue_line: It bothers me off and on, but it's gotten much worse these past few weeks.

title: 5. A Toothache

title: 9. Calling in Sick

title: 9. Calling in Sick
dialogue_line: I have really bad poison oak and can't stop itching.

title: 9. Calling in Sick
dialogue_line: How long have you had it?

title: 9. Calling in Sick
dialogue_line: I've had it a few days, but the rash really got bad last night.

title: 9. Calling in Sick
dialogue_line: How have you been treating it?

title: 9. Calling in Sick
dialogue_line: I have some lotion that the doctor gave me, as well as an antihistamine.

title: 9. Calling in Sick
dialogue_line: That should work. I'll see you tomorrow when you return to work.

title: 9. Calling in Sick
dialogue_line: I would like to speak with Ryan.

title: 9. Calling in Sick
dialogue_line: This is Ryan. How may I help you?

title: 9. Calling in Sick
dialogue_line: Ryan, this is Malia, and I am afraid that I am feeling a bit under the weather.

title: 9. Calling in Sick
dialogue_line: Do you know what the problem is?

title: 9. Calling in Sick
dialogue_line: I have a horrible rash from poison oak.

title: 9. Calling in Sick
dialogue_line: Have you had it a long time?

title: 9. Calling in Sick
dialogue_line: The doctor said that I probably have had it a few days.

title: 9. Calling in Sick
dialogue_line: Have you been using anything for it?

title: 9. Calling in Sick
dialogue_line: I bought some over-the-counter lotion, and I am taking an antihistamine.

title: 9. Calling in Sick
dialogue_line: That will probably take care of your symptoms. I'll see you tomorrow.

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: Is this Professor Clark's office?

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: This is Professor Clark speaking.

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: This is Kalia from your morning literature class.

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: Yes, what can I do for you?

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: I had a skydiving accident over the weekend and won't be able to come to school today.

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: My goodness! Are you OK?

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: I broke my leg, but it is healing.

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: How long will you be out of class?

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: I should be able to return by next Monday.

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: Fine. Well, thanks for calling and letting me know you will be absent. I hope you feel better soon.

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: Good morning, may I speak with Professor Clark, please?

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: You are speaking with Professor Clark.

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: Professor, I am Kalia from your morning literature class.

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: Yes, how can I help you?

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: I ran my car into a tree yesterday and need to miss a few days of school.

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: Oh, my God! I hope you are all right.

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: I have a concussion, but I will be OK.

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: How much school will you miss?

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: I only need to take this week off.

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: I appreciate you calling and telling me that you won't be in class. See you next week!

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: Is this Professor Clark?

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: Yes, I am Professor Clark.

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: Professor, this is Kalia, and I am in your literature class on Monday mornings.

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: Yes, how are you doing?

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: I was partying hard over the weekend, fell down the stairs, and need time to recuperate.

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: That sounds painful. Are you going to be OK?

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: I sprained my wrist, but the doctor says it will be fine.

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: How many days will you be out of school?

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: The doctor said I should be good enough to return next week.

title: . Missing Classes
dialogue_line: I am glad you let me know that you will be missing class. Get well!

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: I was wondering if I could get my test results from the other day.

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: Yes, I would like to schedule an appointment for you to come in and talk with me.

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: Is something wrong with me?

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: No, sometimes the test results aren't clear and we need to do more to get a clearer picture.

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: Can we talk about it now?

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: I would if I knew anything for sure, but I want to take a second look.

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: When can I come and see you?

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: You can come in this afternoon. If you would feel better, bring your husband with you.

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: Now I know that something bad is up!

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: Just relax. We will talk about it this afternoon.

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: The nurse said that you might have my test results in from the other day.

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: I would like for you to come in and talk about a few more tests that I would like to run.

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: Does this mean that you have bad news for me?

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: I just want to talk to you about the tests that I want to run.

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: Can't you just tell me now?

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: I don't know anything for certain. We always do a double check if there is a question.

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: I want to see you right away.

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: You can come in this afternoon. If you are feeling too stressed, feel free to bring a friend along.

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: I know for sure that something is wrong!

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: Don't worry about a thing; we are just taking a second look and talking.

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: The lab said that you would be getting my test results in today.

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: I want you to come in and discuss some further tests that I would like to run.

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: I think that this is a bad sign.

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: For now, I would like to run a few more tests to look into some of the problems that you mentioned.

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: Why wouldn't you tell me over the phone?

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: If there is any question about test results, we always do a recheck.

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: I need to come in right away.

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: I would be happy to see you this afternoon. If you are feeling upset, please bring a friend or relative along.

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: You are scaring me!

title: . Discussing Test Results
dialogue_line: Come on in this afternoon and we will talk. It will be fine!

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: I have a doctor's appointment scheduled with Dr. Smith, and I need to change it.

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: What day did you have it scheduled for?

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: My appointment was on Tuesday.

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: What time was it scheduled for?

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: It was for two o'clock in the afternoon.

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: I see your appointment. What day would you like to switch to?

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: I would like to switch it to next Friday.

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: What time would you like?

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: I would like to come in at 10:00 in the morning.

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: Fine, I will pencil that in right now. We will see you then.

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: I scheduled an appointment with Dr. Smith, and I can't make it on that day.

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: What day was your appointment on?

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: My appointment was on Monday.

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: What time had you chosen?

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: It was for 10:00 in the morning.

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: I am looking at your appointment right now. What day would you prefer?

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: I would prefer next Thursday.

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: What time would be best for you?

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: I want to come in at 2:00 in the afternoon.

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: I am writing you down for that time. We look forward to seeing you.

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: Good morning, I made an appointment with Dr. Smith, but I have to change it.

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: When you made your appointment, what day did you choose?

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: My appointment was on Wednesday.

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: At what time was that appointment?

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: It was for 4:00 in the afternoon.

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: I can see the appointment that you had. What day do you need to change to?

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: I want to change to next Tuesday.

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: What time would you prefer?

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: I would prefer three o'clock in the afternoon.

title: . Changing an Appointment Time
dialogue_line: I will put you down for that time. Thank you for calling to reschedule.

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: Professor, excuse me, but I need to leave early.

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: What seems to be the problem?

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: I am not feeling well.

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: What is bothering you?

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: I think I am beginning to have an asthma attack.

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: Would you like someone to walk you over to the Student Health Center?

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: No, I think that I should just go home because I have some medicine there.

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: Do you need a ride home?

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: I live in the dorms across the street, so I'll be OK.

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: OK, then, hope you feel better soon. Check your e-mail for missed assignments.

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: Excuse me, professor. I need to go home now.

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: Is everything OK?

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: I just feel funny.

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: What exactly seems to be the matter?

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: I have a terrible headache.

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: Do you think that you should go to the Student Health Center?

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: I already have some medicine at home if I could just get there.

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: Do you need someone to drive you home?

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: Thank you, but the bus stops right at my house.

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: Well, go home and rest up. Make sure you check the website for your assignments.

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: I am sorry, but I cannot stay for the rest of class today.

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: Why do you need to leave early?

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: I don't feel so good.

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: What doesn't feel right?

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: I feel as if I am going to be sick to my stomach.

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: Perhaps you should get checked out at the Student Health Center before you go home.

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: I have some medicine at home that I could take.

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: Are you going to be OK to drive home, or would you like someone to go with you?

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: Thank you, but my friend is in the library, and he can give me a ride home.

title: . Going Home Early Because Of Being Ill
dialogue_line: We hope that you are feeling better soon. E-mail me if you have any questions.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: The doctor sent me over here to have my blood drawn.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: Certainly, please have a seat and roll up your left sleeve.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: What is this test for?

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: Well, today your doctor wants us to check your white blood cell count.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: What does that tell him?

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: Well, if it is elevated, you might have an infection.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: Will the blood test hurt?

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: It is only a little pin stick. I am going to put a tourniquet on your arm to puff your veins up.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: Ouch!

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: There we go! I got the blood that I needed.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: My doctor says that I need a blood test.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: I can help you with that. Just have a seat and roll up your left sleeve.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: What are you taking my blood for?

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: Your doctor has requested a check of your white blood count.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: What information does that give him?

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: If your white blood cell count is off, it could signal an infection somewhere in your body.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: Is a blood test painful?

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: I am putting a tourniquet on your arm to plump up the vein. It will only feel like a little pin prick.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: My God, that hurts!

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: That was it! Thank you for coming in today.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: I came to this lab to have my blood drawn.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: You are in the right place. Roll up your left sleeve and have a seat.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: What am I being tested for?

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: Your doctor wants to know what your white blood cell count is.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: What does my white blood cell count tell him?

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: Usually if your white count is off, the doctor suspects an infection.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: How much will it hurt?

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: It is only a pin prick. I have to put this tourniquet on your arm to make the vein easier to find.

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: Is that my blood going into that tube?

title: . Having a Blood Test in the Lab
dialogue_line: That blood that just filled the tube is all that I needed. Thanks for coming in!

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: How are you feeling today?

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: I have a terrible cold!

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: Where do you think you picked that up?

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: A lot of people in my gym have it. Maybe I got it from the equipment.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: Have you taken anything for it?

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: I think that I am just going to rest and drink plenty of liquids for a while.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: Yes, staying rested and hydrated is really important.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: My mother also has this special potion with hot wine, cayenne pepper, and sugar that works miracles.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: You might want to ask the pharmacist for his suggestions if you get any worse.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: Yes, if my symptoms don't pass in a few days, I will ask for help.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: You don't look so good.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: I feel horrible. I think I picked up a bug.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: Do you know who you got it from?

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: A lot of people in my dorm are sick. Perhaps I picked it up there.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: Did you take any cold medication?

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: I've been taking vitamin C and zinc and trying to get some rest.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: I think that rest and liquids are what doctors recommend for a cold.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: My grandmother swears by hot chicken soup for a cold.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: A pharmacist might be able to help you if your home remedies don't work.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: Yes, if I get worse, I will definitely look for extra help with this.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: You look a bit under the weather.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: I am not feeling all the great. I think I have that crud that is going around.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: I know that it's going around the dorms.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: My boyfriend hasn't been feeling so well. Maybe he passed it on to me.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: I have some cold tablets if you would like one.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: Mostly, I feel like I need some rest and hot soup.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: Drinking liquids and getting rest is a good idea with a cold.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: My grandmother thinks that honey and whiskey is a good cure for a cold.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: You could always go to the pharmacy if it gets worse and you want suggestions.

title: . Having a Cold
dialogue_line: If things don't get better in a few days, I will look for some other solutions.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I need to make an appointment to see the doctor.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: What seems to be the problem?

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I have a rash that I need a doctor to look at.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: Do you have a fever with that rash?

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: No, it just itches a lot.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I have openings on Tuesday or Wednesday. Which would be best for you?

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I need an appointment on Tuesday.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: Fine, I am putting you down for 9:00 on that day. Would you like to see Dr. Smith or Dr. Jones?

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I would like to see Dr. Jones.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I can schedule you with him with no problem. We look forward to seeing you.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: Good morning, I would like to make a doctor's appointment.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: Can you describe your health concern?

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I have been having skin problems that aren't going away.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: Are you in any pain?

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: No. Except for the rash, I feel fine.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: Would Tuesday or Wednesday be best for you?

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I would like to come in on Tuesday.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I will write you in for that day at 4:00. You can see either Dr. Smith or Dr. Jones.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I would like to see Dr. Smith.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I will write you in on that doctor's schedule. See you then.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I need to come in and see the doctor.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: Are you scheduling a check-up, or are you ill?

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I have really itchy skin and think I may have to have it looked at.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: Have you been feeling any joint aches with that rash?

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: No, but I have a low fever.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I have times available for Tuesday or Wednesday. Which one would work best for you?

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I want to come in on Wednesday.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I can fit you in on that day at 10:00. Dr. Smith or Dr. Jones is available.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: I would prefer Dr. Smith.

title: . Making a Doctor's Appointment
dialogue_line: You can see the doctor of your choice then, and we will see you at your scheduled appointment time.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: Have you been having any problems lately?

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: No, but the nurse at school says that I should have my blood pressure checked.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: Do you have a history of high blood pressure?

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: No, I have never been told that I have high blood pressure.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: High blood pressure is called the silent killer because it hardly ever has symptoms.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: How do you check for high blood pressure?

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: We are going to use this cuff here, and it will give me a reading.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: What do the numbers mean?

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: They tell me how much your heart is working at rest and when pumping blood.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: Good. That will help me know how I am doing.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: How have you been feeling lately?

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: I've been feeling a little light-headed lately.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: Has your blood pressure been high before?

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: If I have high blood pressure, it is news to me.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: Usually people with high blood pressure have no symptoms, so we call it the silent killer.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: What do you use to check for high blood pressure?

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: I am going to put a cuff on you to get a reading.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: What does the reading tell you?

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: I get an idea of the pressure in your arteries when your heart is pumping blood versus at rest.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: I hope that the test results show me to be really healthy.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: Have you been feeling OK lately?

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: My coach wants you to check my blood pressure.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: Has anyone ever told you that you had high blood pressure?

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: I don't have any symptoms of high blood pressure.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: People with high blood pressure seldom know they have it, which is why we call it the silent killer.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: What test do you do for high blood pressure?

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: We will pump air into this cuff to get a reading.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: When you get the reading, what information does it give you?

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: It tells me how hard your heart pumps blood and how much your arteries relax at rest.

title: . Blood Pressure
dialogue_line: I am hoping that this test goes well for me.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: So, how are you feeling today?

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: I'm pretty tired. I haven't been sleeping well.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Do you have enough time to get the right amount of sleep?

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: I have enough time. I just can't seem to fall asleep and stay asleep.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: What time do you usually go to bed?

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: I don't have one time in particular. I just go to sleep whenever I feel tired.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Have you been under a lot of stress lately?

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: I just lost my job, and I am unsure about being able to find another one.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Have you ever tried doing relaxation exercises before you go to bed?

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: I haven't ever tried that, but it sounds like a good idea.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: How have you been doing lately?

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Actually, I haven't been sleeping well. I am kind of out of it.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Is there some reason why you can't get enough sleep?

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: I go to bed, but I just can't get comfortable enough to stay asleep.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: When do you turn in for the night?

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: I usually try to go to bed around 11:00 or so during the week.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Do you have a lot on your mind when you try to go to sleep?

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: My mother is ill with cancer, and I think about her a lot.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Do you ever meditate or read before bedtime?

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: I usually watch a lot of television before I go to bed. Maybe I should try something else to help me quiet down.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Has everything been OK with you lately?

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: I haven't been able to get a good night's sleep lately. I'm exhausted!

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Have you been too busy to get enough sleep?

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: I try to go to sleep, but I just can't stay asleep.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: How late do you try to go to sleep?

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: I go to bed when I finish my work.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Has anything in your day-to-day life been bothering you lately?

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: I am worried about how I am going to pay my tuition.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: You might consider listening to relaxing music as you go to sleep to clear your head.

title: . Not Feeling Well
dialogue_line: Doing something relaxing before I go to sleep sounds like a plan.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: Good morning, how are you doing today?

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: I have been feeling pretty good, Dr. Smith.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: So, I can see by your chart that you are here for your annual physical.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: Yes, I am playing on the tennis team this year, and they are requiring me to get a physical exam.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: We are basically going to check your heart, lungs, blood sugar levels, and eyes, ears, and nose.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: I've kind of been having problems being out of breath. Can you look at that?

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: Yes, I will check you for asthma, and maybe we can check you for allergies later.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: Thank you. What will the blood test tell you?

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: We will be checking for blood sugar, cholesterol, and white blood cell count.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: I have been working hard to stay healthy. I hope the tests turn out well.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: So how are we feeling today?

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: Things are going well for me, Dr. Smith.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: Am I correct in thinking that you are here for your annual physical?

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: Yes, I am applying for new health insurance, and I need a physical examination to qualify.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: Your basic physical exam will include lungs, heart, blood levels, and eyes, ears, and nose.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: I've been having a little trouble breathing. Would you look into that, please?

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: We can do an allergy test, and later I can send you for an asthma test.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: I would appreciate it. When you give me a blood test, what are you looking for?

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: I am going to check your cholesterol, blood sugar, and white blood cell count.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: I am expecting the tests to go well. I have been taking good care of myself.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: Nice to see you; how have you been feeling lately?

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: I have been feeling great, Dr. Smith.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: I am happy that you have decided to come in for your annual physical.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: Yes, I am going on a cross-country bike ride on vacation and want to make sure that I don't have any problems.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: We are going to look at your heart and lungs, do a few blood tests, and see that your eyes, ears, and nose are all working as they should be.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: I've been having trouble with congestion in my chest. Can you give me some tests for that?

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: I can do a chest X-ray to check for congestion.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: That would be great. What is the blood test for?

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: The blood test is for cholesterol, white blood cell count, and blood sugar.

title: . Physical Check-up
dialogue_line: I have been feeling great. I don't imagine that any of my tests will turn out badly.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: I need a doctor's appointment right away!

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: Is this an emergency?

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: I am having trouble breathing.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: Have you had a cold lately?

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: It has been going on for a few days now.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: You should hang up and dial 911.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: I don't think that this is that bad, but I need to see a doctor right away.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: Is there someone who can drive you to our Urgent Care facility on Sunset Blvd.?

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: Yes, I can get a ride to Urgent Care.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: Good. When you get there, a doctor will be able to see you right away.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: I need to see a doctor soon!

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: Do you feel this is an emergency?

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: My chest feels tight, and I can't catch my breath.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: Did this come on suddenly?

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: It started yesterday.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: If you feel this is a real emergency, you should dial 911 for the paramedics.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: I don't want to dial 911, but I want to see a doctor right now.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: Do you have transportation to our Urgent Care facility on Sunset Blvd.?

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: My friend can drive me to Urgent Care.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: That will work out well. Remember, if you have major problems, call 911.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: I have to see the doctor right now!

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: What makes you feel this is an emergency?

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: I feel like I can't breathe well.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: How long has this been going on?

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: It started last night.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: In the event of a real emergency, please dial 911.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: I know that I can dial 911, but I just want to go to the doctor now.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: In that case, can you come to our Urgent Care facility on Sunset Blvd.?

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: My family can bring me to Urgent Care.

title: . Seeing a Doctor in an Emergency
dialogue_line: Come in right away, and they will see you as soon as possible.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: I was told to come to you to get a chest X-ray.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: No problem. Just take your clothes off from the waist up and put the gown on, with the opening in the back.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Then what should I do?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: You will stand over here up against this plate.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Should I just stand naturally?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: You will raise your arms up shoulder high.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Is this all right?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Yes, you are doing great.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Where will you be going?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: I need to stand behind this shield. Now you will take a deep breath, hold it, and let it out.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Is that it?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: That's it. You can get dressed when the film is developed.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: My doctor said that I need a chest X-ray.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Just take your clothes off from the waist up and put this gown on, with the opening in the back.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: What should I do after that?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: You need to come over here and face this plate.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Am I standing the right way?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: I will need your arms raised to shoulder height.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Am I doing this the right way?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Everything you are doing is perfect.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Are you going to leave?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: I am just getting behind this screen. You need to take a deep breath, hold it, and then breathe normally.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Is that all there is to it?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: You can get dressed as soon as the film is processed. We will be all done here.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: I came here to get a chest X-ray.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: I will need you to take your clothes off from the waist up and put on the gown, leaving the opening in the back.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: What comes next?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: I will need you to face this glass plate right over here.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Should I do anything else?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Your arms need to be raised to shoulder height.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Is this OK?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: So far, so good.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: How come you are walking away?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: I am not leaving. I just need you to take a really deep breath, hold it, and then let it out.

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: Will I be finished then?

title: . Taking an X-Ray
dialogue_line: You will be able to put your clothes on as soon as I have checked the film.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I have been having a lot of headaches lately.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Have you been having these headaches for a long time?

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I have had headaches my whole life, but they have been getting worse lately.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Have you been under a lot of stress lately?

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I've been under stress, but no more than usual.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Have you been getting enough sleep lately?

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: No, I only sleep a few hours a night.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Have you had any head injuries lately?

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Yes, actually I fell skiing last week and hit my head.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I am going to send you for a CT scan, and I will see you again when we see the results.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I have been getting headaches almost every day lately.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Have you just started getting a lot of headaches?

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I never had very many headaches before, but the last few weeks I have been getting a lot of them.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Have you had any unusually stressful situations in your life lately?

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: My mother just passed away last Tuesday.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I'm sorry. How about sleep? Are you getting enough rest?

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I have been working really hard, and sleep has not been a priority.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Have you bumped your head or fallen lately?

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: No, I haven't hit my head.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I am going to send you to a neurologist for a few tests.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I have had some really horrible headaches lately.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: How long have your headaches been going on?

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I get headaches occasionally, but they have been really bad lately.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Any unusual amounts of stress in your life going on right now?

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I am getting ready to take my GRE.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Have you been able to sleep regular hours?

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: It has been hard for me to sleep with a bad headache.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Has anything hit you in the head lately?

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: I hit my head on a cupboard door a week ago.

title: . Seeing the Doctor
dialogue_line: Let's have you come back in a few days and see how you feel.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: How are you doing today?

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: I've been having trouble breathing lately.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: Have you had any type of cold lately?

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: No, I haven't had a cold. I just have a heavy feeling in my chest when I try to breathe.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: Do you have any allergies that you know of?

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: No, I don't have any allergies that I know of.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: Does this happen all the time or mostly when you are active?

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: It happens a lot when I work out.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: I am going to send you to a pulmonary specialist who can run tests on you for asthma.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: Thank you for your help, doctor.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
