dialogue_line: What brings you to my office today?

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: I've been getting really short of breath, and my coach wanted to have a doctor check me out.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: Have you had the flu lately?

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: No, I have been pretty healthy. I just have trouble taking a really deep breath.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: Have you ever been tested for allergies?

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: Peaches make me break out, but I don't have any other allergies.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: Does this happen all the time or maybe a little more in the cold weather?

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: I've noticed that it is worse when I am under stress, like during finals week.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: I feel that you should see a pulmonary specialist to check for asthma.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: I appreciate the referral, doctor.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: Good morning, how have you been doing?

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: I haven't been able to take a deep breath lately, and I need to know why.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: Have you had any type of bug lately?

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: No, I've been feeling fairly good most of the time. It just is hard to breathe.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: Has anyone ever told you that you have allergies?

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: No one has ever checked me for allergies.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: Does this happen more when you are under stress?

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: When the weather gets really cold, it gets worse.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: I am going to refer you to a pulmonary specialist who can run tests on you for asthma.

title: . Talking to the Doctor about Problems
dialogue_line: Thank you for pursuing this. I appreciate your help.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: What is that plastic cup for?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: Your doctor has requested a urine sample.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: Am I supposed to pee into the cup?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: We want what we call a clean sample. Urinate a drop or so into the toilet, and then stop the flow and urinate into the cup.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: Then what do I do with the cup?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: You put the cup in the little cubby in the restroom and close the door to the cubby.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: What is this test for?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: He is looking to see if you have a bladder or urinary tract infection.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: When will I know the results?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: Your doctor will call you in a few days with the results.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: Why are you handing me a plastic cup?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: Your doctor wants to test your urine and needs a sample.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: How am I supposed to do that?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: We need you to urinate like you normally would, and then stop and finish into the cup.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: What am I supposed to do with the cup when I am done?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: Leave the cup in the cubby in the restroom. Just close the cubby door and walk away.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: What kind of test is this?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: He wants to know if you have bacteria in your urine, which could signal an infection.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: How long will it take to get the results?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: We will send your doctor the results, and he will contact you.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: What am I supposed to do with this plastic cup?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: That cup is for a urine sample.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: How, exactly, does this work?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: This particular test calls for you to urinate into the cup after you have urinated a little into the toilet.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: When I finish, what should I do then?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: You need to leave the cup in the cubby in the restroom, and the lab tech will get it from the other side.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: What is my doctor testing me for?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: If there are bacteria in your urine, it could mean an infection somewhere.

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: Will I know the results right away?

title: . Taking a Urine Sample
dialogue_line: Your doctor will be contacting you with the results.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Doctor, can you give me some suggestions on how to stay healthy?

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Well, first of all, you need to make sure that you eat the right foods.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: What are the best foods to eat?

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: You should emphasize fresh fruits and vegetables, along with whole grains and protein.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: What should I avoid?

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: You need to avoid highly fatty and greasy foods. You should also avoid too much sugar and caffeine.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: What else is important to stay healthy?

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: You need to get plenty of exercise every day. If you smoke, you need to stop.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Is it OK to drink alcohol?

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Actually, studies have shown that people who have one-half a glass of alcohol per day do better than those who don't drink.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Doctor, what is the best way to stay healthy?

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Having a good diet is probably the most important thing.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: It is very confusing to know what to eat.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: You need plenty of fruits and vegetables, small amounts of protein, and whole grains.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Are there certain things that I should avoid?

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: You shouldn't consume too much sugar or caffeine. Also, watch your intake of fatty food.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: After watching my diet, what else should I do?

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: You need to stop smoking, and make sure that you get 30 minutes of exercise every day.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Can I have a glass of wine now and then?

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: As long as you don't overdo it, a glass of wine a day should be OK.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Doctor, what are some things I can do to stay as healthy as I can be?

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: You need to eat healthy foods and avoid unhealthy foods.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Sometimes I don't know what the best foods are.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Fresh fruits and vegetables are important, along with protein and whole grains.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: What things should I avoid?

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: You don't want to eat food that is high in fat. You need to avoid caffeine and sugar.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Beyond diet, what else can I do to be healthy?

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Getting 30 minutes of exercise a day is important. If you smoke, you need to stop.

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: How about having a beer on the weekend?

title: . How to Stay Healthy
dialogue_line: Less than a serving of alcohol a day can actually be good for you. Do not overdo it!

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: Is there a medication you can prescribe to help me with my problem?

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: There are various choices of blood pressure medication that we can try.

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: What is available?

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: We could start with Hydrochlorothiazide, which is a diuretic.

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: Are there many side effects?

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: There really are not many side effects. You need to drink a lot of water when you take this pill.

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: Is that the only medication I need to take?

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: It might be, but for a while I also want you to take an ACE inhibitor, Lisinopril.

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: What are the side effects of that drug?

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: You may have a little bit of a dry cough, but you will feel much better.

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: Can I get some medicine to help me?

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: For your high blood pressure, we have several choices of medications.

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: What types of drugs can I try?

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: Hydrochlorothiazide is a diuretic that helps with water retention.

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: What about side effects from that medication?

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: Most people have no side effects. You will have to make sure that you drink plenty of liquids with this medication.

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: Do I only need to take that one drug?

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: I am going to add a second drug for now, Lisinopril, which is an ACE inhibitor.

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: What can I expect when I take that medication?

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: You will feel much better except for the fact that you might have a little cough.

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: What about a medication to help me with my problem?

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: There are several types of medications that we can try for your high blood pressure.

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: What types of medications would be best?

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: For water retention, I am going to start you on Hydrochlorothiazide, which is a diuretic.

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: What are the side effects from taking that drug,

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: You need to stay hydrated on this drug, but most people experience little side effects.

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: Will that one medication take care of all of my problems?

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: For now I want you to take a second drug, Lisinopril, an ACE inhibitor.

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: Am I going to experience any complications with that drug?

title: . Prescribing Medicine
dialogue_line: The most you will experience will be a dry cough but you probably won't experience anything negative.

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: I was wondering if you could help me use the Student Job Center.

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: There are many ways; what kind of job would you like?

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: I want to work in a restaurant.

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: Fine! Will you need part-time or full-time work?

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: I want to work part-time.

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: Fine, the two best ways are to use our local listings binders over there or you can use the computers with the Internet job listing sites. See them over there?

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: Yes, I know what to do.

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: Well, in addition, you can schedule an appointment with a job counselor on this list. If you would like to do that, sign here, OK?

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: Yes, I think that would be great.

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: Fine, well the job search tools are all here for you to use. Feel free to look around and use what works best for you. Have fun with it!

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: Could you help me figure out how to look for a job?

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: We have lots of options, what type of job do you need?

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: I want to work in an office.

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: Do you want to work part-time or full-time?

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: I want to work full-time.

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: We have binders with local job listings or you can make use of the computers. OK?

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: I am confused a bit but I am sure that I can figure it out.

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: If you make an appointment with a job counselor, they can also provide you with a lot of information. Do you want to see a counselor?

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: No, I don't think I need to do that.

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: Well, you know that this job center is here for your use, so help yourself. Good luck!

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: What is the best way to find a job here?

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: There are different ways of conducting a job search. Do you know what you want to do?

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: I don't know.

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: Can you work part-time or full-time?

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: It doesn't matter right now, either one would be OK.

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: The binders have current local jobs listings and the computer jobs lists are good too. Understand?

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: OK, I'll go check it out.

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: Schedule an appointment with a counselor and you can get more information. Would that work for you?

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: I am not sure.

title: How to Find a Job
dialogue_line: Everything that you need for a successful job search is here. Happy job searching!

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: Could you help me try and figure out how to get ready for my job interview?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: The most important thing to do is to make sure you know the company and what services or products it provides. Do you know all about them?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: Yes, I pretty much understand the company.

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: Well, after you've done your research, you have to decide whether the company is casual or formal. Have you decided what they are yet?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: Yes, I've been observing them.

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: When you are choosing what to wear, keep all of that in mind. Have you chosen what to wear?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: I already have something to wear.

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: I would always be ready to go shopping with you! Should we talk about other basics?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: I am ready to think of other things.

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: You need to make sure you arrive on time, smile, be pleasant and friendly, look the person in the eye and answer all questions to the best of your ability. You'll do great!

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: I am not sure what to do to get ready for my job interview.

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: Make sure that you understand the company. Do you understand what it is that they do?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: No, I probably need to do some more research.

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: When you've finished your research it will help you figure out whether your company is rigid in philosophy or kind of more relaxed. Does that make sense?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: I think that their attitude is rather casual.

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: So all of that information will help you to pick out what to wear. Do you have something to wear?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: I have absolutely nothing so far.

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: I could go shopping with you sometime if you need it, but can we talk about other basics?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: Yes, where should we go from here?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: Focus on being relaxed and open, don't forget to smile and shake hands and be genuinely interested in what their company is about. I'm sure you'll do well.

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: What should I do to prepare for a job interview?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: An understanding of the basic workings of a company and the services or goods it provides is essential. Do you have that?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: Sort of, but I could know more, I guess.

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: With that understanding, you can figure out what your company is looking for in terms of basic attitude. Right?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: I think that they are a very formal company.

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: What you wear is important. So keep in mind what is suitable for the company and type of work you will be doing. Need help?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: I need a lot of help in this area.

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: In addition to clothes we need to think about other basics, OK?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: Yes, what else should we think of?

title: Preparing for a Job Interview
dialogue_line: Be prompt. Don't forget to be friendly and interested. Listen carefully and listen to what they are really asking you. You'll be a hit!

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: I am here for my job interview.

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: Fine, have a seat. May I get you some water or coffee?

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: Sure, thank you.

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: I'll get that for you right now.

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: Thank you. What a nice office this is!

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: Yes, could you come in now? I am going to take you back to meet your interviewer, Mr. Gotcha.

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: I have an appointment for an interview today.

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: Great, have a seat. Would you like some tea or coffee?

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: I'd love some.

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: The coffee area is right over there. Please help yourself.

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: Thank you. What a beautiful view from this office!

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: Yes. Oh, here comes Mr. Gotcha now. I'll show you to his office.

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: Good morning. I have an interview scheduled this morning.

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: The interviewer will be with you in a moment. Would you care for some water?

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: Yes, that would be great.

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: Just help yourself to whatever you would like from the table in the waiting area.

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: Thank you. This is a very lovely office building!

title: Greeting by Receptionist
dialogue_line: Yes. Why don't you come straight through the door and we'll walk down to Mr. Gotha's office together.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: Good morning, I am here for my interview.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: Hello, nice to meet you. I'm Mr. Gotcha. Have any trouble finding the place?

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: No problem.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: So why don't you tell me why you are interested in changing positions?

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: Unfortunately, our company is shutting down due to the economy.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: What would you consider your strengths?

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: I am probably best at researching for marketing purposes.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: What is your biggest weakness?

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: I tend to get bored easily and so love to keep myself challenged.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: We have a position where that could work out well.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: Thank you for taking the time to interview me.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: Hi there, I'm Bill Gotcha, the owner of Gotcha Enterprises. Did you find your way here OK?

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: Your assistant gave wonderful directions.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: Why are you switching jobs at this point in your career?

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: Our company is moving overseas and I wish to stay in the United States.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: What are you best at?

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: I am good at organizing systems that have been having problems.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: What is your biggest challenge in terms of skills?

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: I don't like to sit around and so like to always find things to do to keep myself busy.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: That is good to hear!

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: Good afternoon. Thank you for the opportunity to interview for this position.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: Hello, have a seat. I'm Bill Gotcha. I am assuming you found your way here with no trouble?

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: Actually, I am very familiar with the area so there was absolutely no problem.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: I am curious as to why you want to leave your current employer.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: I am interested in switching fields.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: Do you feel that you are exceptionally good at anything in particular?

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: I am good at pulling together teams of people to accomplish a task.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: What are you not good at?

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: I am impatient with myself at times and am hard on myself.

title: 4. Job Interview (1)
dialogue_line: We appreciate hearing that about you!

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: Good morning. Thank you for the interview.

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: No problem. Now, do you prefer working with others or flying solo?

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: Actually, I enjoy both.

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: So, what is most important to you in a job? Do you need job security or professional growth and a chance to advance?

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: I need job security.

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: Would you be able to relocate?

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: I am open to relocating.

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: What are your annual salary requirements?

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: I need at least 75,000 per year.

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: I'll keep that in mind. Thank you for coming in today. We'll be in touch.

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: Thank you so much for interviewing me this evening.

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: Happy to meet with you. Now, do you prefer group projects?

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: I like to work alone on some things and then bring those things to the group.

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: Do you value a steady job more or one that offers a chance to move ahead?

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: I want to grow in my job and move ahead.

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: Could you work for us in another state, if need be?

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: I need to stay in the area because of family.

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: How much do you need to make per year?

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: 75,000 per year.

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: Yikes! Thanks for your interest in this job. We'll be getting back to you.

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: I really appreciate the opportunity to interview for this position.

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: I was wondering if you like team projects, or projects that you work on alone.

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: I like to work on group projects that value and need each individual's contributions.

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: Are you most interested in a good steady job with benefits or one that will allow you to quickly advance?

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: I have children so a steady job is important but I would like a chance to advance.

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: How would you feel about relocating to another state?

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: I could not relocate in the next year, but might be open to it in the future.

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: Do you know how much this job offers per year?

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: A minimum of 75,000 per year.

title: 5. Job Interview (2)
dialogue_line: OK, well, that's all I need to know for now. If something comes up, we'll be contacting you.

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: May I ask you how much this position pays per year?

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: This job pays sixty-five thousand dollars per year.

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: What kind of benefits does this job have?

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: This job provides full medical, dental, and disability.

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: What type of vacation time do we get?

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: You get 3 weeks paid vacation that you may use as you wish.

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: Do we have a 401K?

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: We offer a 401K with some matching funds available depending on length of service.

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: What type of professional development do you offer?

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: We provide up-to-date training on state of the art equipment.

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: Where do I sign up for my benefits package?

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: Down the hall. I'll show you when the interview is over.

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: What is the annual salary for this job?

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: The annual salary is sixty-five thousand dollars per year.

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: What does the benefits package include?

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: This job pays for half of your medical, dental, and disability.

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: Do we get paid time off?

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: You have a total of 21 days paid time off which can be used for vacation, personal, or sick leave.

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: How about retirement?

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: We still offer a traditional retirement plan that pays out if you stay with the company for 5 years or more.

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: Can I get company provided specialized training?

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: We offer full tuition reimbursement for job related classes.

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: Where is the benefits office?

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: It's on the second floor in Suite 201.

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: What will I earn per year in this job?

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: You can expect to earn sixty-five thousand dollars per year.

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: Are we covered by a good benefits plan?

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: The job has a menu plan where you are given a fixed amount of money and you choose what you most need in terms of benefits.

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: Can we take personal days off?

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: You get 2 weeks paid vacation and an additional 10 days of sick leave.

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: What do you offer in terms of a retirement plan?

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: We do not currently offer any retirement plan.

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: Do you reimburse for education that relates to my job?

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: We allow several weeks release time each year for our employees to attend job-related seminars and conferences.

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: Do you have a benefits brochure?

title: 6. Asking Questions at an Interview
dialogue_line: Whoa! Who said you got the job?

title: 7. Accepting a Job Offer
dialogue_line: Is this Mr. Wallace?

title: 7. Accepting a Job Offer
dialogue_line: Yes, this is Mr. Wallace.

title: 7. Accepting a Job Offer
dialogue_line: Mr. Wallace, this is the Xenon Company.

title: 7. Accepting a Job Offer
dialogue_line: Oh, hello, how are you doing?

title: 7. Accepting a Job Offer
dialogue_line: Mr. Wallace, we were very pleased with your interview and would like to offer you the position.

title: 7. Accepting a Job Offer
dialogue_line: Wonderful! I am very happy to be able to join your organization.

title: 7. Accepting a Job Offer
dialogue_line: We are interested in having you begin as soon as possible, perhaps in two weeks?

title: 7. Accepting a Job Offer
dialogue_line: Yes, that would be perfect!

title: 7. Accepting a Job Offer
dialogue_line: We will see you then.

title: 7. Accepting a Job Offer
dialogue_line: Good morning, may I speak with Mr. Wallace, please?

title: 7. Accepting a Job Offer
dialogue_line: You are speaking to him, may I help you?

title: 7. Accepting a Job Offer
dialogue_line: Mr. Wallace, this is the Xenon Company calling to speak with you.

title: 7. Accepting a Job Offer
dialogue_line: Yes, good to hear from you!

title: 7. Accepting a Job Offer
dialogue_line: We are calling you today to offer you the job you interviewed for last week.

title: 7. Accepting a Job Offer
dialogue_line: That's great! I am looking forward to working for you.

title: 7. Accepting a Job Offer
dialogue_line: Would you be able to begin working for us in two weeks?

title: 7. Accepting a Job Offer
dialogue_line: I could begin working then with no problem.

title: 7. Accepting a Job Offer
dialogue_line: Welcome to our company; we will see you then.

title: 7. Accepting a Job Offer
dialogue_line: This is Jason Brack calling, is Mr. Wallace in?

title: 7. Accepting a Job Offer
dialogue_line: Yes, how may I help you?

title: 7. Accepting a Job Offer
dialogue_line: I am calling you from the Xenon Company.

title: 7. Accepting a Job Offer
dialogue_line: Yes, I was hoping to hear from you!

title: 7. Accepting a Job Offer
dialogue_line: You had great interview and we are pleased to be able to offer you a position.

title: 7. Accepting a Job Offer
dialogue_line: Excellent. I will consider it an honor to join your organization.

title: 7. Accepting a Job Offer
dialogue_line: Would two weeks from now be a good start date for you?

title: 7. Accepting a Job Offer
dialogue_line: That would be great. I could give notice to my current job and start with you on that date.

title: 7. Accepting a Job Offer
dialogue_line: Glad that will work for both of us; I look forward to seeing you then.

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: This is Ray. May I speak with Lee?

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: Yes, this is Lee speaking.

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: Lee. How are you today?

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: Oh, things are going great. What's up?

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: I was wondering if you could meet me tomorrow for lunch?

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: Sure! Where did you have in mind?

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: I was thinking of Joe's in the village.

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: I love that place. Sure, let's go there.

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: Fine then, I'll meet you around twelve.

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: I'll see you there. Look forward to it.

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: Good morning, this is Ray speaking. Is Lee in?

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: Hi, Ray. This is Lee.

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: Good morning, Lee. How is it going with you today?

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: Things are wonderful. What can I help you with?

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: Could we meet for lunch tomorrow to discuss the new project?

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: That would be great. What restaurant did you have in mind?

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: We could go to Lozano's downtown.

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: That would be perfect. It's a nice quiet place to meet.

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: I'll see you there around twelve then.

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: I am looking forward to meeting with you. See you then.

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: May I speak with Lee? This is Ray.

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: Lee here.

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: Lee, I thought that was you. How's it going?

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: I am doing well. How can I help you?

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: I would like to treat you to lunch tomorrow so I can get some suggestions from you.

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: Sounds like a plan. Where would you like to meet?

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: How about the new Chinese place next door?

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: Yes, that would work well for me.

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: I'll join you around twelve for lunch then.

title: 8. Talking on the Phone
dialogue_line: It's a go then. See you there.

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: Excuse me. I was wondering how to order office supplies.

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: We have a requisition form on the company web site. What type of supplies do you need?

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: I need paper, ink cartridges, and paper clips.

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: How quickly will you need your supplies?

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: I need all of my supplies right away.

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: We also will have to check your department budget. Do you know how much money you have for office supplies?

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: I will check to see what my budget is.

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: Would you like these supplies delivered or would you like to pick them up?

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: Please deliver them to my office.

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: Fine, well just send the form to us and we will let you know as soon as your supplies come in. Have a good day!

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: Thank you!

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: I need help in ordering my office supplies.

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: You can print out a copy of the Order Supply Form from our company web site and turn it into me. What will you be needing?

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: I need ink cartridges, staples, and Post-its.

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: Will you need all of them right away or can some wait?

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: Some of these can wait but there are a few things that I need right away.

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: You can only buy supplies that you have a budget for. Do you know what your budget is?

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: We have plenty of money for office supplies.

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: You can pick these supplies up or they can be delivered to your building. Which would you prefer?

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: I want to pick them up.

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: Well, just finish the request and we will contact you when the supplies come in. Have a good day!

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: You too!

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: How do I order the office supplies that I need?

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: Fill out this form with whatever you need. What do you need the most?

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: I need many things.

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: I can get a few of them right away, but might have to order some.

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: I can wait a few days for these items.

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: Make sure that you have money allocated for these supplies. How much do you have for office supplies?

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: I don't think we have very much money for supplies, but we have a little.

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: Would you like them delivered to you or can you come get them here?

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: I am not sure yet.

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: When you finish completing the request form, we will order and let you know when the supplies are here. Have a great day!

title: 9. Making a Request for Office Supplies
dialogue_line: Good-bye!

title: . Offering Help
dialogue_line: I was wondering if you need any help on your new project.

title: . Offering Help
dialogue_line: Sure! That would be great! Are you good at writing or would you rather do the computer work?

title: . Offering Help
dialogue_line: I would like to help with the computer work.

title: . Offering Help
dialogue_line: Great! We are going to be working in teams of three. Are you OK working with others?

title: . Offering Help
dialogue_line: Yes, I like working like that.

title: . Offering Help
dialogue_line: We will begin next Monday. Would you be available then?

title: . Offering Help
dialogue_line: Yes, I can be there.

title: . Offering Help
dialogue_line: Well, if you could send me your basic background information before next Monday, it would be useful.

title: . Offering Help
dialogue_line: I will send the information to you.

title: . Offering Help
dialogue_line: Well then, thanks for your help. Have a great day!

title: . Offering Help
dialogue_line: Would you like me to help you on your new project?

title: . Offering Help
dialogue_line: I would love the help! Would you prefer helping with the writing part or is programming more your thing?

title: . Offering Help
dialogue_line: I would enjoy helping with the writing portion.

title: . Offering Help
dialogue_line: Perfect! You'll be working alone on that portion. Do you like to work alone?

title: . Offering Help
dialogue_line: That is OK sometimes.

title: . Offering Help
dialogue_line: Our first meeting is next Monday. Could you meet with us at that time?

title: . Offering Help
dialogue_line: No, I can't be there.

dialogue_line: Please send me your background information before the meeting so I can look at it.

title: . Offering Help

title: . Offering Help
dialogue_line: OK. I look forward to working with you. Enjoy your week!

title: . Offering Help

title: . Offering Help

title: . Offering Help

title: . Offering Help

title: . Offering Help
dialogue_line: I am not sure yet.

title: . Offering Help

title: . Offering Help

title: . Offering Help

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: Can you help me plan the office party?

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: Sure. What do you need the most help with, the food or entertainment?

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: I need help with food.

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: OK, well, let's coordinate our efforts. Should this party be formal or casual?

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: I think it should be casual.

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: I agree. Next, we have to decide on food. We have a choice of Chinese or Continental Cuisine. Which one should we have?

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: I would prefer Chinese food for this party.

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: Perfect choice. For music, should we have a live band or a DJ?

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: I think we should hire a live band.

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: OK then. Well, I will work on my part and get back to you with my progress on Friday.

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: I need help with the office party.

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: Yes, of course. We could split it. What part would you like to do, the food or the entertainment?

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: I have no idea what the entertainment should be.

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: Let's make sure we are on the same page. Do we want a formal or informal gathering?

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: Let's make it a formal affair.

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: Yes, that would be best. Now, for food should we have Chinese or American food?

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: American food would be the best choice.

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: That would be great. What kind of music would you like, a band or recorded music?

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: We should bring in a really good DJ.

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: That works for me. Let's see what we can each do about planning our part and meet again on Friday.

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: Would you help me figure out what to do about the office party?

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: I would be happy to help. What would you like me to help with, food or entertainment?

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: I would like to help you with both.

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: That will work out fine. To make sure everything goes together, do you think this party should be casual or dressy?

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: A dressy party would be fun!

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: That will work out fine. Do you think that Chinese or Continental food would be best?

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: We should probably have both.

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: Yes, that will work out fine. Should we hire a band or bring in a DJ?

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: Maybe we could do both!

title: . Asking for Help
dialogue_line: Everything sounds great then! I'll meet you back here on Friday to discuss the details.

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: Is there anything I can help?

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: Yes, thank you. I am really far behind on this project. Could you help me with the extra typing or xeroxing?

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: I can do either one.

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: Good. That would be very helpful. Can you start with those pages over there?

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: No problem.

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: Thank you very much! How long have you been working here?

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: I have been working here for 5 years.

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: Well, we have some special projects coming up. Would you be interested in working on any of those?

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: Yes, I would love to work on a special project!

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: Well then, I'll keep you in the loop. Thank you for your help today.

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: Do you need any help?

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: I need some help catching up. Are you good at typing or could you help me xerox?

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: I like xeroxing.

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: Thank you! There are papers on the table to start with.

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: That would be OK.

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: I really appreciate the help. How many years have you been with the company?

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: I just started working here.

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: I have a special assignment coming up. Would you be interested in helping me on it?

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: I'd like to, but I am very busy.

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: I'll make sure that management keeps you in mind for special projects in the future. Thanks for the help!

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: What can I do to help you?

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: I have some extra help with my project. What would you prefer to help me with, typing or xeroxing?

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: I could do some typing for you.

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: That is very kind of you to offer to do that. Can you start with the pages on the table?

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: That would be a good place to start.

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: I like your positive attitude. How many years have you been employed here?

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: I have worked here long time.

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: I'm not sure. Let me think about it.

title: . Responding to a Plea for Help
dialogue_line: OK. I will mention how great you were about helping me today. I appreciate your help.

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: Can you help me with my timesheet?

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: Sure! I can help you. Do you know where the timesheets are kept?

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: No, I don't know where to find one.

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: Well, once you get one off the shelf over there, you first put your name on it. OK?

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: Yes, I can do that.

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: Now you have to fill in the hours in the blanks and total the hours for the week. Do you know how to use military time?

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: No, I don't know what that is.

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: OK, so we just start counting hours at midnight and record it. Show all minutes as a dot and then write how many minutes. OK?

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: Yes, I understand how to do this.

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: After you total your hours, make sure you sign it and turn it in to your supervisor.

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: That was easy!

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: Good luck and let me know if you need any help later on.

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: How do we do timesheets here?

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: They are actually fairly straightforward. Do you know where the blanks are kept?

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: Yes, I already have one.

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: OK, well after you take one out of that second drawer, you put your name on the top. Do you see?

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: I am kind of confused.

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: Next you fill in all of your hours for each day and total them. Do you know how to show time on a 24-hour clock?

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: I'm not quite sure.

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: Midnight is zero and when you put the minutes in, make sure that you show them with a dot followed by the minutes. Do you understand?

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: No, I have no idea what you are talking about.

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: It's easy, just write in the hours, total it, sign it, and put it in the box.

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: Thanks for your help.

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: Try it and if you can't do it, one of us can always help you later.

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: I need help with my timesheet.

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: OK, no problem. Have you found the blank ones?

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: Yes, I have seen them.

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: Yes, well put your name on it after you have downloaded it off the company website. OK?

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: Yes, I understand what to do.

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: You fill in the hours and total them for the week. Have you ever used a 24 hour clock?

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: What? Huh?

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: So after you noted the hours, starting at zero which is midnight, you just write down the minutes as a dot followed by minutes. Get it?

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: Huh? What?

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: Just make sure you show your total, sign it, and turn it in.

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: I thought you said this was easy.

title: . How to Do a Timesheet
dialogue_line: You are a quick learner. I don't think you'll have any trouble with this.

title: . Making a Phone Call
dialogue_line: I need help figuring out how to use this phone.

title: . Making a Phone Call
dialogue_line: Sure. First you pick up the receiver and hit one of the first 3 buttons. Do you hear a tone?

title: . Making a Phone Call
dialogue_line: Yes, I hear the tone.

title: . Making a Phone Call
dialogue_line: OK. Now you dial 9 on the keypad. Do you hear the tone change?

title: . Making a Phone Call
dialogue_line: Yes, it changed.

title: . Making a Phone Call
dialogue_line: Well, when you hear it change, that means you have an outside line. Where are you trying to call?

title: . Making a Phone Call
dialogue_line: I am trying to call home.

title: . Making a Phone Call
dialogue_line: OK. Well, to dial to the outside you just now dial the number. For a call inside the company just hit the extension number. Do you know the extensions?

title: . Making a Phone Call
dialogue_line: Yes, I have a list of extensions.

title: . Making a Phone Call
dialogue_line: Well, if you ever need help with an extension, you can dial O.

title: . Making a Phone Call
dialogue_line: Can you show me how to use this phone?

title: . Making a Phone Call
dialogue_line: Yes, I can help you with that. Pick up the receiver and hit one of the buttons. Do you hear a tone?

title: . Making a Phone Call
dialogue_line: No, I don't hear anything.

title: . Making a Phone Call

title: . Making a Phone Call
dialogue_line: I'm not sure.

title: . Making a Phone Call
dialogue_line: OK. Well, after you get the line to change you have an outside line. Who are you trying to call?

title: . Making a Phone Call
dialogue_line: I am trying to call a client.

dialogue_line: To call a number on the outside you now just dial the number. For inside calls, punch in the extension number. Has someone given you an extension list?

dialogue_line: All of the extensions are listed on the wall chart over there if you ever need help.

dialogue_line: I want to make a phone call. Can you show me how?

title: . Making a Phone Call
dialogue_line: Of course, pick up the receiver, hit a button and listen for a tone. Are you hearing it?

title: . Making a Phone Call
dialogue_line: Yes, now what do I do?

title: . Making a Phone Call
dialogue_line: Well, after you dial 9 on the keypad, you should hear the tone change.

title: . Making a Phone Call
dialogue_line: No, nothing changed.

title: . Making a Phone Call
dialogue_line: When you dial 9 and hear the tone change it means you have an outside line. Who are you trying to call?

title: . Making a Phone Call
dialogue_line: I am trying to call my boss.

title: . Making a Phone Call
dialogue_line: For an outside call you now just dial the number. For a company number you need to know the extension. Do you have a list of extensions?

title: . Making a Phone Call
