title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: I would like to make an appointment for a project meeting.

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: Of course, I have Monday or Tuesday available. What day would be best for you?

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: I would like to meet on Monday.

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: Very well then. Are mornings or afternoons best?

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: I want to come in the morning.

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: I will have my assistant check my calendar and get back to you with the exact time. Can you bring me an outline of the project when you come?

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: Yes, I can bring the outline when I come to the meeting.

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: Do you think that we should include the entire committee in the meeting or just our sub-committee?

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: I think that we should have just the sub-committee.

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: OK then, I will make the arrangements for them to attend. Do you know how to get there?

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: No, I need directions, please.

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: Fine, we will make sure that we send you all of the information that you need. See you there!

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: Could I meet with you to discuss the project?

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: Good idea. We could meet on Monday or Tuesday. Which day would you prefer?

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: Tuesday would be good for me.

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: OK. Do you think we should meet in the morning or in the afternoon?

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: I think the afternoon would be best.

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: That will work out. I will e-mail the exact time tomorrow. I need you to bring your plans with you.

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: Yes, I will bring my plans with me to the meeting.

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: Should we invite the whole committee or should we just have the sub-committee there?

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: I feel that the whole committee needs to be there.

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: Yes, I agree. We'll make sure that they get notified. Can you find the meeting place?

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: Yes, I know how to get there on my own.

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: Great! We will send you all the details later. Looking forward to meeting with you!

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: When could we meet to discuss the project?

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: I will be available on Monday or Tuesday. Choose which day is best for you.

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: I prefer Monday.

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: Good. Can you come in the morning or would afternoon be best?

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: Either one is OK.

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: Great! When I check with the others, I will send you an exact time. When you come, be prepared to do your presentation.

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: I will be prepared to do my presentation.

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: Who would you like to see there? Just the sub-committee or should we ask the whole committee?

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: Everyone needs to be there.

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: That will probably be best. Do you need help with directions?

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: I think I know where it is. Maybe you could send me directions just to make sure.

title: . Making an Appointment for a Meeting
dialogue_line: OK. We will e-mail you all the information you need tomorrow. Have a good day!

title: . Rearranging an Appointment
dialogue_line: I had an appointment tomorrow and I need to change it to a different date.

title: . Rearranging an Appointment
dialogue_line: Certainly, what day would be best for you?

title: . Rearranging an Appointment
dialogue_line: I think that Monday or Tuesday would be good for me.

title: . Rearranging an Appointment
dialogue_line: I can give you Monday; I have ten or eleven in the morning.

title: . Rearranging an Appointment
dialogue_line: I think ten o'clock is best.

title: . Rearranging an Appointment
dialogue_line: Fine, I'll put you down for that.

title: . Rearranging an Appointment
dialogue_line: That would be great!

title: . Rearranging an Appointment
dialogue_line: Happy I could help you; see you then!

title: . Rearranging an Appointment
dialogue_line: I was wondering if I could reschedule my appointment to a later date?

title: . Rearranging an Appointment
dialogue_line: OK, just tell me what day would be best for your appointment.

title: . Rearranging an Appointment
dialogue_line: Wednesday or Thursday would be perfect.

title: . Rearranging an Appointment
dialogue_line: Thursday is available; would ten or eleven be best?

title: . Rearranging an Appointment
dialogue_line: I would love to have an eleven o'clock appointment.

title: . Rearranging an Appointment
dialogue_line: Great, I'll just add you in, if that works.

title: . Rearranging an Appointment
dialogue_line: Perfect, I appreciate that.

title: . Rearranging an Appointment
dialogue_line: So happy that we had an opening for you.

title: . Rearranging an Appointment
dialogue_line: I can't make my appointment and need to make another one.

title: . Rearranging an Appointment
dialogue_line: That's OK, we can reschedule it if you tell me what day works for you.

title: . Rearranging an Appointment
dialogue_line: Friday, Saturday, or Sunday would be good for me.

title: . Rearranging an Appointment
dialogue_line: I can give you Friday; would you prefer ten or eleven?

title: . Rearranging an Appointment
dialogue_line: Ten o'clock is perfect.

title: . Rearranging an Appointment
dialogue_line: Well, in that case, I'll just write you in.

title: . Rearranging an Appointment
dialogue_line: Thanks. That will work out well.

title: . Rearranging an Appointment
dialogue_line: It was my pleasure to have been able to make it work.

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: Excuse me for being late to work.

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: Where have you been?

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: My car broke down.

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: That's too bad. Please try to fix it so that it doesn't happen again.

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: Yes, I'll work on it.

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: Thank you, have a seat. We are working on the new project

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: Great! Fill me in.

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: Let's take a look at the Campbell Project.

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: I don't understand the projected revenues.

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: Let's take another look at it for those of you who don't understand.

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: I am sorry I am so late to work.

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: What was the problem?

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: I lost track of time.

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: Things happen; make sure it doesn't become a habit.

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: It won't happen again.

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: All right, please take this message and call this client.

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: No problem.

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: Now does everyone understand the diagram on the board?

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: Yes, I understand the numbers.

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: I will explain it again; especially for those of you who arrived late.

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: I lost track of time, am I late?

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: Yes. What kept you from arriving on time?

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: My friend needed me to help him.

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: I realize that everyone has emergencies; just get here on time from now on.

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: My apologies.

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: I appreciate you saying that and would like you to join us in our meeting.

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: Sure, I'll sit right here.

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: Wonderful, does anyone have any questions about this project?

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: I am confused about the projected revenues.

title: . Giving an Excuse for Being Late to Work
dialogue_line: I'm glad that some of you get it, but let's go over it once more.

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: So tell me again, why couldn't you get the supplies I ordered?

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: Well I ordered them when you asked, but the supplier said they might need to back order them.

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: When do you think they will finally arrive?

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: I think maybe by Tuesday.

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: If they don't arrive by then, what are our options?

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: I could try another supplier down the street.

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: That would work for me.

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: OK, I will stay on it and let you know how it's going.

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: Thank you for taking care of the problem.

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: Thank you for your business. We appreciate you as a client.

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: You promised me the supplies would be in today and now you say they aren't here?

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: They said they had part of the order, but the rest won't be available until later.

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: I guess that's it then, when will you be able to get the rest?

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: I am not sure.

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: I am not convinced that will work for me, what now?

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: I could order them from another supplier as a back-up.

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: That is a good plan.

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: Good! I will call you later this afternoon and let you know when your supplies will arrive.

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: I appreciate you staying on it.

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: We appreciate your business and aim to please.

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: I really needed the supplies today and you are telling me you don't have them?

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: The supplier said that it will be a few more days until they can ship the order.

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: Fine, what day will the whole order be here?

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: If we are lucky, they may get here tomorrow.

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: Is there anywhere else we can get these supplies?

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: Let's order the missing items from someone else just to be sure.

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: I appreciate that suggestion.

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: I will track your order on the internet and e-mail you the moment it arrives.

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: I look forward to hearing from you.

title: . Accepting Excuses for Not Meeting Commitments
dialogue_line: Please let me know if there is anything else I can do for you in the meantime.

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: What does she look like?

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: Well, she was pretty tall, about 5 feet 10 inches and kind of scary looking!

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: What do you mean, scary?

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: Well, she had a crazy sounding laugh and wild hair. Do you know what I mean?

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: Yes, I know what you mean.

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: And her piercing eyes! She looked like an alien who just came down from outer space. Do you believe that people from outer space live amongst us?

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: No, that's impossible!

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: Unless they beam us up for a ride, we will never know for sure. Have you ever thought that you saw a flying saucer?

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: Are you crazy?

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: Hah, I guess we never know what can happen. Do you like Star Wars movies?

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: Yes, I have seen all of the Star Wars movies.

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: I loved Star Wars movies. My favorite character was Yoda. What about you?

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: I liked Darth Vader.

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: Yeah, that character was pretty cool. If you had to describe that character, what would you say about them?

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: They were very beautiful.

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: Yeah, I know what you mean!

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: Can you describe her for me?

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: She was large, hairy, and scary!

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: What are you talking about?

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: When she laughed, it sent chills up my spine. Have you ever met someone like that?

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: Yes, one time I met someone like that.

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: She had eyes like laser beams. Sometimes I wonder if aliens from UFOs live here with us. Do you think that's possible?

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: Sure, I think it could happen.

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: I guess it's impossible to say for sure unless you go for a ride in one. Do you think that would be an interesting experience?

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: No, I never want to be near a UFO!

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: Well, you will probably never see one. Have you seen any Star Wars movies?

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: No, I haven't seen any Star Wars movies.

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: Star Wars was the best. I really like Darth Vader. Do you have a favorite character?

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: I like Luke Skywalker.

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: Oh yeah, I forgot about that character! What words do you think would best describe that character?

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: He looked like a black vacuum cleaner.

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: I totally agree!

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: How does she look?

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: I am not sure how tall she was but she was very scary!

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: Is this a joke?

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: Oh my god, you should have seen her! She looked like she had just crawled out from underneath something. Do you get what I am saying?

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: No, I have no idea what you are talking about.

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: Oh man, her eyes were the most incredible glowing green. She might be a Martian or something. Do you think that is possible?

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: Yes, I believe in UFOs.

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: I've never seen a UFO but I would like to. How about you?

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: Yes, I think that seeing a UFO would be fascinating.

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: Personally, I've never seen one. I think is would be fun to see the universe like in a Star Wars movie. Have you seen the Star Wars movies?

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: I saw some of them.

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: I loved the special effects and the story. I like Princess Leah. Who did you like the best?

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: I like Yoda.

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: Yes, that is a good choice. How would you describe that character if you had to tell someone what they looked like?

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: He was hot!

title: . Asking for a Description of a Person
dialogue_line: That's a really good description.

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: I was wondering if I could borrow the company van for a fundraiser this weekend.

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: Sure, I think that would be possible. Where is the fundraiser?

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: It is in the park downtown.

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: Would you need it for both Saturday and Sunday?

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: We will need it for Saturday only.

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: I think that would be OK. Who will be driving it?

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: Mary and I will be driving the van.

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: Could you drop it off on Sunday night?

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: Yes, we can do that. Can we borrow the chairs from the lunchroom also?

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: Yes, that would be fine. Just make sure that everything is returned by Sunday night.

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: Our unit is participating in a fundraiser this weekend and would like to borrow the van, if possible.

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: I would need to check on that. Where is the fundraiser?

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: It will be at the beach by the pier.

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: What day will you need it for?

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: We will only be needing it for Sunday.

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: Maybe that could work. I need to know who will be driving it.

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: The only two drivers will be Mary and I.

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: If I give you the keys to the garage, could you bring it back on Sunday evening?

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: Sure. We also would like to use the chairs from the lunchroom. Would that be OK?

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: OK, but make sure that everything is back by Sunday night at the latest.

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: Could we borrow the company van for a fundraiser this weekend?

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: That would be a possibility. Where is this fundraiser taking place?

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: It is in the hotel ballroom down the street.

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: Do you need it for the whole weekend?

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: We will need it for both days.

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: We will need to know who will be driving the van.

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: The van will be driven by Mary and me.

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: It needs to be back on Sunday night. Can you arrange for that?

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: Yes, no problem. Would you mind if we borrowed a few of the chairs from the lunchroom?

title: . Asking for Permission
dialogue_line: Just keep track of everything and get it all back where you took it from by Sunday evening.

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: I was thinking of holding the company retreat in the mountains.

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: I agree, I think that that would be perfect!

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: I was thinking it could take place sometime in January.

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: That might be a little too cold for some people.

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: Yes, you are right.

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: What about April? April has good weather that isn't too cold or too hot.

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: Yes, that would work out better.

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: You know, maybe we could take a survey to see how that works for everyone.

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: Good idea! We'll have to get right on it.

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: Fine! Well, I'll get right on it now!

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: I think that the company retreat should be in the mountains this year.

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: What a great idea!

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: January would be a good month for a mountain retreat.

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: I like the mountain idea, but I am not so sure about the month of January.

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: You know, now that I think about it, you might be right.

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: April might be nice. It is far enough away to make the necessary arrangements.

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: That is a good suggestion.

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: We could ask everyone what would be the best time for them.

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: Yes, that would let us know what would work best.

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: I'll put the survey online this afternoon.

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: The Mountains would be a great place for the company retreat.

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: That's a wonderful choice.

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: I have chosen January as the month for this retreat.

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: January is a little too close to the Christmas holidays.

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: Yes, maybe another choice might be better.

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: I think that April would work. Spring is a lovely time to be in the mountains.

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: Thank you for thinking of that.

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: Maybe if we asked around we could see what people would prefer.

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: That is a good idea.

title: . Agreement and Disagreement
dialogue_line: I'll take care of taking the survey and get back to you with the answers.

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: I was thinking about applying for the new position.

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: Do you think that is a good idea?

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: It seems like a good idea but I am not really sure.

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: What are your main concerns?

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: It would give me a chance to grow, but I am wondering if I would like the job.

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: I know what you mean, I've thought about that myself.

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: I also am thinking about the pay.

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: Could you take a slight pay decrease for a chance to move forward?

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: Yes, it might be worth it. I am not certain.

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: I think I'm convinced that trying for this position is the best choice for you.

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: I am not certain, but I think I might ask to be considered for the new job.

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: Why are you considering trying for it?

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: I think that I might like it, but I am still thinking about it.

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: What is it about this job that appeals to you?

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: I think that I would enjoy the position but there isn't a lot of creativity involved.

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: Yes, you could be right. There is a lot to consider.

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: I am also wondering about the pay.

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: Would a slight decrease in pay be worth it for a new opportunity for growth?

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: I am thinking that might be the case.

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: I think you should give it a shot. What do you have to lose? You can always change yourmind.

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: I am considering going for the new job that was posted yesterday.

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: Are you certain that that is what you want to do.

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: It may not be the best choice for me, but I am considering it.

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: Why do you think that this would be a good move?

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: I believe that this job would allow me to move up but might be a little boring for me.

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: Yes, there are always pros and cons to making a career change.

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: Also, the matter of pay is also a consideration.

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: I think the slight pay decrease might be worth it. The benefits are much better.

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: Yes, sometimes giving up a little to move forward is the best choice.

title: . Certainty and Uncertainty
dialogue_line: I think you definitely should apply for the position.

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: Whoa, look at all those ice cream choices!

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: Yes, that is a lot of choices. What is your favorite?

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: I love anything with chocolate the best.

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: I like chocolate myself.

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: Is there any kind of ice cream you don't like?

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: I really don't like any ice cream with nuts in it.

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: I haven't ever cared for that myself.

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: Have you ever had garlic ice cream?

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: That sounds absolutely disgusting!

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: It was. Let's stick with the regular choices today, though.

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: There are so many flavors of ice cream to choose from!

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: Yes, there must be about a hundred. Do you have a favorite?

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: I love fruit flavored ices the best.

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: Yes, fresh fruit flavored is the best ever.

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: What is your least favorite ice cream?

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: I don't like peppermint ice cream.

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: Yes, I know what you mean.

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: One time, I tried garlic ice cream.

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: That could be interesting.

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: That doesn't sound like a good choice for today. Let's order!

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: I have never seen so many flavors of ice cream in one place!

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: There certainly are a lot. Can you choose a favorite?

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: Vanilla with toppings is my favorite.

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: Is there anything as good as a hot fudge sundae?

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: No way!

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: I don't like ice cream with too many different flavors in it.

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: I agree with that, it just doesn't work for me.

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: I saw garlic ice cream on the menu once.

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: I think that that would be horrible!

title: . Likes and Dislikes
dialogue_line: I think I'll stick with a more traditional choice today!

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: I need help preparing for my presentation on Friday.

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: I could help you with that.

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: Are you sure you have the time?

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: I promise you that I have the time to do this. If I didn't, I wouldn't offer to help.

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: What would be the best time for you to help me?

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: Tomorrow night would work for me.

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: Should we just meet here?

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: OK, and I'll bring some information that helped me with my presentation.

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: I'll see you then.

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: See you tomorrow night.

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: Could you help me prepare for my presentation on Friday?

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: I would love to help you prepare for your presentation.

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: I hate to ask you to do something like that.

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: This will not interfere with my work. I promise you that.

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: When could we get together?

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: I could easily give you some time tomorrow night.

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: Would you like to meet at the coffee house next door?

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: Yes, and could you write down anything you might be having trouble with?

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: I'll come prepared.

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: Goodbye until then. I promise you that you'll do well after we meet.

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: I am a little nervous about my presentation on Friday.

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: If you would like me to, I could help you with that.

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: Wouldn't that take you away from your project?

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: I have plenty of time to do this. I promise you it won't be a problem for me.

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: Is there a good time for you to help me?

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: If we work on this tomorrow night, you could easily be ready for Friday.

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: How about meeting in my office?

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: That would work out well. Bring any concerns that you might have.

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: Sounds like you'll be able to help me a lot.

title: .Making Promises
dialogue_line: Don't worry. Everything will go well. I promise!

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: I need help planning my vacation.

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: Sure, where would you like to go?

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: I haven't decided where to go yet.

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: Do you enjoy warm or cold climates?

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: I am thinking that I might enjoy a tropical climate.

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: I have some brochures here that you might like to look at.

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: These look great!

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: Do you know how much you want to spend on this vacation?

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: I have about a thousand dollars to spend on this trip.

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: Well, take these brochures, and get back to me when you want to make your reservations.

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: Could you help me with vacation plans?

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: Do you know where you will be traveling?

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: I am open to suggestions at this point.

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: Are you wanting to travel to a tropical climate, or would you like to go somewhere with a cooler climate?

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: I would like to travel to a cooler destination.

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: I can give you some brochures that could give you some ideas.

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: I will look at them right now.

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: How much money is in your budget for this trip?

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: I think that I can spend about two hundred dollars a day.

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: Take your time choosing a destination and, when you've narrowed it down, I'll be happy to help you make a reservation.

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: I was wondering if you would be able to help me with vacation plans.

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: Have you chosen your destination?

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: I don't know where I want to go yet.

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: Do you enjoy warm weather, or are you looking forward to a cooler vacation?

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: A nice temperate climate would be best for me.

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: Why don't you take a look at these brochures that might help you make up your mind?

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: This place looks nice.

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: Have you thought about what you would like to spend on this vacation?

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: I just got a bonus and can spend about three thousand dollars total.

title: Visiting a Travel Agent
dialogue_line: I'll be happy to help you make a reservation whenever you decide upon a destination.

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: Could you help me make a plane reservation?

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: I would be happy to help you. Where do you plan on going?

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: I am going to go to Hawaii.

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: For that destination, you may leave from Los Angeles or Burbank Airport. Which would you prefer?

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: I think that I would rather leave from Los Angeles Airport.

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: Would you prefer a morning or afternoon departure?

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: I need to leave in the morning.

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: Fine. On your return flight, do you have a preference as to morning or afternoon?

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: I would prefer to return in the afternoon.

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: I have booked you on your flight at a great rate. Here are your tickets.

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: I need to make a plane reservation.

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: That is what I am here for. What is your destination?

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: I will be traveling to Aspen, Colorado.

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: Would you prefer to leave from Los Angeles or Burbank Airport?

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: Burbank Airport would be best for me.

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: You can leave in the morning of afternoon from that airport. Do you have a preference?

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: I can only take a flight that leaves in the afternoon.

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: I can book that for you right now. When you return, would you prefer morning or afternoon?

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: I think that I would like a morning return flight better.

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: I was able to book your flight, and I will print your tickets right now. Have a great trip!

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: I am planning a trip and need help making my airline reservation.

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: Sure. Where are you traveling to on your trip?

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: I will be vacationing in Oregon.

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: You have an option of departing from Los Angeles or Burbank Airport. What is your preference?

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: I live closer to Los Angeles Airport, so that would be the best choice.

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: Does it matter to you if you leave in the morning or afternoon?

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: I can leave at either time.

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: I'll put you on a morning flight. Is a morning or afternoon return flight preferable for you?

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: Either morning or afternoon would work for me.

title: Making a Plane Reservation
dialogue_line: I'll give you an afternoon flight. Here are your tickets.

title: Booking a Flight Online
dialogue_line: Have you ever booked a flight online?

title: Booking a Flight Online
dialogue_line: I have booked airline tickets online many times. It has worked out great for me!

title: Booking a Flight Online
dialogue_line: How do you book airline tickets online?

title: Booking a Flight Online
dialogue_line: The best way is to go to a website like Travelocity or Expedia. They can help you find the best price.

title: Booking a Flight Online
dialogue_line: What information do I need to provide to book a flight?

title: Booking a Flight Online
dialogue_line: You need to know where you are going and when you want to travel.

title: Booking a Flight Online
dialogue_line: How do I get the cheapest rate?

title: Booking a Flight Online
dialogue_line: Usually you get the best price by having some flexibility in your travel time and dates.

title: Booking a Flight Online
dialogue_line: Can I fly on different airlines?

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: I don't know how much luggage I can take on the plane with me.

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: You need to look up each individual airline online to get their restrictions.

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: I just wonder what the general rules are.

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: In the United States, if you fly economy on a domestic flight, you usually have to pay for checked baggage.

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: What about international flights?

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: On international flights, you usually have a two-bag limit with weight restrictions.

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: What about carry-on bags?

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: All airlines will allow you to bring one small carry-on that will fit under the seat. Sometimes you can also bring a purse or handbag.

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: Do you have any words of wisdom for travelers in regard to luggage?

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: Keep it light in regard to what you pack. Figure out what you absolutely need and leave the rest at home.

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: I am getting packed for my vacation and don't know what the luggage restrictions are.

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: You could call the airline that you will be flying, and they can tell you what you can bring.

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: I just need to know what most of the airlines have decided to do.

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: Unless you fly on a discount carrier, you usually have to pay a fee for checked baggage if you fly economy.

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: Do I also have to pay on an international flight?

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: Some international airlines charge a fee for extra bags or weight but allow you a free bag.

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: How much carry-on luggage may I bring?

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: You may bring a carry-on piece of luggage, and usually you can bring a handbag also.

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: What overall suggestions do you have regarding travelers and luggage?

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: Do not bring anything on a trip that you don't really need. Think of it as leaving space for anything that you might want to purchase along the way!

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: I heard that the airlines are changing the luggage restrictions, and I need to find out what they are.

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: There are online sites that list the general restrictions of the airlines.

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: Because I fly a lot, I need to pack in a way that will be suitable for most airlines.

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: Except for the discount carriers, you almost always have to pay a fee for checked baggage if you fly economy within the U.S.

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: Do they charge a fee for baggage on an international flight?

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: Almost all international carriers charge for excessive luggage. You are limited in weight and size.

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: Is carry-on luggage allowed?

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: You are restricted in what you may carry on. You almost always can bring one small piece for free.

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: What do you think is the most important thing to remember when packing for a trip?

title: 7. Luggage Limits
dialogue_line: Pack lightly! You don't want to haul around or pay fees on things that aren't essential.

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: There are different considerations. You have to consider airline rules and rules for customs.

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: How do I find out about each country's Customs regulations?

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: You can go to a website for the particular country you are interested in.

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: Is there anything that I should keep in mind for all countries?

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: Do not ever lie about what you are carrying in your luggage. If you get caught, there is a major fine just for lying.

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: How about regulations for what you can carry on an airline?

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: The Internet is a good source for special regulations for particular airports and airlines.

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: I heard that I can't bring my own bottled water on the plane.

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: You can buy water at the airport once you pass luggage inspection.

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: What can I carry in my luggage when I travel on an airline trip?

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: When you fly, you need to think about what you can carry onboard and what you can take into a particular country.

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: Where can I go to find out about Customs regulations?

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: Just Google the country you are interested in with these keywords: Customs and restrictions.

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: Are there any general rules for all countries?

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: Always answer all questions accurately. If you get caught omitting anything, you will be fined and possibly detained.

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: What about airline regulations for the contents of your luggage?

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: If you go to a website for a particular airport or airline, you can get specific information.

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: Is it true that I can't even bring my own water with me?

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: You can bring an empty bottle with you if you like and fill it up once you pass inspection.

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: How can I find out what I can carry in my luggage on an airline flight?

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: You have to think about Customs regulations and airline regulations.

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: What is the best place to get information about the Customs regulations for a country?

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: It is easier to go online, but if you can't do that, you can write the Customs Office for the country you are interested in.

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: What is the most important thing I should keep in mind as far as Customs is concerned?

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: Always be honest in declaring everything you are carrying. Otherwise, you can be fined for not declaring everything.

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: How do you find out what you can carry in your luggage for a particular airline?

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: You can always call the airline you are flying, and they can give you specific information.

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: Can I at least bring my own bottled water with me?

title: 8. Carry-on Luggage
dialogue_line: You can't bring your own water. You must buy it at the airport.

title: . Going through the Customs
dialogue_line: My seatmate here is traveling through to Canada, and I told her that she probably doesn't have to clear Customs.

title: . Going through the Customs
dialogue_line: People who are not entering the United States should go to the left and follow the directions given to them. Their bags are already routed through to their final destination.

title: . Going through the Customs
dialogue_line: Can we use the restrooms before we clear Customs?

title: . Going through the Customs
dialogue_line: Yes, there is one right over there especially for this area.

title: . Going through the Customs
dialogue_line: Where is the luggage claim area?

title: . Going through the Customs
dialogue_line: You can get to Baggage Claim by going down the escalator and following the signs.

title: . Going through the Customs
dialogue_line: Don't I have to clear Customs before I go get my bags?

title: . Going through the Customs
dialogue_line: After you have picked up your bags, you will be directed to Customs.

title: . Going through the Customs
dialogue_line: Do I need to have this Declarations form filled out before I get there?

title: . Going through the Customs
dialogue_line: Do not get in the Customs and Immigration line until you have your passport out with your completed Declarations form.

title: . Going through the Customs
dialogue_line: My brother won't be staying in the U.S. but is continuing on to Mexico.

title: . Going through the Customs
dialogue_line: Passengers continuing on should check in with the attendant on the left who will direct them to where they can connect with their next flight.

title: . Going through the Customs
dialogue_line: Is there a restroom we can use in this area?

title: . Going through the Customs
dialogue_line: Of course, right over there on your left.

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: Can you help me figure out where I should go first to check in at this airport?

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: If you already have your ticket, we can take your bags here at the curbside check-in.

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: How do I know what gate to go to?

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: There are arrivals and departures listed on the screens inside.

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: Is there someplace where I can find out what I can carry in my baggage?

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: There are signs posted near the baggage check area to help you know what the rules are.

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: Can my friend go inside with me?

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: Your friend can go with you to the ticket counter but not past the security check.

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: When I return, will this curbside area be a good place to get picked up?

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: This area is only for departures. The bottom level is for arrivals.

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: I don't know the departure procedures at this airport and was wondering if you could help me.

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: If you need to pick up your ticket, you need to go to the ticket counter right inside the door. They will check your bags for you.

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: I don't know where my plane is departing from.

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: There are agents for your airline at the counter in the corner.

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: Where can I find out what I can carry on in my bag?

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: There should be a list of restrictions printed on your ticket.

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: Can I take my friend along with me to say goodbye?

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: Only ticketed passengers can go past the security checkpoint.

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: Is this the area for departures and arrivals or only departures?

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: This is the drop-off area for departures. Arrivals are on the lower level.

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: I am flying out today and need to know where I should begin checking in.

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: If you only have a carry-on and already have a ticket, you may proceed directly to the gate to check in.

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: Do you know what gate my plane is leaving from?

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: Check on the screens when you go through baggage inspection for your airline.

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: I need to know what the restrictions are for carry-on luggage contents.

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: Check out the list of banned carry-on materials on the signs inside the airport.

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: I have a lot of time to kill before my flight departs and want my friend to keep me company.

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: For security purposes, only ticketed passengers can go to the gate.

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: Can my friends pick me up here when I return?

title: . Talking to a Curbside Agent
dialogue_line: The curbside area is a departure area only. Arrivals are downstairs.

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: Can I ask you some questions about the in-flight instructions?

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: I would be happy to help you clarify anything you need help with.

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: Could you help me find out where my nearest exit is?

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: There is a card in your seat pocket that shows you where your nearest exit is. Yours is two rows in front of you.

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: Where is my oxygen mask that you were talking about?

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: Your oxygen mask is above you, next to the reading light. It will drop down when you need it.

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: I am concerned about landing in the water.

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: The life jackets are under your seat. You can also use your seat cushion as a flotation device.

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: What is the most important thing we can do to stay safe?

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: The most important thing you can do is keep your seatbelt fastened when the captain asks you to.

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: I am kind of confused about the in-flight instructions and need to ask you a few questions.

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: It would be my pleasure to help you with any questions you might have.

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: Where is that card that shows my nearest exit?

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: That card is in the seat pocket right in front of you. Your nearest exit is directly behind you.

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: Is my oxygen mask up here?

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: Your oxygen mask will drop down if we lose cabin pressure.

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: Do we have any life jackets on this plane if we need them?

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: Your seat cushion can be used as a flotation device and your life jacket is under the seat cushion.

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: It seems really windy outside.

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: The wind won't be a problem. Always make sure that your seatbelt is fastened when you are requested to fasten it.

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: Would it be all right if I asked you a few questions about your in-flight instructions?

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: I would love to help clarify any questions you might have.

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: When you were talking about the nearest exit, what were you talking about?

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: There's a card in this seat pocket that shows you where your nearest exit is. Your nearest exit is right here.

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: What if I need an oxygen mask?

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: The oxygen mask is above you and will drop down if you need it.

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: Where are the life jackets?

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: You will find your life jacket under your seat if you need it. Also, you have a seat cushion that can be used as a flotation device.

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: If I want to be safe, what can I do?

title: . Talking to a Flight Attendant
dialogue_line: Keep your seatbelt fastened at all times. If you fall asleep, keep it fastened loosely around you in case we hit turbulence unexpectedly.

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: That rain is really coming down out there!

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: Yes, it's kind of crazy weather outside.

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: I get kind of nervous flying in this kind of weather.

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: I don't think anyone feels all that comfortable flying in a storm.

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: Do you think it will be this bad the whole trip?

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: On the weather channel, this storm looked to be a big one. It will probably be with us for a while.

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: I worry about too much ice on the wings.

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: I have to believe that our pilot knows what he is doing and we'll be okay.

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: When do you think the pilot will turn off the Fasten Your Seatbelt sign?

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: He'll turn it off as soon as he knows that we are through the turbulence.

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: Do you think that we are going to crash?

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: Maybe. You just never know.

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: It sure is windy out there!

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: It definitely is not the perfect day to fly, is it?

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: I am scared of flying to begin with, but bad weather makes it a little worse.

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: Anyone who actually enjoys flying in bad weather is out of their mind.

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: Will the whole flight be this bad?

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: I think that it will probably let up once we get out of here. Let's cross our fingers!

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: What if we hit a flock of birds?

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: Plane crashes are very rare. We'll be fine.

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: Do you think that the pilot will ever turn off the Fasten Your Seatbelt sign?

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: The pilot needs to make sure that there is no more turbulence before he lets us get up.

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: Do you think that we are going to die?

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: Can I buy you an alcoholic beverage?

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: I can't believe how bad the weather is today!

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: Yes, according to the weather report, we will be flying through a pretty nasty storm.

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: I don't really like flying in this kind of weather.

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: It is normal to feel a little nervous about flying in bad weather.

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: How long do you think this will last?

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: Usually the pilot can get enough altitude to get above it. I hope that happens this time!

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: What if one of the engines stops working?

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: I trust that the airline wouldn't let us take off without feeling that all was okay.

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: How much longer do you think that the pilot will leave the Fasten Your Seatbelt sign on?

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: When we are past the turbulence, I am sure that the pilot will shut the light off.

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: Do you think we are headed for an air disaster?

title: . Talking to a Seatmate
dialogue_line: Would you like a pillow and blanket so you can take a nap?

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: I was wondering if I could order something to drink.

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: Yes, we have alcoholic beverages as well as coffee, tea, or soda.

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: How much do drinks cost?

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: Our alcoholic beverages are five dollars each. All others are complimentary.

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: When will our meals be served?

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: We will serve a snack with the beverages. Dinner will be served a few hours into our flight.

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: What are our dinner choices?

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: You will have a choice of chicken, fish, or beef. I will be bringing a menu by shortly.

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: I am a vegetarian and need a vegetarian meal.

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: Vegetarian meals need to be requested at least two days before your flight. I might be able to find you extra servings of vegetables, however.

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: I am getting thirsty and was wondering if I may order a drink.

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: Yes, I would be happy to take your drink order. We have coffee, tea, or soda as well as bar drinks.

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: Do you charge for beverages?

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: We offer nonalcoholic beverages for free. Our bar drinks are five dollars each.

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: Are we going to get fed on this flight?

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: You will get a small snack served with your beverage. We will be serving dinner about halfway through the flight.

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: Do we have a choice of what we get for dinner?

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: Tonight we have chicken, fish, or beef to choose from. You will get a chance to look at a menu a little before our mealtime.

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: Do you have vegetarian meals?

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: We serve many different meals for people with religious or dietary restrictions. We do need to know about this at the time you book your flight.

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: When you get a chance, could you take my drink order, please?

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: On this flight you may have your choice of bar drinks or coffee, tea, or soft drinks.

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: What is the price of drinks?

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: Our alcoholic beverages are five dollars apiece. All others are two dollars each with free refills.

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: Do we get to eat on this flight?

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: We always pass out a small snack with your beverage. You will be served dinner in a few hours.

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: What are we having for dinner tonight?

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: We are serving a chicken, fish, or beef plate. You may select whatever you choose.

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: Can I order a vegetarian plate?

title: . Ordering Food and Drink
dialogue_line: With advance notice, we are able to accommodate a wide variety of special diet needs. Once we are in the air, unfortunately, there isn't much we can do.

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: My flight just arrived late, and I need to know what to do.

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: That's okay. The airline computer is keeping track of what is happening with you.

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: Do I have to call anyone?

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: By speaking with us at the arrival gate, we can fix the problem for you and direct you.

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: What if there are no more connecting flights for today on this airline?

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: We will go online to see if there is something available with this airline. If we need to, we can check for a flight with another carrier.

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: What if I can't find another flight out of here tonight?

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: We can help you find transportation to a local hotel.

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: Will the airline pay for my room if I have to spend the night at the airport?

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: Since the flight delay was our fault and you are continuing on with our airline, we will cover the cost of a hotel room.

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: Our flight was late, and I missed my connecting flight.

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: We can help you find an alternate flight that will get you where you are going.

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: Whom should I call?

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: The arrival gate is where you need to find someone to help you. You are in the right place.

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: I think the flight we missed was the last flight out of here today.

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: We can go on the computer to try to find an alternate flight on another airline if we cannot accommodate you.

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: What if I get stuck here and can't get out of this airport?

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: There is a shuttle that is still running and can take you into town to a hotel.

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: I don't have any money for a hotel room.

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: The flight that you missed is not with our airline, and we would not have suggested booking the flights so close together. We won't pay for your hotel room.

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: I had a connecting flight, but our arriving flight was late.

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: We will help you make alternative plans.

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: Can you give me the number of the airline so that I can call?

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: The airlines always have personnel at the arrival gate to help direct you when a flight is late. We can help you right here.

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: I remember that when we booked this flight, our connecting flight was the only one on this day.

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: Our ticketing is tied in with other airlines. If we cannot accommodate you, perhaps another airline has some open seats to your destination.

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: Where will I stay if I can't get another flight tonight?

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: Since I believe there is a flight out of here at 5:45 in the morning, you may want to consider just staying at the airport.

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: I don't think I should have to pay for a hotel room.

title: . Missing Connecting Flight
dialogue_line: We will pay 50 percent of the price of your room.

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: I just arrived and need help getting transportation to my hotel.

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: There are shuttles, taxis, and buses that go all over the city.

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: Which one is the best form of transportation?

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: It depends on where you want to go. If you are going to a well-known hotel, they have their own shuttles that drop you right off at the door.

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: Where can I catch a cab?

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: All ground transportation leaves from the island as you walk out the arrivals gate.

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: Where can I rent a car?

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: The car rental agencies are against the wall as you exit.

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: Are there any subways in this town?

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: We have a subway system, but you need to take a shuttle to get to the station.

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: I need help figuring out how to get to my friend's house in the city.

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: You may take a shuttle, a taxi, or a bus to get wherever you need to go.

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: Which form of transportation is preferable?

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: It depends on what you are looking for. If you are looking to travel inexpensively, a bus might be your best bet.

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: Where do the buses pick you up?

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: The ground transportation center is right outside the exit leading to the street.

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: Is there a car rental place around here?

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: You can find a car rental agency just outside of baggage claim.

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: Is there a subway in this city?

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: Our subway station is a mile outside of the airport. I would suggest you take the designated shuttle to get there.

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: I need information about my options for ground transportation.

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: This city has many taxis, shuttles, or buses to transport you to your destination.

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: Is one form of transportation better than another?

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: It depends on where you are traveling. If your destination is close by, you might want to just grab a taxicab.

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: Where are the shuttle pick-up points?

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: When you pick up your luggage, walk out of the door and you will see the transportation kiosk.

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: Where are the car rental agencies?

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: You will see the car rental agencies as you walk down the hallway as you exit.

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: I heard that you have a very good light rail system in this city.

title: . Ground Transportation
dialogue_line: We have a subway station in the airport. The in-airport moving sidewalk system will take you to it.

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: I was wondering if you could help me book a few tours.

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: You have come to the right place. How many days will you be visiting here?

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: I will be here for a week.

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: Have you ever visited our city before?

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: This is my first time visiting this city.

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: What are you interested in? Do you enjoy museums and buildings, or would you rather hit some outdoor hotspots and venues?

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: I really enjoy visiting museums and art galleries.

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: We have tours for all interests.

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: Do you have a city tour?

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: Yes, in fact, I usually suggest that to visitors.

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: I need help knowing how to book some tours.

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: We will be able to book your tours here. How long will you be here?

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: I am only staying for three days.

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: Is this your first stay in our city?

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: I have been here before on a business trip but didn't really have a chance to see much.

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: Have you thought of what types of things you would like to see? Would you maybe like to visit some outdoor venues or nighttime hotspots?

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: I love being outdoors and would love to spend some time at the beach.

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: We have a tour that can take you where you can see all of that.

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: Do you have a tour where I can get a quick overview of the city?

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: We do have tours like that, and I think that that is a good place to start.

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: I need help figuring out what to see and visit in this city.

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: We are definitely the place to come to when booking tours. What is the length of your stay here?

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: I am on a layover and will only have today and tomorrow morning to sightsee.

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: How familiar are you with our city?

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: Actually I was born here but haven't been here in twenty years.

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: Do you have any ideas of what you would like to see? Perhaps you would enjoy our world-renowned museums or a visit to our magnificent zoological gardens.

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: I was interested in checking out local architecture.

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: I think that you would enjoy a number of our tours.

title: . Arranging a Tour of the City
dialogue_line: Is there any way that I can take a quick tour of the city, so that I can get some idea as to what I might like to see?

title: . Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: I am having some big problems on this tour.

title: . Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: What seems to be the problem? We are here to help you.

title: . Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: This tour company seems very disorganized. No one seems to have a clear picture as to where we are going and when we are going to get there.

title: . Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: I will see what I can do about that. How about the accommodations on the tour?

title: . Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: So far, we have been staying in really out-of-the-way accommodations.

title: . Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: Is anything wrong with your room?

title: . Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: The television in our room was broken, and they didn't send anyone to fix it.

title: . Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: I will complain to the hotel manager about that. How about the hotel restaurant?

title: . Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: The food in the restaurant was terrible, and a few people from our group got sick.

title: . Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: I am so sorry that you had such a bad experience. We would like to offer you a free city tour and lunch to make it up to you.

title: . Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: I paid good money for this tour and would appreciate some help with some problems that have come up.

title: . Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: I would like to help you smooth out any difficulties you are having. What can I help you with?

title: . Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: This tour company can't seem to coordinate anything. We are always arriving after something is closed or get there when the guides for the site are on a break.

title: . Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: We are trying to fix that. Are the accommodations to your liking?

title: . Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: Our accommodations are pretty substandard.

title: . Complaining about a Tour

title: . Complaining about a Tour

title: . Complaining about a Tour

title: . Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: This tour company doesn't seem to know the town very well. We are always getting lost!

title: . Complaining about a Tour

title: . Complaining about a Tour

title: . Complaining about a Tour

title: . Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: The room was very noisy, and we couldn't get to sleep.

title: . Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: That is unacceptable. Did you at least enjoy your dinner in the hotel restaurant?

title: . Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: The food was horrible at the hotel restaurant, and a few of us got sick after eating there.

title: . Complaining about a Tour
dialogue_line: I am glad that you told me about the problems. I would like you to be my guest for a free massage at the hotel spa tonight.

title: . Sightseeing

title: . Making Alternate Plans
dialogue_line: I guess that we won't be going rollerblading today with all this rain!

title: . Making Alternate Plans

title: . Making Alternate Plans

title: . Making Alternate Plans

title: . Making Alternate Plans

title: . Making Alternate Plans

title: . Making Alternate Plans

title: . Making Alternate Plans

title: . Making Alternate Plans
dialogue_line: I think that rollerblading today is kind of not happening in this rainstorm.
