title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: I heard that you finished my home inspection, and I was wondering how it went.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: First of all, we need to understand what I was looking for. Do you know what the purpose of an inspection is?

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: I am not sure what a home inspection is all about.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: I went there to check for problems with the home, so you aren't surprised when you move in.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: Wouldn't the owners have told me about any problems?

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: Sellers aren't always truthful, and there might also be problems that they aren't aware of.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: Can I require the owners to fix the problems?

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: You can make the sale of the house contingent on them fixing the problems.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: What did you find out when you did the inspection of my new home?

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: There were no major problems. One leaky pipe under the sink and two broken roof tiles was all that I found.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: Can you tell me the results of my home inspection?

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: Before I answer that, I want to make sure that you know what I was looking for. Are you clear on what I was looking for?

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: I never had a home inspection before.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: I inspect the home for problems that might not be all that apparent in a quick walk-through.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: I asked the owners, and they said that everything was great with the house.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: The owners might not be aware of everything wrong with the house. Some things are hidden, but might still be a problem for you in the future.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: I heard that the owners must fix all of the problems before the escrow closes.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: I inform you of the problems. If there are major problems, you can decline to buy the house or they may wish to fix any problems.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: What kinds of things did you discover in my home inspection?

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: I found some fairly major problems. A major support beam in the roof is broken, and the shower floor leaked and rotted out the second-floor joist.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: I came in to see how my home inspection went.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: First of all, I need to share what the purpose of a home inspection is. Do you understand what I was doing there?

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: I had a home inspection before, but didn't really understand it.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: I help you spot potential problems with the home before you purchase it.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: The owner said that the roof had leaked, but that he got it fixed last month.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: Sellers aren't really all that objective. They may have gotten used to a leaky faucet, but it is still broken.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: Are the sellers responsible for fixing the problems with the house?

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: The owners may wish to pay to have the problems fixed, or maybe the price of the house can be reduced.

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: Did you find a lot of things wrong during the home inspection?

title: . Discussing Home Inspection with an Inspector
dialogue_line: The house has a very outdated electrical system. Many of the switches and outlets do not work and are unsafe.

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: I am here to sign my escrow papers.

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: I will tell you ahead of time, that there is a lot to sign here, but I will help you every step of the way.

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: Should I have brought anything with me?

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: Basically, what I need from you now is your driver's license or some ID that shows your residency status.

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: Where do I start?

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: We will be going through these papers one by one. I will be explaining them all to you, and you can ask questions as we go.

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: Can I make a phone call to a friend if I have a question?

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: We do not want you to sign any documents that you do not understand. You may get assistance with any questions that you have.

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: Will the house be mine when we finish these documents?

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: This is the last thing you need to do, but it may take a while for the papers to be processed.

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: Your assistant said that it was time to come in and sign my escrow papers.

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: Don't be intimidated. There is a lot to sign, but I will explain everything to you very clearly.

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: Do you need anything from me?

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: All the papers have been drawn up, but I will need to see your picture ID so we can notarize these papers.

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: There are a lot of papers!

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: We are going to go through these bit by bit. You will have plenty of time to read the fine print.

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: My dad is going to be here in a minute to help me go through this with you.

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: We want you to get any outside help that you need. Do not ever sign documents that you don't understand.

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: Can I start moving in after I finish signing these documents?

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: When these papers get processed, the house will be yours!

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: I am very nervous about signing my escrow papers.

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: Escrow involves a lot of paperwork, but I will explain all of the steps to you as we go along.

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: What should I have brought with me?

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: The only thing I will need to see is your driver's license, as I will be notarizing these papers.

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: I feel a little overwhelmed by so many papers.

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: Don't worry about how many papers there are. We are going to look at them one at a time.

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: My boyfriend is an attorney and told me that I could fax him anything if I had a question.

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: Please get any outside help that you need in understanding your escrow documents.

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: Is this the last thing that I will need to do before the house becomes mine?

title: . Signing Escrow Papers
dialogue_line: At the close of escrow, the house will be yours!

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: When can I move into my new house?

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: The current owners will be moving out on Tuesday, so technically you could pick up the keys and move in on Wednesday.

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: Will the utilities be turned on?

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: You need to contact the utility company and make arrangements to transfer the utilities to your name.

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: I really want to paint the walls right away and get the carpet cleaned.

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: If I were you, I would take a few days to take care of those things before you move in.

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: I was thinking that I should have my new appliances delivered as we are moving in.

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: That would be perfect. That way, someone will be there, but you will have them right away.

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: Can you help me on my move-in day?

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: I think that I have something else really important to do on that day. I just can't remember what it is.

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: What would be a good day to finally move into the house?

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: You can pick up your keys on Tuesday night. When you actually move in is up to you.

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: Will the electricity and water be on, or do we need to do something to get it turned on?

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: Make sure that you transfer the utilities to your name and tell them when you will be moving in.

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: The carpet needs to be cleaned, and I want to paint the walls a different color.

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: An empty house is easier to paint and clean. Take a few days to take care of those things before you start moving your furniture in.

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: I want my appliances to be delivered as we are moving into the house.

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: I think that will work out just fine. It will help when you move your groceries in and need to keep them cold.

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: Would you be willing to help me do a few things on the day I move in?

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: My grandmother needs me to help her trim her roses that day.

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: What would be the earliest that I could actually move into my new house?

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: The keys will be turned in on Tuesday night. The house will be yours at that time.

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: What should we do to make sure that we have the electricity and water turned on?

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: You can tell the utility company what day you are moving in, and they will transfer the utilities to your name.

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: There are a few things that we want to do to the place, like painting and carpet cleaning.

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: Take advantage of the house being empty to clean and paint. It will be harder to do after the furniture and appliances have arrived.

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: I asked the store to deliver my new appliances on the day we are moving in.

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: That will be good. You are going to want your stove and refrigerator right away.

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: I could use some help on moving day. What are you doing on Saturday?

title: . Discussing Details of Moving in
dialogue_line: I think I am getting a fever and will be too sick to help you. Here, feel how hot my head is!

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: I am interested in selling my home and would like to know what is involved.

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: You have come to the right place. When were you interested in selling your home?

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: I just received a job transfer and need to relocate right away.

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: How long have you been in your current home?

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: I have lived in my home for about 10 years.

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: As I am sure that you are aware, the market has fallen in the past year. People are more likely to make money if they have owned their home for a while.

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: Will I be able to recover the money I paid for my home?

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: It is hard to say, but whatever house you buy will also be costing you a lot less.

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: What is the next step in selling my home?

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: I would like to meet with you tomorrow to look at your property, and then you and I can figure out a contract.

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: I am looking for a realtor to help me sell my home.

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: I would be happy to help you with any questions that you might have. When were you thinking of selling your home?

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: I am interested in moving up to a bigger home, but first I need to sell the one I now own.

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: Have you owned your home for a long time?

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: I just bought my home two years ago.

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: I think you probably know that the market is not all that great. You are more likely to see a profit if you have owned for 8 years or more.

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: Will I be losing money if I sell right now?

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: It is impossible to predict with certainty what will happen, but you can purchase a replacement home at a lower rate also.

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: What can I do next to get the ball rolling on this sale?

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: If it works for you, I would like to come over and see your home. Then we can draw up a contract.

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: I am considering selling my home and would like information on doing so.

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: It would be my pleasure to answer any questions that you might have. Were you interested in selling in the near future?

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: I am just checking out the possibility of selling, as I am thinking of moving to Hawaii.

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: Is your home a recent purchase, or have you owned it for a while?

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: The house has been in my family for years, but I just became the owner 6 months ago when my mother passed away.

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: Housing prices have fallen quite a bit. The longer you have owned your home, the greater the profit.

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: Am I going to lose my shirt selling my home right now?

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: It will all kind of even out. You may sell low, but you can also buy low.

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: What should we be doing to get the process started?

title: First Appointment with Realtor
dialogue_line: If it fits into your schedule, I could meet you tomorrow morning and we could take a look at your property. The next step would be us both signing a contract.

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: Thank you for coming to look at my house.

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: I really wanted to take a look and help give you an idea of what we need to do.

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: When will people come to look at my house?

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: Basically, there are two ways people can view your home. They can come to an Open House or they can come with a Realtor to view it duringa private appointment.

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: Will people from other real estate offices be involved, or just from your office?

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: Your house is going to be listed as a Multiple Listing so that it will have the maximum exposure to a variety of people.

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: Will I know when people are going to come see my house?

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: We will set the parameters in the contract, but usually you will receive at least four hours of notification that someone is coming.

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: What happens during an Open House day?

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: You will be expected to be away during an Open House. I will take care of the details.

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: I appreciate you dropping by to look at my home.

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: It is useful for us to take a walk through your home together, so that we make sure that we are on the same page.

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: How do you show my home to potential buyers?

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: We will have an Open House or two on a weekend and we also will show your home with private appointments during the week.

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: Are you the only real estate office that will be showing my house?

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: We are placing your house as a Multiple Listing. That way, people who don't work for my particular office can show your home to their clients.

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: How will I know when to expect prospective buyers?

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: That will be set in your contract. Usually, you will be given four hours notice.

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: Can I stay home during an Open House day?

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: The seller is never at home during an Open House. I personally will handle the showing of your home.

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: Thanks for stopping by to evaluate my home.

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: I want to make sure that you are very clear on what the steps are to selling a home.

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: When can people come and see my home?

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: We will have several Open House weekends. Various realtors will also show your house during the week.

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: Will I know all of the realtors who will be showing my home, or will they be strangers?

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: Your house will be listed on what we call a Multiple Listing. That way it will be shown by a variety of realtors.

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: Can people just drop in anytime they feel like it?

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: We usually try and give you at least four hours of notification that someone is coming to look at your home.

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: Will I have to go away during an Open House day?

title: Marketing the House
dialogue_line: I will handle all of the work involved for the Open House. The only thing that you need to do is be somewhere else!

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: How much do you think that I should ask for my house?

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: Well, there are a lot of factors involved in setting an asking price.

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: What do you look at when setting an asking price?

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: We need to look at the selling prices for similar homes in the area. These will vary according to the condition of the home, specific location, and lot size.

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: Do I have to use the comparisons as the asking price for my house?

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: No, but a seller is not going to be able to get a loan if the selling price is a lot higher that what an appraiser feels the home is worth.

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: Isn't it better to price my house really high and see what I can get?

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: You shouldn't set the price of the house unrealistically high. Oftentimes buyers are put off by this practice.

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: Can I change my mind and lower my price if the home doesn't sell?

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: Sure, you can always lower your asking price.

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: I am not sure what the asking price for my house should be.

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: We have to take in a number of factors in setting an asking price.

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: What do we need to consider in establishing an acceptable price for a home?

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: The comparisons to other similar homes in your area give us a good indication of what your home is worth.

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: Is the price that we get by looking at comparisons necessarily the asking price that I have to use for my home?

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: You don't have to use that particular asking price, but the buyer is going to have trouble getting a loan if the house is priced too high.

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: Should I just shoot for the moon and, if I have to lower the price, do it later?

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: You should be realistic in your pricing. Otherwise, many potential buyers just walk away.

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: Can we lower the asking price later if we need to?

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: We can always re-evaluate the asking price in a few weeks, if we aren't getting any offers.

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: What do you think the asking price of my home should be?

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: There are many things to take into consideration when pricing a home.

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: What is involved in figuring out an asking price?

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: We need to combine many factors regarding your home to come up with an accurate value for your home.

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: When you look at comparisons, do I necessarily have to ask that price?

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: You don't have to use the price from the comparisons as your asking price. However, you must be realistic in what you ask.

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: I think that I am going to set the price really high so that I have room to bargain with the buyers.

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: Don't go overboard in trying to get top dollar. More often than not, that strategy backfires.

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: Is it okay to lower the asking price if the first price isn't bringing in any offers?

title: Setting an Asking Price
dialogue_line: If the market doesn't support your asking price, we can always re-evaluate our pricing and adjust it.

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: My wife thinks I should get a lawyer to look at the contract.

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: Well, it certainly wouldn't hurt to have a lawyer review it.

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: How much does a lawyer cost?

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: I don't know. A good real estate lawyer might cost $400 an hour.

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: That can't be legal!

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: Just think how much it'll be 10 years from now.

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: Do you know any lawyers that are cheaper than that?

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: You'd have to check the yellow pages or go online.

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: There's no telling how many hours the lawyer will charge me for.

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: Also, it might take a week or two just to get an appointment.

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: I'd rather get this over with, so just show me where to sign.

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: Good man! I've marked all the places for you to sign and date.

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: My wife said to have a lawyer look at the contract.

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: That's always a good idea.

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: Do you know how much a lawyer runs?

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: I've heard that they're about $400 an hour.

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: Who can afford that?

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: A few years ago, $100 an hour was outrageous.

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: Can you help me find a cheaper lawyer?

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: I'm afraid I can't help you with that.

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: The lawyer will start at $400, but where will it end?

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: Also, a good lawyer might not have time to see you immediately.

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: My wife's going to kill me, but just show me where to sign.

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: Now you're talking. The red stickers indicate where to sign and date.

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: My wife told me to get a lawyer to review the contract first.

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: A smart husband always does what his wife tells him.

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: How much are lawyers charging nowadays?

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: It's hard to believe, but I think they charge about $400 an hour.

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: That's highway robbery!

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: I think lawyers are making twice what doctors are making.

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: Are there any lawyers that are cheaper than that?

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: The best advice I can give you is to Google it.

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: I can barely afford one hour, but certainly not two.

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: Remember, it might take a few days just to set up an appointment.

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: I really don't have the time or the money, so where do I sign?

title: 4. Signing Contract With Realtor
dialogue_line: Your wife will thank you. Just sign and date where the little red stickers are.

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: So, during the time that you are showing my house, how will my valuables be protected?

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: Our real estate company takes every precaution to see that your valuables are protected at all times.

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: How will I know when someone will be looking at my home?

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: We will typically give you at least 4 hours notice on a weekend before we come by.

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: Will you always accompany whoever is looking at my house?

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: Your house is listed on the multiple listing. That means that people from a variety of real estate offices will be showing your home.

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: How will the realtors get into my house if I am not at home?

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: We put a lockbox on your house. The realtors will have a key to the lockbox and then they can get a key to your front door.

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: What about people watching my stuff during an Open House?

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: We always suggest that you either store your jewelry in a safe or move it into a friend's house while your house is being shown.

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: I am worried about the security of my home while it is being shown.

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: We do everything we can to protect your home and your valuables

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: Do people just come and look whenever they want to?

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: During the week, we will let you know the night before if we will be bringing someone by the next day.

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: I am assuming that someone from your office will always be there, right?

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: Your home is listed exclusively with our office. We will be the only ones showing your home.

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: Does everyone have a copy of my house key?

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: Realtors have a special key to what is called a lockbox. Once they get into the lockbox, they can get a key to the house.

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: I have heard horror stories from friends about being ripped off during their Open House.

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: Our company has invested in several cameras that we place in the key rooms while the house is being shown.

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: I have heard horror stories about people's things being stolen while their house is being shown.

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: We have a very good track record when it comes to home security.

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: I am not so sure that I like the idea of people showing up whenever they want to pop in!

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: We will always call at least 12 hours in advance if we are bringing someone by to see your home.

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: Are you the only one showing my house?

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: To get maximum exposure and a variety of buyers, your home is listed on the multiple listing. Many different realtors will be showing your home.

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: Do you have to come and let the different realtors in when they come to look at my house?

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: The realtors can get a key to your house by unlocking a lockbox on your front door. They use it while they are there and return it when they leave.

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: The thing I worry about the most is having my valuables stolen during an Open House.

title: 5. Home Security During Listing
dialogue_line: Our realtors try to be very aware at all times of who is in the house and what they are doing.

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: So what do you think I should do to fix up the interior of my house?

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: A fresh coat of paint is the number one improvement that you can make to your home.

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: What colors do you think would be best?

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: You need to go with fairly neutral tones. You want fairly contemporary colors that will go with a variety of furnishings.

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: After paint, what is the next most important improvement that I can make?

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: Remove any extra furnishings and personal items. Make your home look as uncluttered as possible.

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: Should I get a new carpet?

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: Your carpet is in really good shape. New owners typically want to pick out their own carpeting.

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: How about improvements to the bathroom?

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: New faucets are not that expensive and can quickly add a clean and more up-to-date look.

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: What are your suggestions for some inexpensive fixes to help me get the best price for my home?

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: Painting the interior of your home is not that expensive and greatly improves the appearance of your home.

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: Should I go for trendy colors or more traditional tones?

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: You don't want to make any dramatic statements with paint, but don't go with just white either.

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: What else can I do besides paint the inside of my home to improve its value?

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: You need to get rid of any extra furniture or knick-knacks.

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: I need to know if I should replace the carpeting.

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: Your carpeting is very worn. You might want to explore buying some attractive inexpensive carpeting.

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: How about improvements to the kitchen?

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: You could inexpensively replace the linoleum flooring; that would really brighten things up.

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: What do people usually do to improve the interior of their houses before they sell them?

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: Your house looks very nice on the inside, but a fresh coat of paint always helps brighten a home's interior.

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: I get confused when trying to pick out colors that other people might like.

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: Lighter neutral colors are usually best. They make rooms appear larger.

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: The painting suggestion is a good one, but after that, what improvement will add value to my home?

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: Your interior should have only the most basic of furniture. Either store or get rid of any extra clutter.

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: What about replacing the floor covering?

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: I know that your carpeting is not brand new, but with a good steam cleaning, I think that it will look great.

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: Is there anything that I can do to the bathrooms and kitchen that wouldn't cost too much?

title: 6. Fixing Up the Interior
dialogue_line: New curtains or blinds do not cost that much and brighten up any room.

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: Can you help me figure out some inexpensive ways to fix up the exterior of my home?

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: Like the interior, the number one thing you can do is to repaint the outside of your home if it needs it.

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: What do you think of the landscaping?

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: Your lawn looks really good. Perhaps you could get some timers installed for your sprinklers.

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: How about adding some flowers or something?

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: Colorful flowers are always a nice addition to a yard to add curb appeal.

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: What about fixing up the backyard?

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: Make sure the lawn is well trimmed and the bushes are cut back.

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: Can you think of any more overall suggestions for the exterior?

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: Wash all of the windows inside and out.

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: What can I do to fix up the exterior of my home?

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: I would say the number one thing that you can do is paint your home, but your home has been painted recently and looks great!

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: What can I do about the landscaping?

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: Your lawn looks a little dried out. I think all it needs is a little fertilizer and water.

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: My front yard looks a little boring. How can I brighten it up?

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: I would definitely put in some new plantings to liven your yard up a bit.

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: Should I be worried about what my backyard looks like?

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: You need to repair that section where your fence is falling down.

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: What else can I do to make the exterior of the house look extra good to buyers?

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: Make sure to keep the sidewalks and driveways swept clean at all times.

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: I keep hearing about curb appeal and want to know how to achieve it.

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: The paint job on your home looks pretty good, but I would touch up the wooden trim a little where you have some peeling spots.

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: I am not so sure that everyone will like the landscaping.

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: Your lawn is a disaster! To get top dollar for your home, you should replace it.

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: Is there anything I can do to add some interest to my front yard?

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: You have beautiful plants in your yard, although some of them aren't in bloom right now. Just add a few colorful flowers in pots.

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: Is the appearance of the backyard important?

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: If you can borrow some really nice patio furniture to show off your lovely patio, that would be nice.

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: Any final suggestions on how I can make the exterior of my house even more appealing?

title: 7. Fixing Up the Exterior
dialogue_line: Having your trees and bushes trimmed could be a good investment.

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: What should I do to get ready for the Open House?

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: Your house needs to be as clean and uncluttered as possible.

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: Can we stay in the house while it is being shown?

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: No one is to be in the house during the Open House except for the realtor and the potential buyers who are looking at the house.

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: Can we leave our dog in the backyard during the Open House?

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: Absolutely no pets are to remain in the house during Open House. Take them with you or board them, please.

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: I have a lot of expensive jewelry and am afraid to leave it in the house.

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: We will do our best to watch over your things, but expensive jewelry and guns need to go with you.

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: How will we know when to come home?

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: The Open House will last from eleven o'clock until four o'clock.

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: Is there anything special I should do to get ready for our Open House this weekend?

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: Just make sure that your house is perfectly clean and that everything is put away.

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: My husband wants to watch the game, and we were wondering if he could stay in his den during Open House.

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: Everyone in the household must leave the premises before potential buyers arrive.

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: Can the cat stay on the bed during Open House?

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: No pets are allowed at the Open House! Maybe your neighbor would let your pets stay over there for a few hours.

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: Where can I hide my expensive jewelry?

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: If you have a safe, put your jewelry in there. Otherwise, please take your valuables with you.

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: Will you let us know when everyone has left?

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: Usually the Open Houses last until four o'clock. If this one ends earlier, I will call you on your cell phone.

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: What suggestions do you have for preparing for the Open House on Saturday?

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: The two most important things are that your home is clean and clutter free.

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: My mother is old and wants to stay in her room during the Open House.

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: Absolutely no occupants of the house are to be present during an Open House.

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: We have several pet snakes and would like them to stay in the garage during Open House.

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: You wouldn't want someone to hate your house because they can't stand animals, would you? Your pets need to disappear for a bit!

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: Will someone be watching to make sure my expensive jewelry doesn't get ripped off?

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: We have two realtors to keep an eye on things at all times, but please don't keep valuable jewelry or guns in your home when it is being shown.

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: What time will the Open House be over?

title: 8. Preparing for an Open House
dialogue_line: You can come home at four o'clock if you like. If it is rainy and slow, I will call you if I decide to end it a little early.

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: So how much did the buyers bid on our house?

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: Your asking price was three hundred thousand dollars. The potential buyers offered two hundred ninety thousand dollars.

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: That's a great offer!

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: Yes, it is a good offer. Before you accept, we should look at some details.

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: What else do we need to look at?

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: They want you to pay all closing costs. Of course, they are making the sale contingent on an inspection showing no major defects in the house.

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: I think that that sounds fair.

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: You could put in a counteroffer, but I know that these buyers also have their eye on another house down the street.

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: I definitely want to accept their offer.

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: Excellent decision! I will notify them immediately.

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: I am so anxious to hear what the bid was on our house!

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: Remember that we set the asking price at three hundred thousand dollars. The first offer is two hundred ninety thousand dollars.

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: That's way better than I expected so early in the game!

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: The offer is definitely a good one, but let's make sure we look at the whole picture.

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: What are the other considerations?

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: They want you to pay for the inspection, but they want to pick out the inspector. If the house is defective, they will want out of the deal.

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: I don't have a problem with that.

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: You could make them a counteroffer, but I know that you need a timely sale.

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: Please notify the buyers that I have accepted their offer.

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: I think that you are making the right choice. I will phone the buyers right away!

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: What did the buyers offer us on our house?

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: With the original asking price at three hundred thousand dollars, the buyers are willing to pay two hundred ninety thousand dollars.

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: I am really pleased with that offer.

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: I agree that the offer is in the ballpark. We need to consider everything before you accept.

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: Besides the selling price, what else is there to consider?

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: They want you to pay to have the cracks in the back wall fixed and a couple of the roof tiles replaced.

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: All of that is acceptable to me.

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: A counteroffer by you is always a possibility, but their price is very close to your asking price. You could risk losing the sale.

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: I wish to officially accept their offer.

title: 9. Accepting an Offer
dialogue_line: This is a win-win situation for both you and the buyer. I am sure that you will both be happy with your decision.

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I hear the young couple that came by the other day made an offer on our house.

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Yes, the potential buyers made an offer this morning.

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Is the offer a good offer?

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: The offer is pretty good. You asked three hundred thousand and they offered two hundred eighty thousand.

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I would be willing to take two hundred ninety thousand, but no lower.

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: You could make a counteroffer of two hundred ninety thousand dollars. Would you like to do that?

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Yes, I would like to make the counteroffer.

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I will make the counteroffer immediately by phone.

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: What if they don't accept the counteroffer?

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: They can make a counteroffer themselves or state that their first offer stands.

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I got a message on my machine that you received an offer on my house.

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Yes, the offer came in late last night. It was too late to call you.

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Is the offer as high as we were hoping for?

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: They offered two hundred eighty thousand dollars, and you were asking three hundred thousand dollars. They are definitely in the ballpark.

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I was prepared to go a little lower, but more like two hundred ninety thousand dollars.

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Would you like to make a counteroffer of two hundred ninety thousand dollars?

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I definitely would like to make a counteroffer.

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I will FAX them the counteroffer right away.

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: What if my counteroffer gets turned down?

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: They have an option of making a counteroffer, or they can just reject your counteroffer.

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Your office called and said that an offer came in on our house.

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Yes, the offer came in less than an hour ago.

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: How good of an offer did we receive?

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Their bid was two hundred eighty thousand dollars, and you said that you wanted three hundred thousand dollars. Their bid is a reasonable start.

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: We built a little leeway into the asking price, but I don't want to accept less than two hundred ninety thousand dollars.

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Sellers frequently make a counteroffer. Would you like to counteroffer two hundred ninety thousand dollars?

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I think that a counteroffer would be wise at this point.

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I will contact their agent right away with your counteroffer.

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: What should we do if they don't like the counteroffer?

title: . Counteroffer
dialogue_line: If the seller doesn't want to accept your counteroffer, they can reject it or come up with a counteroffer of their own.

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: My assistant called and said that you had received a response to our counteroffer.

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Yes, the buyers called me just an hour ago.

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Did they accept the counteroffer?

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: They came back with their own counteroffer of five thousand less than you wanted.

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: What do you think about their offer?

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I think that this is a good offer. They also would like to have a 90-day escrow to allow them to sell their home.

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: The length of the escrow is not a huge issue with us.

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: They also want the sale contingent on a good building inspection.

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: That is reasonable, and I accept those conditions.

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I will let them know that you have accepted their counteroffer. They will be very pleased!

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I had a message on my phone that the buyers had responded to our counteroffer.

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Yes, the response just came through on the fax machine.

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Was the counteroffer acceptable to them?

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: They made their own counteroffer of five thousand less than you proposed.

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Do you feel that their counteroffer is reasonable?

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Their offer is a good one. They also want to have a short escrow as they have already sold their home and are ready to move in.

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: We can accommodate the buyer's desire for an escrow length of their choosing.

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: They want their building inspector to approve the quality of the house.

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I would expect that to be the case and accept their counteroffer.

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I will contact the buyers immediately and let them know of your acceptance of their counteroffer. I am sure they will be excited!

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I was calling in to see if there had been any response from the buyers regarding my counteroffer.

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Yes, the buyer's agent just contacted me while I was at an Open House.

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Did they state whether the counteroffer worked for them or not?

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: They almost accepted your counteroffer price but want to go a little lower. They are offering five thousand less than your counteroffer.

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: In your professional opinion, is this a good offer?

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Personally in today's market, I would accept the offer. They also want a short escrow as they feel that interest rates are low right now.

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: We can either lengthen or shorten the escrow for the buyer.

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: They want to make sure that the inspector says that there are no major problems with the house before this is a solid deal.

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Of course, the house will have to pass a basic inspection, but we accept their counteroffer.

title: . Accepting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: The buyers will be happy to hear that you have accepted their counteroffer.

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I was calling to see if the buyers had accepted my counteroffer.

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Yes, actually they just called back with a counteroffer of their own.

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Is the counteroffer close to the asking price?

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: The counteroffer is for ten thousand less than your asking price.

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I didn't really want to go that low in my pricing.

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I agree that that price is too low. Your home is in good shape, and you should get a better price for it.

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: What should I do at this point?

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Since you don't want to go any lower, we can notify them that you are rejecting their latest offer.

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Can you take care of that for me and get back to me?

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I will let them know that your counteroffer was the lowest price that you will accept.

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Has there been any word about whether the buyers have accepted my counteroffer?

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Yes, I was going to call you this morning. Your buyers have responded with a counteroffer.

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Is the counteroffer a good one?

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: They are now offering ten thousand less than your asking price.

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: That is really a bit lower in price than I would like to go.

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I think that your feelings are valid. You have a beautiful home and can afford to wait for a better offer.

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: What is the next step?

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: You can flat-out reject their offer and see what they come up with.

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I would like you to notify them that I am rejecting their offer.

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I will notify the buyers that you will not accept their counteroffer.

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I was wondering if the buyers have accepted my counteroffer.

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Yes, I just faxed you the information an hour ago. The buyers have a counteroffer for you.

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: How much did they counteroffer?

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: They now are offering to pay ten thousand less than your asking price.

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I am not really ready to accept that low of a price.

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I wouldn't accept that price either. Your home is in a good area and should command a higher price.

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Where do we go from here?

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: We should notify them that you are rejecting their current offer. They might choose to offer a higher price.

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: Please let the buyers know that I am rejecting their offer.

title: . Rejecting a Counteroffer
dialogue_line: I will take care of that right away. They may or may not raise their offer.

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: Your office called and left a message that several offers had come in on our home.

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: Yes, we received three offers in one day for your home!

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: Were the offers for a good price?

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: One offer was for the full asking price, one slightly below, and one above.

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: Well, I am going to accept the highest bid, of course!

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: Actually there are a few things to consider other than who is offering the most money.

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: What other factors do I need to consider?

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: We need to consider the likelihood of the buyers actually being able to purchase the house.

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: How do we check on the buyer's ability to purchase our home?

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: We will check to see if these buyers are pre-qualified for the loan amount that they need. This information will help you make a good decision.

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: When we get all of that information, then I will make my decision.

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: When you make that decision, I will present it to the buyers.

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: I received your e-mail about the many purchase offers for my house.

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: It has been quite a busy day regarding your home. We just received three offers!

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: Did the potential buyers offer a good price?

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: There were offers above and below your asking price, as well as one exactly for the asking price.

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: The highest bid is always the best bid!

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: We need to look at the big picture in deciding which bid to accept.

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: What things would you like me to look at?

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: Just because a buyer offers the money doesn't mean that they actually have the credit to purchase the home.

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: How do I get the information about a buyer's ability to afford to buy a home?

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: We will check to see if any of these buyers have a large down payment. A large amount of available cash would be a good sign.

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: I will wait for that information and give you my answer.

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: Please let me know when you have made your decision, and I will contact the buyers.

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: My friend said that you had called regarding multiple offers for my home.

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: The Open House was quite a success. Last night we received three offers on your home!

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: I am anxious to hear how good an offer we received!

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: Offers above and below the asking price came in. One was right on the money.

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: Let's go with the highest bid!

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: We need to look at a number of factors in deciding which bid to go with.

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: What matters besides getting the money for the house?

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: We need to make sure that these potential buyers all actually qualify to even purchase a home.

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: I don't even know where to begin checking on a buyer's credit information.

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: We can check to see if these buyers have already sold their current home. This would make them more desirable.

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: I think that gathering that information will be helpful to me.

title: . Deciding Which Offer to Accept
dialogue_line: Please let me know if I can further assist you in making your decision.

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: I heard that the potential buyer is interested in me carrying part of a loan for him.

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: Carrying part of a loan can be a good or a bad thing, depending on the circumstances.

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: What would be an advantage of me carrying a note on the house?

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: If you don't need the money right away, you can earn a fairly good interest rate.

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: Why does my buyer want me to carry part of his loan?

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: In this economy, buyers sometimes have trouble getting a loan even when they have good credit.

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: What are the risks to me?

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: The risk is that the market could drop drastically and the owner would walk away.

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: How long will I need to commit to financing this loan?

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: You need to make an agreement with the buyer as to how long you will carry this note.

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: My potential buyer has asked me to carry part of his loan.

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: The decision to carry part of a loan might be advantageous to you or problematic.

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: Why would I ever want to carry a note on a house?

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: It is a type of investment that can offer a fairly steady return over a set period of time.

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: Why is my buyer requesting that I carry part of his loan?

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: Oftentimes buyers are well able to afford the home but unable to qualify for a loan.

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: Are there any risks in carrying a second mortgage?

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: You are basically betting on the fact that the home is not going to drastically fall in price. This could leave you with a house that is not worth much.

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: Will I be financing this loan for a set period of time?

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: That is entirely up to you and the buyer.

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: If the purchaser of your home wants you to carry part of the loan, is that good?

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: Carrying a loan could be good or bad for you as a seller.

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: Why would it be a good thing to carry a note on my own house?

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: For investors who can afford to have their money tied up, it can offer a fairly nice return.

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: What advantage is my buyer looking for in having me carry him on paper?

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: We are seeing more and more buyers who are not able to qualify for a loan and are able to take out a second mortgage with the owner.

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: Can I lose my money if I carry a second mortgage?

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: It is an investment and carries some risks. You are counting on the housing market to not go into a tailspin.

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: Is there a certain amount of time that I will be carrying this loan?

title: . Deciding Whether to Carry Part of a Loan
dialogue_line: The buyer and seller set the year for the loan to come due.

title: . Deed Transfer

title: . Deed Transfer

title: . Deed Transfer

title: . Deed Transfer

title: . Deed Transfer

title: . Deed Transfer

title: . Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: Do you have any helpful hints for preparing to move out of my home?

title: . Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: The first thing I would do is to make a list of what needs to be done. Then number the items as to what can be done ahead of time.

title: . Preparing to Move Out

dialogue_line: You also should schedule your moving van in advance.

dialogue_line: You need to work that out ahead of time with your utility companies and the new owners.

dialogue_line: I was wondering if you had any useful suggestions for how to prepare for our moving day.

title: . Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: Make a prioritized list of what needs to be done and when. Many things can be done ahead of time.

title: . Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: Can you give me some suggestions for my list?

title: . Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: Many people have a garage sale to avoid moving things that they no longer use.

title: . Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: That would certainly cut down on the price of moving.

title: . Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: Make sure that you take the time to schedule your moving van.

title: . Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: Would it be okay to get a head start on my packing?

title: . Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: Begin by packing things that you don't frequently need. Save only a few things until right before your moving date.

title: . Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: When should I have my utilities shut off?

title: . Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: It is best for you and the new owners to coordinate the transfer of the utilities and what needs to be turned off and on.

title: . Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: I want our moving day to go smoothly and am open to your suggestions.

title: . Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: I would suggest that you make a list and check off the items as you go along. The list will get shorter as your moving date approaches.

title: . Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: What things do people usually put on their moving-out list?

title: . Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: One thing that can be done ahead of time is to get rid of excess stuff by having a garage sale.

title: . Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: That would mean a lot less time wasted in packing up our things.

title: . Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: List scheduling your moving van as an item on your to do list.

title: . Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: Do people ever start packing a month or so before moving?

title: . Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: You can certainly start packing things that you won't be using right away.

title: . Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: I don't know if I should have my utilities shut off or leave them on for the people who are moving in.

title: . Preparing to Move Out
dialogue_line: You could simply have all the utilities shut off on the day you move out, but you might want to coordinate that with the new owners.
